chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: Diary of Elizabeth Anne Jennings, later Anne Jennings Krush. Known to me and her other grandchildren as "Nanny." Her eldest daughter, Carol Krush, inherited all of Nanny's journals. Aunt Carol sent the journals to me in February, 2020.
This journal has an interesting set-up; one page for each day of the year, but with lines allowing entries for the same day on four different years.

listitem.para: 1931 - Thursday. Slept late. Decided to have party. Invited 12. 6 came. Lots of fun starting you, diary.
1932 - Friday. Here again! Up late. Decided to go to Phila. demain. Packed & washed hair. Party at Franny's with Eddie Ruff. Cute kid. Home to M.W.'s at 11:15. Up early tomorrow.

1933 - Sun. Back again! Got up about 12:30. Bill here! To Sally's for dinner. Talked. Took Jane home. Back home for dinner. Got thinking of Bill & was blue; so I came down to Sally's for night. Bed early & I'm plenty tired!

1934 - Mon. Goodness me! Time flies! Got up at 11:45. Read & Bill came. Good. He's s' nice! Munny, Pop & I listened to Rose Bowl game. Looey in Columbiaroon & I lost $1! Bill is to pay his. Cold bad; so I packed & went to bed early! Bill!?

1935 - Tues. Last time di - sort of sad!! Up at 12 with queer head. Babs, Wally, Joey for dinner. Bill in. Sat on couch & listened to Rose Bowl game. Stanford lost. John packed. Boys came to say G'bye. He left at 9 for N.Y. Munny, Pop, Bill, Joey & I talked. Took Joey home & then Bill left. He's going with Pop tomorrow nite. I think I really love him!
1931 - Friday. Peggy was here all nite last nite & tonite. Town mit Sally & A.H. Saw C. Rodgers in "Heads Up" & R. Barthelmess in "The Lash". Fun!
1932 - Saturday. Mr. Van Pelt, M.W., Dossie & I off at 7:30 for Phila. Arrived 6:30. Fun in route. Present etc. Snow! Bed early tonight. Met 2 aunts & 2 uncks & Granny!

1933 - Mon. Up late. Home. Bill here alone with me till after one. Drank wine. Threatened mistletoe. Made bed. Packed. Sally & Jim came. Listened to Pitt get beaten by USC 35-0. Tough! Bill didn't show up! Down to Sally's to say g'bye! Letter from J. Crooks! Last night! ??? & Sad!

1934 - Tues. Up early. Dentist. O.K. Town with Munny & got things. Home. Bill came as we undid Christmas trees, "hidden charm" etc! G'bye to Wally etc. Bill, Munny & I to station at 4:45. Sad! Bridge on train & bed early.

1935 - Wed. Up real late. Worked about. Went with Babs to Moon Run & I read French. Home. Bill had come back, been here & gone. Munny & I alone tonite. She has a cold. Read. Wrote letters, messed around & bed early for a change. Missed William!
1931 - Saturday. Got up MIT P.T. at 11:15. Luncheon at Penguin Tea Shop. Grand Slam. Tea at Pinx's. Supper, bridge at Terry's. P.T. & M.W. left!!!
1932 - Sunday. Up at 8:30. High Church "St. Marks" Awful! Dinner & out to Townsends. M.W. (?) Horry! Flutter flutter! Supper at McIntyres. Gubby's. Drove car. Home. Bed.

1933 - Tues. Packed. Bill came. Talked! Mistletoe again, but we were bashful! Took him up street when I mailed things. Said g'bye at dentists. G'bye to Isabill & Sally. Forgot ticket etc. Bill at Cory station. G'bye to Munny. O.K. on train. Letters, Bed!
1934 - Wed. Arrived 2 ½ hrs. late. Undid things. Talked with everyone. Gym at 4:40. Dinner with gang. B.B. with Butsch & we need practice. Bed early on account of cold. Oh me!

1935 - Thurs. Up at 9:30. No job at Valley Hospital! Oh dear. Town & to dentist. Nice man. Home. Read. Called Babs. Munny & I alone & I was restless till Bill came. Yes, he came tonite di. We played Ping Pong & talked & were good & I had such a pleasant evening. I hope he did! I missed him till he came, di - awfully!!
1931 - Sunday. Went to S.S. John & Bill left. Boohoo! Down to Franny's in aft to say adieu. Fooled around & monkeyed tonite.
1932 - Monday. Up at 10. Lunch. Winnie M, Peggy, M.W. & I at Bellevue. Movies "Mata Hari" & "Delicious." Both peachy. Ate at Sautters(?) Shopped. Train. Movies "The Smart Woman." All bed.

1933 - Wed. Arrived about 10:15. Great to see kids. Betty & I fooled around in aft. Down to vil. Off for supper. Ginny, Betty & I to movies. "Red Dust." Clark Gable. O.K. Fire drill! Bed early & told Betty about Bill etc.
1934 - Thurs. Zo & actually got started to work. Talked all aft after Bible. Studied some tonite at libe but came home & to bed at 9:30. My cold is a little bit better. Thinking of Bill - oh gosh!

1935 - Fri. Up early. Made school visit at Glen Mitchell. Teacher good! Home. Lunch. Saw Bill on motorcycle. Town with Izzy to Homeopathic, West Penn & Pres. hospitals for job in summer. Hopeful. Franny's for tea. Supper. To Babs' & Terry also & we all talked till 12.
1931 - School - Monday - again. Dagnabit. Could hardly get up! got record, new kitty "Cully", took Sally home. Music lesson. Got Casey back, poor fella!!
1932 - Tues. Up early. Saw M.W. off at Phila. Shopped with P. & Mrs. T. Ate lunch at Whitmans. Dinner & movies with Winnie M. Greeks. Home & bed late.

1933 - Thurs. Up early once again. Classes! Eng. Conference in aft. Messed around tonite. Ate dinner with Marion(?) and we reminisced. Fun! Got a sore throat tonite & went to bed early. Saw about radio today.
1934 - Fri. Up early. Answered a lot. Oh me. Did Lit & talked to Prill this aft & studied tonite after Munger's birthday party. Met Miss Dwight. Wore formals. Great sport. Bed 10:30.

1935 - Sat. Up at 8:30. Babs & I to town & I got job at Children's Hospital for summer. Thrills! Movies with Babs, "Forsaking all Others." Keen. Home. Talked to Bill a few minutes. Crutchfield's tea. Fun. Dinner alone. To Babs & Joey, B. Terry, Jim, Cousin Walter, Babs & I made merry. Fun. Bed at 2 at Babs' & I was dead tired!! Wish Bill had been there.
1931 - Tuesday. A present. A.H., Dammuddy & I went to town. Saw "Charlie's Aunt" at Warner. Did I laff?! Surely was good. Fun in lab. Bed late!
1932 - Wednesday. Left Haverford about nine. Saw Father Cox's Army. Old licenses, etc. Home about 8. Talked & talked. Washed hair & bed early. Glad!

1933 - Fri. Sore throat better. Gym this aft. Waited and Betty etc. tonite. Wrote to Bill, dear boy. Asked Mrs. Wheeler about radio. Wrote to Peggy & also Munny. Read & bed early. Getting used to the grind!
1934 - Sat. Lab again, Town with Prill on 12:55. Shopped & home at 3. Glasses broken, etc. Messed around. Betty sick. Studied. Dinner. Studied tonite & fooled & to bed late.

1935 - Sun. Up at 12. Home for dinner & Wally & Bill here. Pop left at 2. Last till Easter that I'll see him. Ping Pong & sang at piano etc. with Bill till 5. Queer today, di. To village. Home. Washed hair. Listened to radio with Munny & did Education till 10:30. Talked & then bed. I love home, di & hate the thought of leaving.
1931 - Wednesday. Took Sally home. She saw Cully. Ate 3 eskies. Got sand for cat. Took K(?) out. Aunt Hat fussing at me now.
1932 - Thursday. Back to school once more. Stayed for English. G. Reserves for supper & silhouette making tonight.
1933 - Sat. Awful classes. Betty sick in bed. Listened to radio & read in aft. To movies "A Bill of Divorcement." Cried & "Mask of Fu Manchu" with Ginny. Home & ate & bed late.
1934 - Sun. Up real late. Studied. Jane Murdock for dinner. Studied this aft. Wrote letters. Waited on supper. Studied tonite & to bed some time or other.

1935 - Mon. Up at 8:15 & town to meet Miss Wilson of Children's Hospital. She's keen. Home. Bill this aft. after Munny & I got me dress etc. Ping Pong & we sat on l.l. & teased Mac. Kissed me g'bye & he left at 5. He may work tomorrow! Packed. G'bye to Babs & Wally & Izzy & Charlotte. Home. Munny & I sat till 11:30. She's so grand, di! There's no one like her. I love her so much & to think of all the years I didn't know her. Makes me sad!! She's a swell guy, di!!!
1931 - Thursday. Stayed in at lab till (?) Got eskies. Saw M.E.H. Had hair washed. Studied & am tired now.
1932 - Friday. Finished silhouette. Basketball at Y. Peg Handy & I to Seetsdale to see us lose 30-18. Home. Saw cute puppy. Bed late.
1933 - Sun. Up late. Rote letters. Studied in aft & read & listened to radio. On supper. Betty went out & came in late. Radio again & bed early.
1934 - Mon. Saw Miss Whiting about changing Bible, but it will be Phil. Thank fortune! To libe, but not long. Gym & then b.b. tonite. Studied & bed early. Washed hair.

1935 - Tues. Up at my leisure. Last time! Spent a.m. at station. Munny & I off at 12:30. Met Martha Nash at Duquesne Club for dinner. She's having a baby in April, di! Wish I were! Met Dooby at station, also Joey. G'bye to Munny & we were off. Met Jo Bigate. Cute. Dinner & fooled around. Walked about at Harrisburg. Bed. Oh me!!
1931 - Friday. Came home in aft. Monkeyed. Music lesson at 7:30. Studied & talked to Dammuddy. Last night! Read Herald.
1932 - Saturday. Washed stockings. "Local Boy Makes Good" - Joe E. Brown with Mother. Eddie Ruff's party. Only danced with him once. Fair time. Home with S & R.

1933 - Mon. Slushy & rain! Physics lab in aft & got out early. Home & ate. To French lecture tonite & got all mixed up. Ginny & Bobby Trask came & heard radio. Bobby played piano & was grand! Like her heaps. Dolly, G. B & I ate.
1934 - Tues. Zo again. Long lecture. Long classes this aft. Asked Mrs. Hobbs for dinner, 2 weeks from tomorrow! Home. Studied. Studied tonite & bed late.

1935 - Wed. Arrived Wellesley at 9. Fixed up room all a.m. Janet & I all alone. Talked about vacation. 1:30 to Shafer & registered till dinner time. Home. Most everyone here. Back to Shafer till 11:30 or 45. Home Talked to Prill till quarter of 1. I'm about fagged out.
1931 - Saturday. Got up at 7. Took Dammuddy to station. Boohoo! Went to Smiths. Home at eleven.
1932 - Sunday. No Bill in a.m. after church with Sally. Came in aft & stayed till 5:30. I dropped in coffee ice cream. Hooray! He'll come to my party & to Home dance!! Thrills!!
1933 - Tues. Passed two tests in gym this aft. Had Ruth Pitcairn for dinner. Good kid. Talked after dinner. Betty has bad cold. Read & studied & bed early. Finished "Only Yesterday."
1934 - Wed. Did some extra Zo. with Dobby. To vil for haircut. Home. Picture of room taken. Gym. Basketball with good crowd tonite. To see Tilden & Vines play next Mon! Studied. Bed.

1935 - Thurs. First classes & I didn't feel so hot. Dead tired! Felt better after Phys. O.K. Worked 2 hrs for F.E.(?)A & then home. Studied tonite & went to bed early. So natural to be back. It doesn't seem as if I had ever been home. I miss William & how!
1931 - Sunday. Slept late. Funnies. Studied. Wally & Bill here. Church at nite & listened to Floyd Gibbons. Bed now.
1932 - Monday. Saw Joan Crawford & Clark Gable in "Possessed." Keeno! I fell for Clark. Expect to dream of him. See you anon, old di! (Thinking of Bill!?)

1933 - Wed. Slept late & no classes today! Letters from 5 people. Studied in a.m. Fooled all aft! Ate ice cream. Basketball tonite O.K. Fun. Carol Sleicher elected pres. of Eliot. Messed around. Bed early.
1934 - Thurs. Roll Call in Zo. Still doing Squalus arteries. Fun. Prill & I went to Tower for dinner, met with Peggy Kohn. Fun. Saw Chubby Cutter. Home & studied & to bed at 10.

1935 - Fri. Up early & studied Chemistry. Got by in German Chem. quiz awful! Damn. Vill with Da(?) and shopped. Sent Bill the muffs & candy. Oh me! Sat with Miss Onderdonk. Awful! Zo libe & studied. B. Clark, Misses Murphy & Leach - good people. Bed late. People in room.
1931 - Monday. After school, went to Shannons to sell tickets. Not at home. Took Sally home. Music lesson. Supper late. Bed early I hope.
1932 - Tuesday. Went to Burton Holmes' lectures. Good! Basketball at Y. tonite. Is my arm ever dead? Home. Peg Handy home & bed late.
1933 - Thurs. Slept late. Sent laundry. Had Mrs. Hobbs for dinner tonite. Perfectly, awfully nice. Everyone loves her! Mrs. Wheeler business & I was uneasy all nite. Fun with Betty Walsh & bed late!
1934 - Fri. Chem quiz. Last before exams! Studied a bit in aft. Early dinner dishes & Peanut & I went ice skating. More fun. Saw fancy skaters etc. I'm awful! Home & talked & studied a bit. Bed late.

1935 - Sat. Fairbanks & I again slipped the knot & blew into Boston. Shopped & got Sauterne & ate dinner at Durgin Parks & hot T&G after movies at Loews - movie swell - Ramon Navarro & some dame. Home & bed early.
1931 - Tuesday. Lab. Shopped in village. Sold 6 tickets to Grace. Fixed sand. Called Austin's about tickets. Studied late. Fire furnace now. Am tired.
1932 - Wednesday. Walked from my house to S.S.'s Took dress to Azars. Studied & went to Lib Rye's for help in Latin tonite.
1933 - Fri. Passed 11 tests now in gym. Miss Hamilton came for dinner & was good as ever. Fun. Kids in room & we were bawled out again by Mrs. Wheeler. Bed early for a change.
1934 - Sat. Lab. Melvin played trick. To vil with Peanut. Rainy. Blue. Home. Studied. Fooled with gang all evening. "Maria" - frog story, etc. Studied & Bed at 11. What a life!

1935 - Sun. Up at 8:15 & helped get ready corridor breakfast. We entertained the other F.F.C-E. Loads of fun. Dinner & studied. Agora vespers tonite & Barry & great initiation of Dot Sterrett & Dr. Heidbreter. Both O.K.
1931 - Wednesday Came home & fooled. Didn't go to G.R. Washed hair & got tickets from Austins - 12 now. I'm ahead.
1932 - Thursday - 213 against 220. We won 28-0. Hot game. Swim with Peg Handy. S.S. & Lib Rye tonite. Tired now. Surprised with lessons.
1933 - Sat. Awful classes. Betty & I to Boston Library & Movies at Exeter. "Rockabye" & "No More Orchids." Good. Bay & Arm. Dinner at Schrafts. Home. Bed early. Ginny came in. We all talked.
1934 - Sun. Up late again! Studied. Skippy Fuller for dinner. Studied. Fixed you (I'm ashamed!) Dogs on doorstep! Finally fixed Prill's room up as Noah's ark. Studied & fooled & bed late.

1935 - Mon. First gym & b.b. I'll probably be a bit stiff! Played with Butsch tonite & we got along marvelously. Won our game by 1 pt. Great life. Home. Studied a bit & bed early. La Bruyere good in French.
1931 - Thursday. Mr. Stroup has baby boy. No test in Public Speaking! Came home after school & talked to Wally etc. Studied & practiced tonite. Am in play.
1932 - Friday. Studied tonight for a change. Mother had me stay in. Read & studied. Can't remember what else.
1933 - Sun. Up late. To church in a.m. Technocracy. good. Studied in libe with Ginny. Down to Tupels. Studied tonite. Ginny & I went to Betty's room. Fun. Studied.
1934 - Mon. Great day! With Miss Elliot to see Vines play Tilden tonite. Vines won 12-14; 4-6; 6-4; 6-2; 6-1. Simply smooth. I was floored. Can hardly wait till Cochet comes!
1935 - Tues. Miss Murphy cernly(?) acts awful queer these days. Oh well! Supposed to go to Jeanne's tonite but I couldn't with great am't of work. Will have to see her. Bed late after much studying.
1931 - Friday. Have a cold. Feel oozy. Juniors beat Seniors!! 20-13. Hooray! I played all game. Ex. in music. Sally & I to bb game. Lost 25-14.
1932 - Saturday. Down to Mrs. Atchky's with Dick Koger(?). Studied in aft. Sally's tonite with Wally. Almost won 1st prize. Shirly did. Dan nice for once!
1933 - Mon. Letter from Munny. Lab in aft & got ahead of Schwartzy. To bed on arrival home with a queer throat. Betty brot my dinner. Studied tonite & bed early.
1934 - Tues. Slept thru breakfast. Did a girls of Bible. Zo. Bible & French. Sort of tired. Home & studied. Bells with Prill tonite. Such fun. Tired. Bed early.

1935 - Wed. My big day, as far as classed go. Decided we'd give a tea for Miss Griggs next Wed. Surprise! Oh yeah? Gone around in vill for stuff for Barn with Frances Martin. C+ in quiz after 3 A-'s - Damn! French lecture tonite. Sat with Miss Clark in Chapel in a.m.
1931 - Saturday. Got up at 10:45. Dentist at 11:30. Came home & read. Have a cold & sore throat. Studied & bed at 10:30 tonite.
1932 - Sunday. Rose at 11. to the tune of Bill's whistling. Just stayed till 1. I meant to ask him back but didn't. Oh dear! Sally here this aft. E.K.C. tonite. Bed at 9:30.
1933 - Tues. Sore throat is worse. Had a Zoo quiz this aft. Think I cracked it on the head. Passed 1 more test in gym. Bed early tonite after gargling. Boston demain.
1934 - Wed. To vil after lunch with Prill. We were silly. Then back to study. Letter from Bill - Goodness me! Not so hot, but so nice to hear from him. Golly - why do I care so much for him?

1935 - Thurs. After Phys. lab in which Deb & I had a hell of a time & no results, tea at Munger & then we both got props for Barn. Play tomorrow nite. Home & attempted studying tonite. Watta life. Letter from Chubby today. I was surprised at one so soon.
1931 - Sunday. Stayed in bed all day. I feel better, tho! Fixed you. Wrote letters. Read etc. G'bye!
1932 - Monday. Rode around with Sally all aft. At her house for lunch. Studied tonite. Crazy driving(?) Received 5 letters! Darnit. All at once. Lecture at Club "Current Events" - Good!
1933 - Wed. Wanted to go to Boston, but Infirmary made me go to bed! In all day & had pills & more pills. Kids awful nice. Mrs. Wheeler got mad as usual (about eating.) Bed early. Grippe. Tired.

1934 - Thurs. Horrid Bible quiz after Zo & roll call. Home & studied all aft. Also studied all evening & messed in Prill's room. I get so sick of just studying! (after that letter, etc). Took Miss Davis to dinner. Was I glad? Waited.(?)

1935 - Frid. Wonderful snow today! But after class Dobson & I did an expt for Physiology & it worked swelly. Then got more props for Barn. Experimental play "Postal Orders" tonite & it was darn good. Sleigh ride for 1st time with gang. More ??? fun. Home & bed looked good!
1931 - Monday. Feel better. Came home from school & loafed. Read tonite & got to bed kind of late. Washed stockings.
1932 - Tuesday. Burton Holmes' lecture. "Capitals of Northern Europe" Sally, Munny & I. Good. B.B. tonite & Bakers with Ruth Challis. Fun. I like her.
1933 - Thurs. Up out of bed to take Physics quiz, but I flunked it. Stayed home this aft & slept. Rain. Feel better now after rotten this a.m. Cut Zoology! Naughty.

1934 - Fri. Psych quiz - Lousy. Studied Bible at noon. Talked with Wovie & Abbey this aft. To Henderson's for dinner. Home. Skated with Dobby. Keen ice boots(?). Back to Hat Gus's(?) with gang at 8:30. About 30 people there. More fun.

1935 - Sat. Up to French & job at Agora. Took props back. Then studied at Zo libe till I couldn't stand it any longer. Skiied for 1st time this year - wonderful! Program meeting at Agora tonite. Ms. Wilson swell. Enjoyed talk on farmers.
1931 - Tuesday. Stayed in for lab till 5 oclock. Home. Wrote letters. Fixed furnaces. Cleaned up Casey's messes. (per H.R.I.)
1932 - Wednesday. "Morning Becomes Electra" by Eugene O'Neill. Keeno. 3 plays. 5:30, 7 & 8-11:30. Morbid just a little, but a grand play & plot. Munny & I adored it.
1933 - Fri. Back to all classes again & I feel much better. Gym but passed no tests. Studied tonite but mostly messed around.
1934 - Sat. Too much work to go to town. Awful lab & then to vil with Andy. We were silly. Worked & then to movies tonite. "Berkely Square." Leslie Howard. Simply grand! Bed late.

1935 - Sun. Up for bekbets(?) Tony & I skied after breakfast. Wonderful, only we fell often. Studied & also this aft in libe. Helped get dinner at Agora. More fun. Home. Studied. Wrote Chubby & Mother.
1931 - Wednesday. Came home & lazied. Read my book report tonight. I don't care so much for it.
1932 - Thursday. English. Awful theme!! Rain. School for lunch. Ger. Chuff! G.R. tonite & we elected new officers. Home. Studied. Munny sick!

1933 - Sat. Awful classes. Messed around with hat in aft getting ready for tonite, but Stan got sick & we couldn't go to the Met. To Wellesley instead with Dolly & Betty. "If I had a Million" & "Hold 'Em Jail."

1934 - Sun. Up for breakfast. Worked 4 hours on Lit chant. To Sarah's for dinner at Tower. Heard Mr Greene & Mr. Dennis play, grand. Swept tonite & got cross. Betty's home & we talked. She was at Mudges.
1935 - Mon. Munger Birthday party tonite. I sat with Peanut, Tony, Prill, Dotty, Faith & Mrs. Erving. Loads of fun. B.B. tonite & Dempy & I had fun. Home & read French - bed early.
1931 - Thursday. Lab today. Sally in play at skoole. A.H. & I went to Smiths for supper. Bed late tonite.
1932 - Friday. Chubby & bits of paper again. I guess I've fallen for him! I would. He's tall, nice-looking, athletic etc. - Cute. Game at Ben Avon. Lost 16-15. Movies - Smarts etc!
1933 - Sun. Ginny, Betty & I up late. Kids brought us yummy breakfast. Studied in a.m. & aft. in Dolly's room & again tonite. What a day! Rained all day & I stayed in!

1935 - Tues. Up in heights today. In a.m. Gertie McIver said wanted me to take charge of b.b. tomorrow nite. Letter from Bill at noon. Cute & wonderful! And then Fairbanks & I going to Brattleboro after exams! Oh gosh! Life is thrilling!
1931 - Friday. A.H. in bed today. Sophy's beat Seniors 24-12. Music lesson. Ex. Ambridge beat S.H.S. in both games.
1932 - Saturday. Town in rain. My party tonite. New blue dress. Bill divine dances! Oh dear! I had slishy time! Sally all nite & sleep late. She likes Bill & Red & Wally.
1933 - Mon. Speech in Speech "Invehted Ah." Everybody laffed. Lights out all over house tonite. Candles. Fun. Dinner & Roney & Betty. I served. Worked on source theme. Messed around. Read. Bed late.
1934 - Tues. Awful lecture in Zo. Got Bible quizzes. C. Lucky to get that. French last. That exam will be painful. Skippy for dinner. Fun. Sat with Miss Davis. Studied tonite & bed early.

1935 - Wed. Off roof, but I was O.K. Party in Chem for Miss Griggs & Miss Woodland. Out at 5:45. Fun! To B.B. after dinner & had more fun with Miss Beall. Interesting work & choosing teams. Blizzard & wet gym. Mopped about. Fun. Home & tired!
1931 - Saturday. Have lucy! also pain in stomach. Slept till 11:30. Rested all day. Soda tonite & am a little better. Orange juice.
1932 - Sunday. Sally & I up at 10:45. Bill & Joe here. Later Wally & Red Shorts. Bill stayed till two. Diary, I like him best, much better than Chubby, even!
1933 - Tues. Letter from John. Lobsters in Zoology. Passed 3 more tests in gym. 15 now. Letters & studied tonite. Stiff. Thinking of Bill as usual. Hope he writes soon. Idea about Munny coming up.

1934 - Wed. Studied Bible & Zo in aft. Dobby & Mrs. Hobbs for dinner. Sat with Miss Davis. Such fun. Mrs. Hobbs is a peach & I'm crazy about her. Dobby & I to Tradition Nite rehearsal. Only students. Fun!

1935 - Thurs. A few last classes. Exams are approaching. Physiology swell this aft & we had a grand discussion with Miss Murphy. Dob & I tea at Agora only great snow & no food came. We at tho' & played ping pong - good old game. We had fun!
1931 - Sunday. Feel a little better today, but stayed in bed till 11:15. Got up and loafed. Studied & read. Bed early.
1932 - Monday. Getting over effects of my party. Still no coal furnace.

1933 - Wed. Fun in Speech & French. Home this aft & wrote source theme all aft. Letters to Mother, John & Dammuddy about Munny coming up. Physics lecture tonite. High Frequencies, with Ginny, Marian & Mudge.

1934 - Thurs. Zo roll call per usual. Last class. Hat & Dobby & I wished Miss Waterman & Miss Leach a Happy Mid-year. Fooled this aft. Tea. Prill & final paper! To concert tonite. Bauer & Gabielowtsch - good. Bed at 11:30. Nite.
1935 - Fri. Last classes. And how I've got to study for exams. I've got to get some marks! Did F.E.R.A. work this aft & hope to drag down some agent or Geld. Did some tonite & bed late!
1931 - Monday. Music lesson. Got ex. Took cat to Mary H's. They like it. A.H. still sick. I wish she could have real rest.
1932 - Tuesday. Burton Holmes Lecture. Not so hot. Game with Cory tonite. Chubby not so good. Red Rhoads. We lost 1st team game. Bill there & I didn't know it!

1933 - Thurs. C+ in Zoo quiz! I'm mad because I really did know it. Cut in Physics. Therefore I studied & messed around. Mrs. Wheeler had me in office to fuss about lamps & signs. Ugh! Rudy Vallee tonite!

1934 - Fri. Ha ha about last year! Classes. Peanut & I to vil. Then to Alumnae at 5 & stayed till 11. Tradition Night. Only, I'll get to! Faculty plays screaming. Home & bed 11. Nite! B on Psych quiz!

1935 - Sat. Up & no classes today. Too early to start studying. Did some Physiology & handed in all rest of expts. Fixed hickey for Agora & did job. Wrote letters. Fixed Education notebook. Bed early tonite.
1931 - Tuesday. Basketball game with Freshmen. Dumb as heck. Beat them 29-6. I never saw such a slow, pepless game.
1932 - Wednesday. Latin test today. Got 94. Highest yet. Home tonite. Washed hair & studied. Bed late. Note to Chubby about bits of paper.
1933 - Fri. A in French devoir. Thrills! Gym this aft & I got 17 checks now. Copied source theme after Connie Murdock came for supper. Nice! Bed early since I have to wait tomorrow.
1934 - Sat. Lab. Last class. Fairbanks & I to Boston & saw Garbo in "Queen Christina" - Good. Coat to be fixed. Burnt by iron! Bot food etc. Home. Presented to study. Letters & bed early.

1935 - Sun. Fairbanks & I to Boston & she to Hospital. Dr. Reid & Dr. Booth both swell! They didn't do much for Fairbanks. She's still in a bad way. We saw a birth & it was most exciting! Very moving & I still want to have children!
1931 - Wednesday. Stayed in for play practice. Dumb! Came home. A.H. nervous as heck. Supper & feel kind of tired tonite. Ph. test.
1932 - Thursday. Stayed for English. More scrap paper with Chubby in chapel! Reader's contest. Copy & feet examining! G.R. for cards tonite. Lost with Miss Kerr!
1933 - Sat. Awful classes but not Eng. today. Cut. Messed around with Bets all aft & slept off dinner & Ginny & I went down to see her off. Sad. Ginny & I to bed early. Talked till late. Fun.
1934 - Sun. Did I study? Not much. Fooled all day. John trouble. Caught up on correspondences & ate & talked & walked & got my dress dirty & generally was a nuisance. Thinking of? Oh me!
1935 - Mon. Down to studying today, but not much. Tried to do the French. Great old subject. Messed around. Wrote letters & studied. Oh God! Exam period is dull at times!
1931 - Thursday. A.H. stayed. Thank heavens! Came home. Had eskies. Sally was sick. Better now. Letters & reading tonite. Casey here!
1932 - Friday. Ushered at play! More fun. Up in balcony. Chubby & Bud Murphy behind us. Chubby next to me. Shook hands. Knots. Good play. Flowers - Rain. Home 11:30 & dreamt of George.

1933 - Sun. Up early. To chapel. Marvelous speaker. About social / anti-social & predatory groups. Studied & slept in aft. Studied with B.Williamson tonite. Down to McKenneys. Ate. Fine escape. Bed. Wrote.
1934 - Mon. To Bosting at 12:55 with Eve Atassoff. Got my coat, also hair waved & cut differently. More fun. Tried to do some of next weeks studying, but not much!

1935 - Tues. Letter from Art & he wants me to go on long talked-of ride on Sunday. Hope I can. Studied French & German all day & generally had a lovely time. Judy took Miss McElroy to dinner & I ate there too. To her room afterwards for coffee. O.K.
1931 - Friday. Mr. Ramsay spoke to us at school. Awfully good. Got out early. Fooled around with Sally.
1932 - Saturday. Thrilled about last nite. History in a.m. Went to Charlotte's with S. in aft & Terry's with Don & Bill tonite. Fun but a bit dull. Home about 12:45.
1933 - Mon. Studied some in a.m. Also in aft. Messed around. Wrote letters. Oh gee! Tea in aft & Mrs. Wheeler snippy as usual. French with Betty Williamson & Ginger tonite. Be early. 9 hours.
1934 - Tues. Tried to do some Zo. Fooled around mostly. Got zo drawings & Prill & I to vil. Fooled all afternoon away. Wrote more letters.

1935 - Wed. First exam - French & darn good. I liked it! Studied German all aft. Took Miss McElroy to dinner & we all sat in library afterwards & talked. More fun. Studied like Hell tonite & bed sort of late.
1931 - Saturday. Got up at 11:30. Went down to Sally's. She came up here tonite & stayed till 8:30. Lotsa fun.
1932 - Sunday. Bill, Joe, Wally, Red Shorts & Mat Harkenor here. Bill has bad cold. S & I drove them out to Slippery Rock. Washed hair, studied & fooled later. Bill in Bert's car.

1933 - Tues. French exam! Hard! Went for ride on bike with Ginny in aft. Sabrina farms. 4 Pillars. Pagoda. Tunnels way down. Weird! Walked all around. Home & felt let down. Letter. Radio. Ate with Honey. Radio & Bed late.
1934 - Awful cold - 2 below! Sat in library of Munger & studied Zo all day. Exams bearing down! Milk tonite & bed early.

1935 - Thurs. Studied & German exam this a.m. Pretty awful. Let up this aft & fooled around at Zo bldg & here. Tea. To Fiske for dinner. Fun. Movies with Peanut - "Little Minister" - Good. Saw Miss Murphy & Leach. Home late & tired!
1931 - Sunday. Went to S.S. In aft. Sally & I went for a walk. Lotsa fun. Studied & monkeyed tonite.
1932 - Monday. Fooled around with Sally till 5:30. Studied tonite. Gave Chubby bits of paper & he tried to piece them. Golly! He's cute! Smarts got a new Oldsmobile. Keen!
1933 - Wed. Studied Eng. in a.m. Mrs. Wheeler burst in Ginny's room & asked if we were smoking! Nerve! Letters. Tea. Movies with Anne Carter tonite - Good. Last nite Ginny here all nite. Fun! Sleepy.
1934 - Thurs. Zo exam in a.m. - a nice once I thought. Tried to study Bible in aft but felt quite rotten. Better in evening & actually studied. Bed early.

1935 - Fri. Up late. Studied Physiology in a.m. Conference with Miss Murphy this aft & she was awfully nice. Ed. studied. Dinner with Miss McElroy & talked afterwards. Wrote to Bill about Prom & am living in prayer from now on. Oh gosh di, if he could only come.
1931 - Monday. Got ex. in music. Had whole day off from school. Had a bad cold, so I didn't do anything much.

1932 - Tuesday. Snow! Wrote Chubby a note. 2 notes! He answered. He's darling. B.B. practice tonite & game mit Bellevue. We won 25-24!! Chubby made 2 fouls & 2 field goals. Keen. Peg Handy & I hoarse & crazy!

1933 - Thurs. Mrs. Wheeler again bawled us out. Studied for Hygiene & English. Shower & washed hair tonite & Betty arrived in middle of it. Good to see her. Talked & talked (Hygiene) & bed late - 'Nite.
1934 - Fri. Bible absolutely all day! I'm worried. Mary Abbey & Wowie to dinner. Danced & fooled. And then back to Bible. Milk & crackers at 9:30 & bed at 10. Fatal day demain.

1935 - Sat. Studied Education & fooled around in a.m. Ed. exam this aft & not so bad. Keown, Janet & I to movies tonite & "Evelyn Prentice" - darn good. Home & talked with Janet & then Fairbanks & then bed kind of late.
1931 - Tuesday. Boo hoo! Juniors are in second place now. Sophys beat us 33-16. I played forward & was dumb as heck (had a bad cold)
1932 - Wednesday. Note from & to Chubby! News of Bill! Wrote letter! Dresses. Read bible. Chapel - hobos. 3 tests. Bowled - movies tonite. Letters & bed late & you.

1933 - Fri. Messed around in a.m. Hygiene exam in aft. Dumb! Tonite, Ginny, Dolly, Bets & I went for walk. Ginny & I landed together. Dark path - creek - (?) Came home. Dolly, Mudge, Martha, Ann, Anne Canter, Betty, Ginny & I & Ruth Keown. Ate & had feast & played games & Ginny stayed all nite.
1934 - Sat. Bible all a.m. Exam awful this aft! Early dishes & to movies - "Right to Romance" - Ann Harding - Good & "This Day & Age." I had seen that before - part - Good. 5 below tonite!

1935 - Sun. Chemistry. Corridor breakfast. Studied. Art came at 2 & ride to Gloucester. Ate at Beverly Cove. Loads of fun & gorgeous sunset at Gloucester. (I like him a lot, di, but in comparison with Bill, I am convinced that Bill is the only one I'll ever really care for. Oh me, di!
1931 - Wednesday. Came home & monkeyed. Practiced, washed stockings. Did geometry till real late.
1932 - Thursday. School for lunch. Paper to Chubby. Detention for lateness - to gym. Debate at Leetsdale. We won 3-0. Affirmative(?) won 2-1. Horray! Hope we win tomorrow!

1933 - Sat. Fooled around in a.m. Found I got B on Ethelbert Nevin source theme! En. Comp. exam in aft. Hard, but fun! Ten of us to movies tonite. "The Conquerors" & "The Crooked Circle." Darn good! Ginny & I had fun. Martha Berg came to see me. Keen! Chubby!
1934 - Sun. Up for bekbets. Studied & fooled. Betty & I skiied after dinner. I was lousy, but wait maybe someday! I hope so. Prill & I played cards. Tried to study. Bed around 10. 'Nite!

1935 - Mon. Bill gets that letter today. Oh God - make him consider hard! Must study Chemistry now! Good old Chemistry. Studied till late aft. Tony & I got a tonic for Betty in Natick & we celebrated tonite. What fun. Chemistry & bed late.
1931 - Thursday. A late present. Jimmy asked me to the dance tonite. I nearly fell over! Great mix-up. Sally, Bill, Jimmy & I went. Fun afterwards.
1932 - Friday. Found out about Chubby & notes. Told him to win, but they lost. We (K. Kordeshick & I won debate! 100 in Trig. Movies, game & Jim Crooks tonite. S.P.K & I. Booby Car wash.
1933 - Sun. Up early - 8:45. Studied Physics, also Zoology. Brief walk in aft. Studied tonite till 9. Marion Maynard & I went skiing. Keen! More fun sitting down. Came in & ate & ate. Bed late.
1934 - Mon. Had to get down to work. Did Chemistry & Psych today. Messed around. Bad humor. Studied some more & bed.

1935 - Tues. Finished studying for Chemistry. Chemistry exam in a.m. & I messed it up nicely. It was long & hard & I was a bit rattled. Studied Physiology all aft & evening. This time tomorrow I'll be all thru studying!
1931 - Friday. Seniors beat Freshies, 13-10. Freshies should have won. Saw b.b. games at nite. Won one & lost one. Jimmy & Don sat next to S. & me. Whatta time.
1932 - Saturday. Wotta day! Town. Trunk. New Chevrolet- dark green coupe. No dance! (Am I ever disappointed) Fooled. Read. Letters etc.

1933 - Mon. Up early. Studied Zoo all morning & all aft! Whey! Tea this aft. Tonite studied some more. Ginny, Marion, Betty & I went skiing. More darn fun! Got in just at 10. (?) Bed late. Ate & ate & ate! 'Nite!

1934 - Tues. Studied all a.m. for Psych. Finished just before lunch. Exam long, but fair. Last of Mrs. Mallory. I liked her so much. Tea & did French aft & evening. (To have some job 2nd sem).A.A.(?) etc.

1935 - Wed. Physiology all a.m. & barely finished notes. Exam this aft & I had written all I knew in 1 ¾ hrs. What'll happen? Problems - Got 2 out of 5 right. Oh me. All over! Whoops! Empy Menton & I did dishes at Griggs & Johnstins Fun. Bed late.
1931 - Saturday. Slept till after 11:00. Down to Sally's in aft. Billy, Sally & Jimmy came tonite. Left at 12:00. Wally here, too.
1932 - Sunday. Up at 10. Bill came at 11:20. Left about 1:20. Cute. Wally, Mat Konkenon here. Bill J & Dan this aft. Crazy kids! Read. Wrote letters. Studied & bed rather early. Dull tonite!
1933 - Tues. Up early. Waited. Studied & fooled this a.m. Zoo exam this aft. Awful hard! Home. Rested. Got Index with me "brilliant." Grr!(?) Fixed scholarship tonite. Bath. Milk & bed early, I hope!
1934 - Wed. Studied and French exam. Nice exam & what I studied for. Studied Lit all aft & evening. What a life! Prill asked me poems & I vaguely knew them Tired & bed 10. Letter from Bill. Elated!!!

1935 - Thurs. Got up early. Tony & I to vill. Chemistry. F.E.R.A.ing for 4 ½ hrs. Then tea & packed & off to Peabody with Peanut on 5:43. Cocktails in station & then ferry etc. to Peabody. Dinner at 8. Mrs. Trask swell - also Mr. Trask. Bed about 10:30 & were we tired?
1931 - S.S. in a.m. Home & helped get lunch. AH. down for lunch & supper. Earl here. Left on 7:26 train. Tired now.
1932 - Monday. Got new Chevy! It arrived! Took a ride & I drove. Keen! To movies tonite. Not so hot. "Dance Team" at Ambridge. Awful.

1933 - Wed. Studied all day for Physics exam tomorrow. Betty & I studied out on roof for a while. Warm. Tea & Mrs. Wheeler said she liked notes on doors. Studied & fooled this evening. Washed hair & bed early.

1934 - Lit exam in a.m. Awfully good exam. Studied in aft. Tea & also Chemistry tea. Drank out of beakers etc. More fun! Miss Johnstin grand! Studied all evening till 9:30. Am going to get up at 5:45. Prill home.

1935 - Fri. And how we slept. Good old Peabody. After brunch Peanut & I walked to Danvers to see Fairbanks & Prill. Betty still pretty badly off. Peanut & I to movies at Peabody tonite. Awfully good. "Caravan." Bed late.
1931 - Monday. Got up to go to school, but couldn't. I have the grippe & am in bed for a while. Boo hoo. I missed school.
1932 - Tuesday. B.B. at Y. No other game. Am going to get Chubby's picture!! Ralph & Shirley breaking up.

1933 - Thurs. Up early. Horrible Physics test. Flunked, I'm sure! Darn! Relieved this aft. Sent laundry. Wrote letters. Dinner with Honey. Knitted & messed around. Played "Let me Call you Sweetheart" on radio & I immediately thot of Bill. Why won't he write? Darn!
1934 - Fri. Boo. About 20 below! Chemistry exam awful hard. Probably made a mess! All over! Cleaned room. To vil. Messed around. Tired. Dinner, better. Dolly read to us by fire. Bed at 9:30. Nite!

1935 - Sat. Up at about 11. What bliss! Grand breakfast. Wrapped caramels this aft & then Mr. & Mrs. Trask, Peanut & I to movies tonite in Beverley. Phillips Holmes cute. Home. Got food & bed late. What rest!
1931 - Tuesday. Feel a little better today. My sore throat & cold are still with me, tho! Did some lessons. Sally here.
1932 - Wednesday. Went to town in new Chevoy tonite & saw "Band Wagon." Keen. Bathroom fixture scene! Home late & am tired!

1933 - Fri. Up at 8:30. Messed around all morning. Wrote letters & to vil with Jane C. & Betty. Saw Ginny off at train. Keen kid. Peanut n(?) Betty went to concert tonite. I messed around & waited for Peggy. Didn't come.

1934 - Sat. Up for breakfast. To vil with Fairbanks. Packed & then off on 12:04 for Franconia, N.H. Car all to ourselves. Man so nice about helping us & talking to us! Arrived. Grand place! Ate at 9. Bed at 10 & to get up early tomorrow.

1935 - Sun. Up at 10:45. Last time! Huge breakfast. Peanut & I cleaned up. Then sat around. Read etc till dinner. Fooled around this aft & then had to leave at 7. Back to jail at 9 & gang all together again. Great tales, etc. Oh me!
1931 - Wednesday. Sat up for a while today Sally was here. Got my report. Passed everything.
1932 - Thursday. Game with Juniors. We lost 31 - 13, but lots of fun. Hazel Norton a keen guard. G.R. installation nite. Hardly anyone there. Home with Sally.

1933 - Sat. Up early. Waited. Peggy didn't come. Betty & I to Boston. "Farewell to Arms" & "Handle with Care." Ate at Schrafts. Met Honey & Bee & Janet Orr at Durgin Park's & had dinner. Waited. "Rasputin" wonderful. 3 Barrymores. Ate at Hecylers & home on 11:35.
1934 - Mon. Up. Breakfast. Philosophy - Miss Coolidge! Hard. Bill Nevin came this aft. Short talk. Left! Gym. Stiff as heck. Basketball tonite & bed early. Letters & I'm dead!

1935 - Mon. Classes once more. Education boring as Hell! German fun. New Chemistry - quant, sort of hard! Home. Fooled. Gym & then b.b. tonite & had loads of fun. Games begin next week. This time I'm on 1st team to begin with!
1931 - Thursday. My temp was up all day today. Can't find cause. I can't possibly go to school till Mon. or Tues. now.
1932 - Friday. B.B. game at Avalon with Bricky. We won but it didn't count. Home late. Read & bed.
1933 - Sun. This is the birth of Lincoln! Up late. Messed around. Skiied all aft. & evening. Betty & I conquered jumps. Fun at Tower Court. Wrote letters. Waited this a.m. Mrs. W. bawled me out!

1934 - Sun. (Sun 2/12 & Mon 2/11 are reversed here) Up early! skiied on hill & then to Kinsman. Grand trail. Skiing . Snow ploughing. Single stemming etc! Fun! Jimmy Dudley cute. Dinner. Great (?) Face! Train. Crazy people. Hunchback - Tandeville - 11:35 - Club car. Room fixed up! Bed 1!

1935 - Tues. Low in a.m. French not bad. Physiology this aft & she called me over & said I had written a good exam. I almost fainted! Vill & got gobs of junk. Valentine - 5 lbs of Dimlinge(?) from Pop 'n' Mom. German & bed early.
1931 - Friday. Had enema & temp. was down all day. Dr. Shanor here. I'll get better yet in spite of my intestines, cold, sore throat, etc.
1932 - Saturday. History in a.m. Hike (10 mi) at Frances Ferguson's this aft. Awful boys! Dinner at Nevins. Cute massa(?) - nutten boys. Games. Dance. Home late.

1933 - Mon. Went to see Miss Smith about scholarship. Hope I get one. Ate dinner with Honey. Dean Knapp here. Reports due Fri.! Brr! First classes again. Mlle. Malbot smiled & spoke. Hope I passed French.
1934 - Tues. Dobby for dinner. She's a good kid. Crazy time in Zo as usual. Hat & I silly. Miss McElroy for Bible. She's very nice & I think I shall enjoy 2nd semester Bible.

1935 - Wed. Quant. lab a mite better. Hard on one's eyes. Gym & then b.b. tonite & I took charge for last 2 periods 'cause Gertie had to go. Miss Beall's pretty swell. Games begin next week & it's too bad, this year I can't be all excited because I know. I'm getting old!
1931 - Saturday. And still a high temp!! Another enema. Sally here. I'm sleepy today! Sat up a little tonite. Hope to be better! Valentine candy from Dammuddy & Sally. Cards from Peggy & M.W.
1932 - Sunday. Bill R & Joe here after church. Bill, Dan & Ralph here. Fight at Sally's. Tea at Shirley's Home with 3 boys. Mad has hops! Bath & washed hair.

1933 - Tues. Valentine's Day! Got a box of candy from Dammuddy & 3 Valentines. Went to Personnel Bureau about job. Fixed my schedule. Saw about swimming in Spring. Chubby Cutler here for dinner. Keen!
1934 - Wed. Valentines day. Got some, also box from Dammuddy! Keeno. Tooly had food tonite. Washed hair also. Gym got me a little more unstiffened.

1935 - Thurs. Miss Murphy accosted me today with question about worms! Agora tea. Home. Wrote paper for Ed. & one for German. Bed kind of late. Valentine party tonite & everybody down on me for sending awful ones!
1931 - Sunday. Temp. still high. Enema. No school till about Thurs. or Fri. or Monday I guess. Read & slept. Dr. Shanor here. Have gland swelling now.
1932 - Monday. Went & left dresses again at Azar's. Up street & ate with Sally. To club to hear & see magician tonite. Pretty good. Lessons.
1933 - Wed. Up late. Speech & she liked my Standard diction! Wrote letters this aft & studied. Basketball tonite till 9. I was dumb as all heck! Home. Bath & bed late.

1934 - Thurs. To bank & station at noon for ticket. Studied this aft. Phil hard. Tea & dinner & studied all evening. Packed bag. Got laundry. Party in A.A. Kessler's room. Fun. Bed 10:30. Dobby for tea & stayed for dinner. Bible. Fun.

1935 - Fri. Misery of marks being so low - 2 B's & 3 C's alleviated by calling Munny & Pop tonite. They're so swell, di. I'm pretty lucky. We talked & talked & only a little over 4 weeks & I'll be seeing them.
1931 - Monday. Another gland is swollen so temp. is still high. Oh di mi! Tonite it is 101 so Aunt Hat says it'll be normal demain. I hope so!!!!!
1932 - Tuesday. Stayed in for Latin. B.B. at Y with Ruth Challis tonite. (Still no coal for furnace) Home & studied. Bed about 11 Lib Rye & I 8 in Latin test.

1933 - Thurs. Up for bekbets. Miss Hamilton read part of my exam in Eng. Dumb Physics interesting. Saw Pinx. Resolution about Bill. Letter from Sally. Studied in libe. Bad humor about waiting. Studied tonite.
1934 - Fri. Could hardly live thru classes. Left 2:48. Arrived Smith about 6. Jean & Louise Calkins & I to inn - real woody & had keen dinner. Talked & saw spinning wheel & bed 11. Read.
1935 - Sat. French & Agora job. Worked in Chem bldg this aft. Miss Woodland OK. Then found out got 66 on exam. Pretty awful. Agora Program meeting tonite. Home & bed about 11.
1931 - Tuesday. Temp. normal today. Sat up for a while in aft. & night. I hope to get up tomorrow. Glands better. Tulips from Mrs. Griffiths.
1932 - Wednesday. Got a cold. Notes from Dan. Finished Washington essay. Roller skated. Up street with Sally. Lessons, note & you tonite, ole' top.

1933 - Fri. Nervous all day. Keen Eng. Conference with Miss Hamilton. B- on Eng. exam. Mlle. Malbot praised my French. Reports at tea! Was I scared? Whewy! I could kiss Miss Heyworth - 2 B's & 4 C's! Whoops!!!!!

1934 - Sat. Up late. Breakfast at inn. Visited class in Drama. Lunch. To town. Bowled. Bridge with keen gang! Supper - 10 of us. Then skated. Churchie & El. McKenzie good. Digby & Clarky. Jean & I not so hot. Home. Talked Miss Wylie. Bed.

1935 - Sun. Up at 8:15 & washed hair. Corridor breakfast. Studied. To libe this aft. Jeanne Washburn over to tell about Chubby. Stevie Weevil & dinner prep. Dolly & I fought Janet & Keown tonite. Studied & bed early.
1931 - Wednesday. Got up & dressed in aft. Last enema. Sat around & in bed after supper. Whew! Another siege almost gone.
1932 - Thurs. Bad cold today! Told Chubby about notes. Hope it works! Up street with Sally. Stayed from G.R. tonite & bed about 11:15. Pretty good!

1933 - Sat. Awful classes. To vil & got apples this aft. Betty on bells. I knitted & sat with her. Present. Studied tonite. Feast in our room. At 10:05 Mrs. Wheeler came & bawled us out. Also radio - 1st time.

1934 - Sun. Up for breakfast. Papers read. Church at Baptist - Jean, Louise Calkins & Dottie Donhof. Dinner. Bridge. Tea. Train 5:36. Wellesley 9. Met Martha Weinberg. Nice. Marks! 2 B's - 4 C's - damn! Called Munny! Oh gosh. She & Pop so grand!

1935 - Mon. First b.b. game - with Tower tonite & great trouble. 1. I was elected captain & Kilbon was funny 2. Kilbon did all the talking 3. Criticism & nobody worked with the rest 4. We lost & everybody, especially me, played (?) 36-10 or something!!
1931 - Thursday. Got up & dressed. Down for lunch & back in bed for supper. At last I'm better. Be up all day tomorry.

1932 - Friday. Awful B.B. game. Bill Tiernan & his yelling. Lost 15 - 7 to Juniors. Two notes from Chubby! Was I happy? He came to game but was kicked! B.B. with S. tonite. We won (B-A) 35-30. Chubby 1 & 1!!
1933 - Sun. Up at 10:30. Knitted. Waited on dinner & supper. Fooled all aft. Paul Whiteman concert "Night Club" good tonite. Studied. Went to see Honey. Home. Bed early.
1934 - Mon. Classes again. Roll call in Phil. Gym this aft & plenty of work. Basketball tonite after tree-day tryout with Andy. Played with Butsch. Fun! Bed after tea with Canten.
1935 - Tues. Still feeling pretty useless. Oh well! Messed around. Dob & I having more fun in Physiology. Very interesting. Studied a mite tonite. (Making up or something)
1931 - Friday. Down all day today. Am tired tonite, but am not a bit weak. I felt fine so all of a sudden.
1932 - Saturday. In bed till 2. Washed hair. Wally here. Bill R. took me to Miller's Bay! Was I thrilled? Divine dancer! He won booby. Cigar. Jane Terry, Janet Bricky! Jim C (?)

1933 - Mon. Mlle. Malbot said she hoped I'd get an A this semester! Darling letter from Mumsie! Awful Physics lab. but I finished exp't. Off dinner. Ate with Honey & Dolly. Studied tonite. Party in K. Menton's room. G'nite.
1934 - Tues. Deep deep snow - Hard to get to classes. Tea this aft. Also studied. Bells tonite & 5 letters. Last to Bill. Oh gosh di! He's so so …. you know - G'nite!
1935 - Wed. Worked about. To gym tonite & watched 2nd team get licked by Tower II 1 - 10. A good game! Bob Boyan captain. She's a swell kid. Home & bed after a bit of French.
1931 - Saturday. First day out. Went to town 11:32. Down on 7:50. Fun up at Earl's & Eleanor's. Am tired tonite.
1932 - Sunday. Church with S.S. Bill R, Wally & Joe. Bill about "special date." Bill & Dan here. S, Joe. & I took Wally to Warrendale. Supper with S. & studied later.

1933 - Tues. Letters from Bill & John. Am I thrilled, Di! I've waited so long. He's (Bill) such a lamb! Funny blizzard. Bad humor. Not going on weekend to Smith! Basketball & better. Miss Beall brot me home. Nice. Gym & I'm stiff!

1934 - Wed. Lived thru classes. To Prill's on 3:44. Got there about 6. Their home is awfully nice! Grand dinner. Cobby for dinner. Movies "Design for Living." So cute! Also "Should Ladies Behave." Crowd of girls came. Cobby so nice. Bed 12:30!
1935 - Thurs. More Physiology & French. Messed around & studied & can't wait for weekend to get to some work. Hope to go to New York some weekend soon.
1931 - Sunday. S.S. again. Jimmy was awful. Didn't speak to me. Went for ride in aft. Washed hair & bed early. Finished "Pickwick Papers."
1932 - Monday. 2 notes to Chubby & 1 in return. He's darling! Got out early, to Pitts with S. Home with Sally & studied later. Sally at piano.

1933 - Wed. Up late. Breakfast at "Maples" with Bets. Studied this a.m. Ride on bicycles with Dolly, Betts & Ginny - Sabrina farms. Caves, etc. Art Keown came tonite. He is darling! Fun. Messed around & bed late.

1934 - Thurs. Up late. Keen bekbets. Snow shoed to their school. Gang nice! Home. Snow more. Read. Melvin & 2 boys came. Grand fun. Huge dinner. Talked. Left 5:30. Movies at Met "Good Dame" - not so hot. Home 11:55 Dead!

1935 - Fri. How I get behind on you, di, when I'm at college! What is the trouble? Nothing interesting ever happens, or so it would seem. I study & go to damn classes, work, clean up room & sleep & eat - great life. Wish I were home!
1931 - Monday. Heck - School again. Play practice. Jimmy said 0 about him, so I guess he didn't mean anything.
1932 - Tuesday. Latin in aft. Note to Joe Cook & others. B.B. game at Cory with Peg Handy. Chubby 5 f.g's & 2 fouls! Thrills! Smiled! To Pharmacy for Peg to see Geo. Sheldon. Home.

1933 - Thurs. Up late. Took bike to be fixed. Miss Willis here for dinner. John Masefield & his poetry tonite. Awfully good. Studied a little. French Conference. Mlle Malbot sweet. Hopes for an A. Me too! Doggone. Woof.
1934 - Fri. Tired! Classes, also conference with Miss Wood. She is a peach. To Honey's for dinner. Fun! Home - Fooled & had tea at 8:30 & bed early.

1935 - Sat. Spent all aft. at Chemistry lab & FERA. Got a pile of books from libe & then Stevie called tonite & wanted me to go on snow train. Decided to. Got junk together & bed at 8:30. Oh me! I haven't done a lesson, but who cares?
1931 - Tuesday. Play practice again. I know my part. I played one half of the game with Sophomores. They won 44 - 16 or something like that.
1932 - Wednesday. Note to & from Joe Cook. Cute. Notes & notes! Sundae with S. Home & "Hotcha" tonite. Home late. Chubby only smiled but not a word today. Peeved - Joe C.

1933 - Fri. Up at 7:05. Conference with Mrs. Hobbs. Awfully nice - C in exam. Crazy gym. To Noanneth for supper & had a nice time with Franny & Marion. Fire Drill tonite. Giggles because we (Dolly & I) went around before & told everyone.

1934 - Sat. Lab. Movies ("By Candlelight" "Fugitive Lovers") then aft with Dobby & Andy. Natick. Dobby for supper! Saw Seniors off to Prom. Fixed beds, Fairbanks & I. Letters. Messed around. Bed early. I hope.

1935 - Sun. Up at 5:45. Sore throat -but. Terry & I off in ski outfits - Dempy & Stevie - Snow train to Mt. Monadnock. Wotta day - More darn fun. Incident of truck & man & me nearly falling off. I'll never live it down. Home late & bed late - Grand time.
1931 - Wednesday. Play practice again. It comes off tomorry. I hope it'll be o.k.
1932 - Thursday. Led chapel today. Laffed at J. Cook, Sally & Chubby. (He wouldn't speak) G.R. dinner with S. tonite. Crazy Bengy & Ferguson! Sally here all nite. G'nite! Eng. after school.
1933 - Sat. Betty sick in bed. Mrs. Wheeler perfectly nasty! Dr. DeKruif came & Betty better. Party for Dolly (18) tonite. Ginny & Betty & I bought cake. Surprised her! Bed late after loads of fun!
1934 - Sun. Up for breakfast. Studied. Chapel. Waited dinner. Studied this aft. Off supper. Fooled & studied tonite.

1935 - Mon. A real cold; tho I hope 'twill leave. Cut Education & did German. Lab this aft & I left early. Gym & afterwards felt better. Played Hill tonite & due to Kilbon & the rest of the team, we won - a swell game. Gosh, di - I've got to get on my horse. Kilbon & I up for Head - One more thing di!
1931 - Thursday. Well, we gave our program. Room 205 - Miss Hubbells. I was Mrs. Crandon in play. Jim Fullman & Bill Jetter were peachy.
1932 - Friday. Chubby wouldn't even look at me till at the program tonite! & then only a look! S & coffee ice cream for dinner. History in aft. Do I like Chubby? Oh me!

1933 - Sun. Up late. Studied all morning. Fooled around till time of Sally Supplee's recital. Keen! Went with Ginny. Came home to horrid writing. Messed around tonite & bed early. Read "La Chevre d'Or."
1934 - Mon. Studied in a.m. Gym this aft. B.B. tonite & Butsch & I worked best yet. Soon games to start. Oh me!

1935 - Tues. Dob & I had great trouble in Physiology. My cold was lousy & I nearly died. Pilk(?) all day. To vill in (?) for food for Agora etc. Miss Murphy for dinner. A few remarks & I also felt lousy. Bed right after dinner & slept like a rock.
1931 - Friday. Went with Dan to party given by Miss Bloomfields room. We danced a hot different dance. Sally, Jimmy & Bill were also there.

1932 - Saturday. Up late. Peg Handy & school & Dan, Ralph & Bill. Cory. Gingerale etc. Wally, Joe L, Irwin Sheesley, Bill R, all here. Game with Aliquippa. Won 48-20. Party at Bricky's with Jim. Ride (?) & home. Damit!

1933 - Mon. Physics lab. Took pictures in gorgeous snow. Was tired tonite & got to bed before 9. Knitted & went to vil in aft. Saw Art Keown again. Betty & I whooped it up as everyone went to see Mary Wigman.
1934 - Tues. Hard day. Studied after French in libe. Plato lecture - Dinner. Studied all evening. Snow has ceased - about 2 feet deep.

1935 - Wed. Messy work in Chemistry. Cold better. To b.b. tonite & timed. Tower I won as well as our second team - Swell. We've won 2 & lost 2 & are tied for 2nd place. We still have a chance tho slim. I have not much for head, I think!
1931 - Saturday. Got up late. Went to Harbesons for sewing junk & lunch. Went to town in car with A.H. Went to Smiths.
1932 - Sunday. Church with S. Bill R, Wally, Irwin, Joe here. In aft, also, Bill J, Dan, Ralph Miller & Eddie! Whew! Warrendale in Sally's car. Supper at Smarts. Home & study.

1933 - Tues. Conference with Miss Heyworth. Very encouraging. Snow carnival this aft. Seniors 10, '36 9! Tobogganed. Basketball tonite & I never was lousier. Dobby nice, but I was awful. Miss Beall brought us home.
1934 - Wed. Chapel in a.m. To b.b. tonite & played with Butsch. More fun but hard guards. Studied as usual & bed early. Studied for Zo quiz tomorrow.

1935 - Thurs. Wrote letters to Munny & John about N.Y. Fun in Physiology & got something done. Sold tickets to Dance Drama. Did German & bed early. I have Spring fever already! Major nominees announced & I've missed out on H.H. but I still have other aspirations, di!
1932 - Mon. Only one in this book! Munny bowled; so I went to Sally's. Studied. Note. Stayed all nite. Am to think of Sally 4 years from now! Chubby wouldn't even speak. Fooey!
1931 - Sunday. Went to S.S. & church at nite. Sally came up in afternoon. We talked things over.
1932 - Tues. Invited Chubby to Leap Year dance, but he is going to be in a b.b. game on 18th. Got a cute note & we are no longer on outs? Whoops! Game after school with Sophs. Won 28-21 (18 pts.)

1933 - Wed. Awful oral French test. Got B. Saw "Strange Interlude" again this aft. Keen. Miss Coe here for dinner. I ate with them. Wrote lousy theme tonight. Ate up in Ruth Keown's room. Bed late - G'nite.
1934 - Thurs. Laundry came. Bulletin - oh me. Andy & I answered letter. Said Rabbit, Rabbit. Bible this aft. Then libe. Home. Tea. News. Studied. Studied all evening. Bed late.
1935 - Fri. Forgot to say Rabbit, Rabbit. Dob & I worked in lab in Chem after class & then Physiology lab till 5:45. Back to Zo libe tonite & wrote up expts. More damn fun! Bed early.
1931 - Monday. Had music lesson. Got very good. Made up French in Activity period.
1932 - Wed. Note to & from Chubby - long! Town with Munny in aft. Bot a hat! Home - drove Chevy. Sally got her hair cut. Looks keen. Don & Bill full of nasty cracks. Studied tonite.
1933 - Thurs. Handed in lousy theme. Eng. Conference this aft. & she was nice. Ate dinner with Honey. Great kid. Studied tonite & fooled - G'nite!

1934 - Fri. Up & to chapel. Cut Bible this aft & went to vill with Prill. Slushy. Made up in gym. Attempted Alliance Francaise. More fun! Helped with dishes. Saw Mlle Malbot. Talked. Bed late. Dobby's for dinner.

1935 - Sat. Worked. Gym in aft & did bicycle work for O2 debt expt for Naomi White. Fun. Early supper & on long bells. Art came & I had a few words with him! Almost like him a lot, di. What the heck. Peanut & I to Natick & a little celebration at 10 - Betty Tony, Dolly, P.?
1931 - Tuesday. Stayed in for lab until five. I made up one experiment & finished one other.

1932 - Thursday. Note to & from Chubby. "Love." Stayed in for Eng. Waved to Joe Cook & Chubby! Roller skated tonite - S.S., R. Challis & Peg Handy. Faculty game. Won 30-25. Chubby made 13 points! Ride with Don & Ralph & home at 10:10!
1933 - Fri. Betty's birthday. Gave her box of paper. She was sick in aft & so I cut gym. Little supper party. Surprise party for her tonite & was it grand? More darn fun & bed real late!
1934 - Sat. Lab. Studied & fooled this aft. Boston on 4:58. Fairbanks & I to Russian Bear. (Prill & I gave her corsage). To movies "It Happened One Night." Clark Gable & Claudette Colbert. Good!

1935 - Sun. Up late. Grand day. Birthday breakfast for Fairbanks. Studied etc. To libe in aft to do French & then Agora for dinner. Home & read & wrote letters. Bed early after a little celebration in my room - Tony, Betty, Peanut & Dolly.
1931 - Wednesday. Got out at 3:45 & Juniors beat the Seniors, but I've forgotten the score. Ruth Challis & I go well together.
1932 - Friday. Read Bible. Note to & from Chubby. "Loads of love" Don trying to break it up! B.B. game at 4. I was captain. We won hugely. Movies & Chocolate shop with J. Crooks. "Flying High."

1933 - Sat. Awful classes. Ruth Keown, Betty, Dolly & I shopped in aft. Tonite, Ginny & Betty & I went to Riding Club circus. Keeno! Awfully cold. Ginny came in & we ate till late & bed! Banks closed for time. Roosevelt inaugurated. Listened over radio. Good.
1934 - Sun. Up late. Got my bekbets. Studied. Miss Clarke for dinner. Studied. Tea in Ann Coyle's room. Miss Hawk & Miss McCarthy. Fun! Waited supper. Weekend bells. Feed for Fairbanks' birthday.
1935 - Mon. Our 2nd team lost tonite & so we shall probably tie for 2nd place. Tough. But who cares? I timed. Kilbon there & a few remarks. Dumb Education. Why didn't I drop it?
1931 - Thursday. Don't know what I did today & really don't care much.
1932 - Sat. Up late. To town with Sally. Her house for supper. Movies. Football - good. Home to S's & Wally & Joe down. Cards. Home 11 & bed. No word from Chubby!
1933 - Sun. Up late. Studied & fooled in a.m. Wrote theme this aft. Ate supper with Dolly. To Young People's & Dr. Weston spoke. Keen! Said nice things about Peggy. Home. Studied. Bed early.
1934 - Mon. To vil this aft & hair cut & Dammuddy's present. Gym - Letters. Sat with gang at dinner. B.B. tonite. Hill vs. Vill. 1st Score 19-18. Played about 2 minutes! Home. Fooled. Bed 10:30
1935 - Tuesday. Another day. Signed up for oral Physiology quiz next Tues. To vil with Dob. Met Tony & we shopped. Food for Agora & tea. Home. Studied hard etc.
1931 - Friday. I reiterate yesterday's statement.

1932 - Sun. Snow! No church. Bill, Wally & Joe here. Bill & I talked! Sled-riding & skiing at Rea's today. Don tried to be nice. Bill there! Shirley, Sally, Wally, Joe. Sally left. Supper & lessons late.
1933 - Mon. Awful cold & cut morning classes. Stayed in bed. However I went to lab this aft with a rag on my neck. Better tonite. Studied Zoo. all evening. Bed early.
1934 - Tues. Second team game tonite. We tied the Vill 25-25. Broke my glasses in the rumpus! Oh dear. Sort of tired after many classes & then B.B. G'nite, di - 2 weeks from Fri!!!

1935 - Wed. Day of days - a perfect one. Letter from Bill & he really wants to come to Prom, di! Conquered back vault on buck. B.B. game with Vill tonite & we won 29-18. I played better tonite. It's about time. Last game, di! It's sort of sad! Miss Woodland for dinner with N.P. & me!
1931 - Saturday. Got cutest evening dress at McCreery's. Also got girdle, tennis shoes, slippers, & bras. Went to Smiths Party at Don's. Got booby!

1932 - Mon. 2 notes apiece with Chubby. He' got Chubil(?) now! School for lunch. Wore Joe Shannon's Varsity S sweater & created a sensation! Oh me! It was keen. Hair cut & movies tonite "Union Depot."
1933 - Tues. Up & waited on breakfast. Got C in Eng. theme. Blah! Zoo quiz this aft. Gym & my sore throat got worse. Rain. Went to Dr. de Kruifs. I weigh 154. Oh dear. Bed at 8:30 tonite.
1934 - Wed. Gym & basketball tonite against guard firsts. Norma sprained her ankle & I played. Loads of fun. We held them till the last quarter. Polly & I worked better together.

1935 - Thurs. Quiz on apparatus in Physiology today. Dob & I O.K. Did Chemistry problems & then we went to Agora tea & had remnants. No dinner. Art Keown in for a min. He took N.P & me to Alumnae & Keown on, too. Di, I like him very much.
1931 - Sunday. Went to S.S. & church at night. No - we went to Mrs. Smith's. She's sick from a fall off a chair.
1932 - Tues. Keen day! Notes. Chubby 1 each. Called him up after Latin. Met him tonite when Peg A, Libby, K. Neely & I sled rode. Darling! He's cute & dressed cutely, too. Have I fallen!? I ask you.
1933 - Wed. Slept in a.m. Waited both lunches. Fooled all afternoon. Letter from Munny & Challis. Cold & sore throat. Banks still closed. Queer situation. Party for Eaton tonite.
1934 - Thurs. Home after Bible to bells. Tea. Interesting zo. study of eye - really good! Dinner & studied all evening. Bed late.

1935 - Fri. No lab today, but whole afternoon spent on Physiology. Ushered at Dance Drama tonite. Loads of fun. Then sat with Peanut. Dances keen - especially Alice Masting(?) as a hitchhiker. Bed late.
1931 - Monday. Got excellent in music. Tennis club. I joined, I hope I can get a letter, but it is doubtful. (No hope - May 19!)
1932 - Wed. Note to & from Chubby - a little 1. Game with Freshies this aft. We won 34-10. I made 20 points. Washed hair & bed early tonite. Wanted to sled-ride, but couldn't.
1933 - Thurs. Banks still closed. Cold still bad but throat better. Paper in Eng. One back. Meiosis in Zoo. this aft. Came home slept. Studied & bed early tonite.

1934 - Fri. Classes finally over! Studied. Dobby, Hat, Eunice & I to vil. Met Prill. Bought food. Big fun tonite! Peggy came in the midst! About 50 people, all in Prill's room. Bed finally - dead tired. Frances Martin for dinner.

1935 - Cut French etc & wrote up Physiology experiment & handed in at 10:30. Vill & hair cut with Fairbanks. Her first long walk. Slept. To Miss Griggs' with N.P Menton & we had to serve. Not so hot. I made many mistakes. Dammuddy's birthday. She would have been 82!
1931 - Tuesday. Stayed in detention and made up Physics. Saw Freshies beat Seniors 14-10 or 16-12. Too bad for Seniors. Sally's for supper & orchestra contest. S.H.S. lost.

1932 - Thurs. Notes - Chubby. Mad! Chubil back. Was elected pres. of Literary Club. English C.B. G Reserves tonite & then skiied with Ethel Chubb & Ruth Challis. Met Mr. & Mrs. Chubb. Awfully nice! Joe Cook mad.
1933 - Fri. Zoo. cut this aft. Grand lecture at 4:45. Late for dinner. Mess about waiting. Awful cold! Studied like the dickens tonite. Post card from Munny. Another week almost gone!

1934 - Lab awful! Studied in aft. Honey Bee, Peggy & I to Boston with Mr. Heiners & met Nadine. Seville & met "Death Takes a Holiday" Fredric March - awful good. Home 11:35. Bed - tired. Carol Tyler in accident - not hurt.

1935 - Sun. Up at 8:20. Corridor breakfast. Fun. Studied & cleaned room. Dinner. Steve here. To libe & studied French. Agora for supper. Lady from India very interesting. English. Studied for Physiology quiz in Prill's room.
1931 - Wednesday. Sally, A.H. & I went to Stanley & saw "East Lynne." I wept buckets but Sally wept bucketers. She stayed for supper.
1932 - Friday. Chubby mad. No note! Refereed Junior - Soph game. Keen, but I was rotten. Game at Y tonite. They teased me for my "knee guards." We won 29-18. Studied.

1933 - Sat. Awful classes. Messed in aft. till tea dance. Keeno. Fell for Art again. He's darling! Bill Dyson nice & Marvy dancer! Supper. Plays. Dance at Tower & Art asked why I hadn't danced oftener. Keen time. Bed late!
1934 - Sun. Up for bekbets. Over to Pom. Peggy & I to Westons. Then to town. Goodbyes! Lib this aft. Waited on supper. Studied. Washed hair. Bed 10. Prill not back.

1935 - Mon. Major officers announced this aft! Butsch is A.A. Pres.!! Whoops - then Schoenfuss, C.G. Seeley - S.C. Williamson - Barn Bus. Bd, Chapman - Barn Pres.., Phyl Baker - Chm Hs. Pres. Do Vilbiss - C.A. Brownell - News etc. Great excitement & we're almost Seniors!!!
1931 - Thursday. Stayed for a while after school & made up English. G.R. & saw a debate part tonight. Bed early.
1932 - Sat. Up early & to History House. Studied. Town & saw Aunt Hat. Home. Set hair. Party tonite at Shannons with Wally, Jim Crooks nice kid. Dan awful! Dirt & more dirt!

1933 - Sun. Up late. Church with gang. To Noannett for dinner. Lib Crampton, Pinx, Dig, Marion Schoenfuss, her sister Franny, Helen Wadsworth came here & danced in aft. Tea at Inn. Keeno! To Satten Grill. Home. Fooled & bed.
1934 - Mon. Basketball at 7:00 against Quad 2nd team. We clicked tonite & beat em by a good score. They made me stop playing at end of 3rd quarter. Good but I love to play with Butsch.
1935 - Tues. Prill & I were discussing offices tonite when in walked Ginny Kilburn & asked me to be head of props next year & di, I accepted. Oh me! T'will be hard, but so much fun!
1931 - Friday. A lucky day for the Juniors! We beat Freshmen 44-23. Hot game. Ruth Challis & I had a grand time at forward.
1932 - Sun. Overslept. No church. Bill here. Talk. Daddy called. S.S., Jim F., Joe & Wally here. Wally to Warrendale. Joe & records. Honked at Chubby at Bakers. Darn! He saw me with Joe! He was cute!

1933 - Mon. Mlle. Malbot told me I was sleeping! Awful Physics lab. Franny for dinner! B.B. games, 2nd teams - Tower & Vil. I played 3 quarters with Hollands. She's keen. We won 32-31. Libe & home & bed!
1934 - Tues. Doggone. They wouldn't let me play on the 2nd team. I just had to watch. Vill - Tower & we lost 28-19, but they were in there fighting, especially at the last.
1935 - Wed. In aft. great doings with Caroline Riley about Miss Salditt. She came for dinner & German was spoken. Fun! Messed around & studied later. Bed late.
1931 - Saturday. Got up early as usual on Sat. Went to town. Shoeshine. Mrs. Smith better. Am tired now & have another cold.

1932 - Monday. More dirt about Dan etc. Chubby & Joe look both mad. Chubby not at school. Tests again. Sally & I fooled in aft. Present & no Jun. - Sen. game this week! Movies "Lovers Courageous" Robert Montgomery. Cute!

1933 - Tues. Got zoo tests back C+. Goshee! Lectures on Heredity good! Passed 3 more tests in gym. Asked to be on apparatus team but will not be here. Darn! Dinner with Ginny & Jane Beyer. Betty cuts tonight!(?)

1934 - Wed. Miss Murphy for dinner. I ate with Steve. B.B. game at 8:30 with Tower. Swell game. Best one I've ever played in. We won 28-10 & again that juggle. I nearly fainted. Last game - darn! Won 2 lost 3 tied 1.

1935 - Thurs. Classes over & to gym meet. I was scared. Went off O.K & oh di! I'm so thrilled! I made Varsity, got a W!! & am new Head of B.B. Almost all of my ambitions realized now! Oh, it's so exciting! 2 quizzes & N.Y. tomorrow & am I tired?!
1931 - Sunday. Went to S.S. & Church at night. Sally was over in aft. & we got Civil War stuff together.
1932 - Tuesday. Rode around with Sally! Basket ball practice at Y. tonite. Handy, Challis & I planned for Thurs & Fri. Izzy Clark still writing cute notes. Chubby cool!
1933 - Wed. Worked & studied & made up gym. Ginny can't go home! Oh! It's sad! I'm so mad! Studied in libe. Wrote lousy theme. Felt oogy tonite. Wrote letters. Bed late. Nite.
1934 - Thurs. Right after Bible collected props & over to Barn for rehearsal. Helped make noises - more fun. Studied tonite. Legs hurt. Bed late.

1935 - Fri. Only 2 quizzes & a paper & then Peanut & I off to the great city. Arrived at 11 & complications about bus stop. Went to Waldorf & got ready for bed & then John & Louis called. They came up & we had a grand party till 4 am. More darn fun. Such is life! ROOM SERVICE, PLEASE!!!
1931 - Monday. Tennis club meeting after school. Changed music lesson day. Had hair washed tonite. 3 tests tomorrow.
1932 - Wednesday. Asked Chubby for sweater - cool! Game at New Brighton tonite. Center. Lost 28-23. Good game. I was captain. Peg & I with Miss Roy, etc.
1933 - Thurs. Sick in a.m. Got up for Zoo. tho since I don't know anything. Home & studied & bed right after dinner, feeling rotten again. Hot water bottle, hot, but better. 'Nite.
1934 - Fri. Right after Bible, went to Alum & worked till 10:30 tonite. What a life. I love it. More darn fun. Actors from Harvard - good - in plays that is. Ruth Lorish awful good.

1935 - Sat. Up at 9. Peggy came. Swell to see her. Hair all cut. 5 of us breakfast - special in room & then out. Parade - Radio City Music Hall "Roberta" - Nifty. Hotel. Drinks. Casino de Paree - dinner & show - gaudy, but good. Left Peggy - party in room till 3!
1931 - Tuesday. Had French, geometry, health tests. Got 90 in geometry. Smarts treated me. Home at 5:00. Practiced. Church tonite - good! Read till late.
1932 - Thursday. School for lunch. Green socks! 4 of us - Isabell Clark, Challis, Handy! Chubby & Joe Cook in Sally's car after English! "Arrowsmith" with Sally & Challis. Keeno!
1933 - Fri. Awful Zoo. roll call. Gym & I got another check. To Chubby Cutler's for dinner & had keen time. Home & studied all evening for Physics quiz. Bed late after reading. Cold better.
1934 - Sat. Lab & took John Gifford to in. Was I dumb? Fooled all aft. Barn at 6 & play "Holiday" was swell! Home & bed about 1:30.

1935 - Sun. Up late. John & Louis late, but barely had time for breakfast & then off on (?) to a flying start. John was swell, di. He's so nice sometimes. I guess we get along pretty well when there aren't the Sewickley differences to think about!
1931 - Wednesday. Got A in French test I took hier. Miss Kerr read my theme in class. Got excellent in music. Relative Affair at Booths tonite.
1932 - Friday. Varsity S sweater to school. 4 of us. I had Chubby's! Smiled! Fooled in aft. Dance at school tonite with Jim. Crooks. Gang to Chocolate Shop & home about 1. Keen - except!
1933 - Sat. Awful classes along with Physics quiz. D- uga! On bells this aft. & read "The Idiot." Off dinner & sat with Ginny. Laughed. Read & wrote letters tonite & bed early - for a change.
1934 - Sun. Up for breakfast. Studied Phil in a.m. Dinner with Skippy at Tower. Wrote Lit all aft & supper at Dobby's. We studied Bible all evening. Cute kittens! Home 9:30 & bed!

1935 - Mon. Oh me! Sore throat & after effects of a swell weekend. Classes brot us down to earth again! Such is life. Had to study a lot. Slept after Chem lab. Wintry weather again after a mild spell! Almost time to go home!!!
1931 - Thursday. Got candy etc. right after school. Took Aunt Hat a snicker. Studied & fooled tonite. Bed kind of late.
1932 - Saturday. Up to oculist. Eyes O.K. Shopped. Home. Roller skated - Peg Handy, Alice Miller. Y & lost in game tonite. Wally, Joe & Peg down. Down to Sally's & she came overnite.
1933 - Sun. Up late. Read "The Idiot" all morning & partly in the aft. Studied & read in aft & all evening. Also wrote a couple of letters. Dull studying! Bed early tonite. 'Nite!
1934 - Mon. Quiz in Phil. Paper in Lit, Roll Call in Chem. Oh me! Thru primaries(?) & am up for Tres. A.A. Surprised! Tree day meeting tonite & (?) back Tooly's grill. Studied for dear life!

1935 - Tues. Not so bad French. Physiology & Miss Murphy wants me to take Metabolism next year. Hope I can! Minor officers announced. A lot from our house. Studied tonite & bed late. Cold still with me! Popsie called tonite from Boston but couldn't get out.
1931 - Friday. Oh diary!!! I can't believe it! Aunt Hat has gone! Oh dear. She & Mother at supper. Oh! It's awful, diary! I hope she'll come back.
1932 - Sunday. Church with Sally. Bill, Wally & Joe here. Up to see Mary Wells. Walk with Peg Handy. Jim Fullman drove us. Home. Washed stockings & studied.

1933 - Mon. Betty got sick & went to Infirmary. Tough. Awful rain. Lousy Physics lab. Basketball tonite & we won. Played whole game. Notes to Betty but I couldn't see her. Saw her at noon. Read Idiot till late.

1934 - Tues. Bible quiz & called on for oral work in French! Took bulletin to Miss Moody. Saw D. Bergin. Home. Slept. Waited on supper. Studied tonite. Bed late. Washed hair. Fire drill. Honor's Day. Dr. Shapley fine speaker.

1935 - Wed. Ginny Kilburn pinned a rose on me & I'm now Head of Props for next year - a hard job, but it'll be fun. (?) B+ on Ed paper. Messed around. Tried to work! Spring! Home tomorrow - I can't wait!
1931 - Saturday. Hectic nite last night. Oh I'm lonely! Down at Sally's a lot today. Supper there. Fun at dance at Billy Penn's given by Joe Horne.
1932 - Mon. Mary Wells here in aft. Also Bill R.(!) Wally & Joe. Darn! I never saw Bill alone! Talked & up to see M.W. Studied & bed.

1933 - Tues. Awful Zoo quiz. had to read my theme in class. Hemmy liked it. Tried to see Bets 3 times. The 3rd time was the charm. She is better. I waited for Mudge tonite. Talked & studied & read late.

1934 - Wed. Last real gym & I wasn't there. Went to see who got what offices & Kitty Menton got ours. Tough, but she's better. Peanut V.P of A.A. Swell! Andy & I raised Cain tonite, especially at dinner!

1935 - Thur. Corsage from Prill & I was all elated. French & then packed & finally Physiology & I left right after. Prill & I off to home at last. Pinx & Ginny Rose & Libby Entrikan (?) & I played games & talked. Bed, finally & can't wait till demain!!
1931 - Sunday. Got up late. Went to see Aunt Hat. Golly how I miss her, now I'm home. She certainly was good to me!
1932 - Tues. Game with Juniors. Darn! Lost chance of letters 28-15. I made 14 pts. B.B. practice at Y & for swim after. Went to Emery's et c'est tout. Tired!
1933 - Wed. Betty came home from Infirmary. She's better. Supposed to go to b.b. but didn't. They won & Vil won whole tourney. Did Physics problems tonite & bed late.

1934 - Thurs. Gym meet this aft & Sophs came in last. Butschy tied for 1st place. I'm so thrilled! I made the Varsity B.B. team - first one (& probably only one) (No! Nov. 2, 1935 - Made 3 more! - 4 more - Mar. 23) Packed tonite & studied in libe & bed late!

1935 - Fri. Prill & I home!! New Ford!! Munny grand!! Bill came at 8 & was here long time. Took Prill & me for drive. Talked about Prom. Munny wunderful! Town with Prill, left her. Home. Tired tonite. Sat & chatted with Mom. Great fun to be home once again!!!
1931 - Monday. School again. Went roller skating with Sally. Saw "The Great Meadow" with Sally & Mother tonite. Am tired now! Night.
1932 - Wed. Reports, not on Honor Roll. Note to Chubby, but no answer! Packed etc. but may not go. To movies with Mary Wells. Jean Harlow in "3 Wise Girls." Bed late.
1933 - Thurs. Miss Hamilton funny in English. Zoo lecture wonderful this aft. Home & read & fooled. To vil & bot stuff. Cute letter from John. Ginny & I will go next Friday with John! Whoops!

1934 - Fri. Barely lived thru classes. Prill gave me corsage of gardenias! Left on 2:03. Franny, Bernice Steinberg, Eddy & I played bridge. Dinner early & to bed at 8:10. Could hardly sleep! I'm so excited!

1935 - Sat. Up at 9:15. Bill came as I ate breakfast. Stayed all a.m. We set up ping pong table & played. Babs & I for short ride. Back. Bill here. Stayed till past 6, but nothing has happened yet di. But he wants to come to Prom & I'm so glad! Babs, Cousin Wally, Joey & I bridged & fooled. Pop home today.
1931 - My eyes hurt tonite. Stayed home with Munny & studied. She interviewed 5 cooks. Bed late tonite.
1932 - Thurs. Got up & left on trip to Carlisle & Yale in Chevy! Keen! Miss Chubby. No snow in mountains! Arrived at about 3:30. Dammuddy's - talked & bed at Argonne.

1933 - Fri. Cut Speech - whoops! Letter from Munny. Queer about next Fri./Sat. 2 more checks in gym. Another keen Zoo lecture. Started my source theme tonite on "The Idiot." Hope I can do it. Bed late.

1934 - Sat. Home again! Oh! I love it! Mom 'n Pop met me & it was swell! Bill came in a.m. & he's swell as ever. Oh di, if I could only let him know! Wine swell. Wally, Babs, Joey & I to movies in Ambridge. "Moulin Rogue? Good.

1935 - Sun. Day started out swell! Got Prill & Bill & Wally down here for dinner. Took Wally & Babs with us to Slippery Rock & then Prill began. Oh di!! How can a friend do such a thing to me? Bill would do it to any girl & Prill deliberately tried to make him & did. Honestly, di, I have never been so hurt in all my life. What's the use of living? I seen none!
1931 - Wednesday. Inaugurated new cook - Edna. She's awfully nice. Treated with Sally this aft. Music lesson - "Very good."
1932 - Friday. Up late. Breakfast. Dammuddy's Dinner at Johnson's. Ride with Aunt Nellie & to Home. Talked with Dammuddy. Movies "After Tomorrow" - Argonne & bed!

1933 - Sat. Awful classes, especially Physics. Conf. with Miss Hamilton this aft. She was awfully nice. Box (?) To vil in aft & messed around. Studied tonite. Ginny & I went down to the Hole (?) Bed at 10:30.

1934 - Sun. Up late. Bill came after church. I messed up walking bigness (?) Damn me! Jim here. To Babs' - Supper & we took Wally to Warrendale. Back to Babs'. Munny called. Home. Bill here. Grapefruit. Talked. Bed 10:30.

1935 - Mon. Up & to dentist & left Prill. I can't help thinking every minute of those 2 blows yesterday. It's tough to be disillusioned! But things changed like a flash. Bill took me to movies. "The Scarlet Pimpernel." Leslie Howard, tonite & then after eating we came home & sat till after 7! Wonderful. He thinks & dreams of me. Just like I do of him. Everything is O.K. now!!
1931 - Thursday. Hooked out of school this aft & went to town & saw "Connecticut Yankee" with Mrs. Harbison & S.S. Class. Home & back & met John. I'm so glad he' home! Bed late.
1932 - Sat. Up at 6:30 & drove to Yale. Keen! John at Taft Hotel. Talked. Dinner. Cous. Marguerite's. Back & bed rather late. Bear Mt. Bridge. Mother kidding etc.
1933 - Sun. Up for breakfast. Wrote theme most all day. Studied other things also. Ate supper with the gentry. Betty Congleton read plays & poetry to us till 8. More fun. Studied & bed late.

1934 - Mon. Up at 5:30. Took Pop to Youngstown. Munny & I to town & bot me clothes. Saw Barbara Donnell I like her! Duquesne Club. Bill here - had been - long time! Hair cut & he left! Pinx's tonite for bridge. Franny, Polly. Everything is just so perfect with Bill.

1935 - Tues. Up at 10:30 after a wunnerful nite. Went all around in a.m. Didn't expect Bill but he came at lunch & was with me all aft. We drove all around putting on mileage. "Dodsworth" tonite with Prill & Babs. Good - I hope!! Swell! Home after eating at Stouffers & I dreamt of Bill. O gosh, di.
1931 - Friday. Funny experience with Miss Hubbell & excuse. Oh dear! Saw "Reaching for the Moon" with Sally tonite. Good!
1932 - Sun. Up early. Breakfast with John. Drove - West Rock - Dinner - Cuthbertsons. Cous. Marguerite, Miss Leech - Tea at medical college. John's room. H. Brightwell - John Kenney's - Movies. Bed!

1933 - Mon. Lovely day. Broke pedal on bike. Out of Physics lab early. Home & worked. Conference with Miss Hobgood. Copied theme & wrote letter to Isabell tonite. Closets cleaned. Washed hair. Bed late.
