1934 - Tues. To oculist & left eye changed. Darn! Bandbox(?) for dresses! To Bab's in aft. Terry, Sarah & I - Bridge. Bill here at dinner-time - Look(?) Oh gosh, di, I wish he'd say the work! To movies "All of Me" with Jim. Ate at "Mill." Ride. Home. Grapefruit. John Keeney in!

1935 - Wed. Prill & I up early. Tore about getting punch for party. Bill here for a while at noon. Prill & I put mileage on car. Charlotte, Babs, Joey, Jim F, Prill, B. Nevin, Bill to party & fun & then Bill & Prill went off & talked. I guess Bostonians love to see how many other people's men they can Make, but I didn’t feel so badly this time. I don't like people to meddle in my affairs, but I guess it's my fault for confiding in Prill!!
1931 - Saturday. Got up late & worked. Town about 2. Stayed with Aunt Hat till 8:15 or earlier. John drove both ways. Rained.
1932 - Mon. Up at 6:30 & Good-bye Yale! Flood, cloud burst, snow, sunshine. Carlisle about 6. I drove heaps! Keen man at lunch! Nice. Dammuddy & Aunt Nellie's & bed early.
1933 - Tues. Another good zoo lecture. Embryology. "Tilly." Handed in source theme. Slept late. Beds undone etc. 2 checks in gym. Last one. I had 29 checks or B. No news about Friday!

1934 - Wed. Up late. No call from Jane. Worked. Louis & Jack Denny here this aft. Bill came but was awful cool or something. Stayed home with Munny tonite & listened to Guy etc. Bed early. Contented feeling!

1935 - Thurs. Up at 9:15 & to hairdresser's. Bill here when I got back. He & Prill 'n' Mom 'n' I sat & lunch & then photographers came. Awful pictures. Bill & I drove Prill to her sisters & then back. He's so grand, di - each time he's better! I told Munny everything & she & I together tonite. A wonderful vacation is about over. Prom to look forward to! Bill came & had ride in Chevy. Swell. Home & after a bit of loving, discussed all about (?) letters & his 2(?) loves. O gosh! But I'm happy!
1931 - Sunday. Went to S.S. Washed hair. Saw piles of boys! Peggy came home! Sally here for supper. We, three, had a grand time.
1932 - Tues. Up at 7:30. To Dammuddy's & then off. Stuck & towed - snow in mountains. Home about 3. Up for Sally etc. Game tonite at Y. We beat New Brighton 23-21! Whoopie!
1933 - Wed. Went to Personnel Bureau. Slept for 2 hours this aft & John didn't arrive. Ate dinner with Honey. Went around for clothes for Thrift Shop tonite & studied a bit. Bed late.

1934 - Thurs. Up early. Munny & I to oculist. Dr. Smith just home. Left eye changed. Had to fix glasses. Franny called but no bridge. All settled for radio & Jim came. Walk up heights & down. Home. Fooled & bed late. Oh me. Sad world. Missed Bill today.

1935 - Fri. Up at 9. Bill & I to gown & to dentist. Met Dobby on way out. She, Bill, Prill & I lunch at Kaufmanns & she left. Prill, Bill & I to Stanley - "Mississippi." Then Prill left. Bill & I home & I said G'bye to him. It's hard, di. Mom 'n' I together tonite. We packed, talked, listened to radio & bed early.
1931 - Monday. Stayed with Sally for her prom (?) meeting & Peggy's for supper & to "Inspiration." Bob & all of us at Walker's afterwards.
1932 - Wed. School again! Nary a word from Chubby! Game with Freshies this aft. Won 25 - 8. I mad 19 points! "Scandals" tonite with Munny! Rudy darling, Rudy Vallee. Late!

1933 - Thurs. Awful classes. Mrs. Hobbs sweet in her lecture. Gym meet this aft. Saw Ginny's mother, Bobby & Everett. Ate dinner with Gantry(?) Fooled around tonite! Packed! No word form John! Lost doll.

1934 - Fri. Town early & got glasses. John arrived 4 a.m. Saw Ed Nash at breakfast. Pop arrived this evening. Dinner. John, big brawl. Babs, Joe, Wally & I bridge & then watched Bar Verner & Chuck L. Hotcha! Martin Moore all sick. J. Keeney nice. Danced with Jack D(?)

1935 - Sat. Up early. Munny & I to town & met Pop. Bill came to say G'bye & I was thrilled! Off on 9:05 & arrived Philly at 4:50. Sally & M.W. met me. Dinner at Chancellor Hall & then movies. "Private Worlds" with Claudette Colbert. Good! M.W. left & Sally & I to C.H. & bed. Fun to see the S(?) again. Sally is swell.
1931 - Tuesday. Got up at 6:30 for lab. Went to Cousin Nellie's this aft & to Peggy's tonite. Had a hot day of it. Wrote Aunt Hat tonite.
1932 - Thurs. Clubs. Chubby actually spoke this aft. Fun. English. C.B. Home & Peggy called. Girl Reserves & am in charge of Dance on 22nd. Oh me! Home & studied late. Tired! G'nite.

1933 - Fri. Foul classes. John & Ginny & I off to Carlisle at 10:45 am. Arrived at 10:45 pm after loads of fun. Bear Mt. Bridge, etc. Rained most of way, but we kept up our spirits. Bed after bath & were we tired?

1934 - Sat. Up late. Izzy & I to town. this aft to see "Nana." Good! (Bill here in aft & I missed him) Pops cooked dinner. Jack & Looey here again. Fun. To Babs' tonite & played bridge. Jim F. also. Oh me! Bed late.

1935 - Sun. Up real late. Sally & I walked. The whole family dined at Penn A.C. Sally & I to M.W's at Bryn Mawr & then Sally left. M.W. & I talked & she had a couple of guests. Met Uncle Alec & Uncle Eddie. Fun. Bed late & M.W. & I together in huge 4 poster. Called up Peggy & her man Harry. She is coming along O.K!!
1931 - Wednesday. Didn't get fooled. Hooray. Got up at 7 for French. Got Excellent in Music. Studied & fooled tonite G'nite!
1932 - Fri. Fooled twice! Asked Chubby about note etc. Roller skated with Challis this aft! Met more kids! Lecture with Peg Handy tonite & loads of fun with our Georges afterwards!

1933 - Sat. Up & said goodby to Dammuddy & Aunt Nellie. Fine trip but rain & arrived at 2:45. Down to Sally's after fond greeting with Muz.(?) etc. Dance at Roosevelt (me with Bill). Keeno! I love him more than ever. Home & bed late.

1934 - Sun. Whole family to Church! Fun! Looey & Jack behind us! Bill here. Swell kid. Mashed finger nail! John left after gang for dinner. Sad. June etc. came, McKallips, John K, tonite & sat for an hour at radio. We got Venezuela. Nice to me but I missed Bill!

1935 - Mon. Up at 7:30 & fooled right off by M.W. I fooled Earl Mortimer, however, on the bus. Met Tony in N.Y. & she & Bobby Bryan & I lunched. Ride on bus with Andy & arrived 8:30. Art Keown here & I thot of Bill. Good to see kids, but talked too much. Bill asked the boss & he will most likely come to Prom. I'm so excited, I can't see strait.
1931 - Thursday. Skipped school this aft. Pegsie, Sally & I saw "Millie" & "Honor Among Lovers"- good. Over at Peggy's tonite & said "goom bye."
1932 - Sat. Up at 8:45. Peggy came! To town & hunted Phil Cook, Pitt etc. Movies "Strangers in Love." Fredric March good! B.B. game at Y. Lost 25-22. Party at Sally's. PT & I with Ralph. Ride. Late!

1933 - Sun. Up & to church with fambly. Bill here! A bit cool. Sally up for dinner. Ginny & I bowled this aft. Took her all around & then to Sally's with gang for supper. Joey queer. Home & talked & bed early.

1934 - Mon. Up late. Packed. Bill came with roller skates & got me wine. Said he came last nite. Damn! Said g'bye to everybody. Will miss Mom 'n Pop. Swell vacation, di! Bridge with Pinx & Sarah & I on train.

1935 - Tues. Classes again. Saw about my cut(?) Worked on turtles in Physiology. Tired. Almost mad at Prill because I haven't forgotten last week. Washed clothes & hair after test at gym. German & bed not too early.
1931 - Friday. Peggy left today. It rained all day. Saw Aunt Hat at the Emericks. Bed late tonite.
1932 - Sunday. Up at 11:30. Peggy & I called on Phil Cook, Mrs. Jackson. Lunch & Bill R here. To C. Davis's & Moody Berg's. Then Sally here. To New Brighton - Townsends, J. Daby. Home. Read.

1933 - Mon. To village in a.m. for Hygiene junk. Ginny & Sally & I to town. Shopped. Then met Jane Griffiths at Wm Penn for lunch. Movies "Christopher Strong." Keen. Out to Griffiths. P.C. W. Movies tonite with kids (& John) " Tonite is Ours". Good. Bed late.

1934 - Tues. Train late on account of our car & hot box at 3:30 a.m. Got here about 12:45. Fixed up my room. 2 classes. Yelled at everybody. Came back & cleaned etc. all aft. Supper. Studied. Bed late.
1935 - Wed. Oh hell - I'm very behind in you, di. This was the 2nd day of classes. Worked about. Chem lab terrific as usual. Home & studied for tomorrow.
1931 - Saturday. Franny home. Went to town wif Muvver. We bought me clothes etc. Franny, Terry & Sally here tonite. Loads of fun.
1932 - Monday. Up late. Charlotte Davis, Peggy & I to town to "Tarzan." Good! Home. Peggy left as Bill, Dan & Ralph came. Boohoo! Back to studying tonite!

1933 - Tues. Dentist in a.m. & oculist & then to see Aunt Hat. Packed & sat around. Left at 4 for Carlisle. Arrived at 10. Sad. Wish I could have been home longer! Fun in car, tho. Ginny cute. Called Mother tonite. Bed at Argonne.
1934 - Wed. At it again full force. A quiz D- & an awful lit paper back. But no gym, thank heavens. Studied Bible in libe & wrote letters tonite.
1935 - Thurs. Trying to get used to classes. Physiology & fun. Missed tea at Agora. B. Clark & I decided to play tennis, but there wasn't any. To vill & ate. Home & studied a bit tonite.
1931 - Sunday. Went to S.S. & church mit John & Mumsie. John left this aft. Franny & Crutchy tonite. Boo hoo hoo!!
1932 - Tuesday. School again! Note to & from Chubby. Latin. Pinx & Moody after school. Took kids home. B.B. & roller skated with Handy & Challis tonite. Wrote Chubby & studied.

1933 - Wed. Up & said G'bye to Dammuddy & Aunt Nellie. Drove all day & arrived New Haven at 5:20. Keen day & trip. Saw oodles of places. New York. Fine rooms at Y.W.C.A. Movies tonite "Gabriel Over the White House." Good. Bed late.
1934 - Thurs. First Zo class. We're still behind. Got B- in Bible quiz. Conf with Miss Coolidge. Like her heaps! Oh that quiz! Shower & dinner. Studied & bed.

1935 - Fri. Messed around. Made up Physiology expt with Jane Leeds. Home. Studied all aft. Worked also tonite & then bed, a great life, di, a great life. Letter from Bill saying he can't come to Prom & 2 C-'s in quizzes - yes, a great life, a great mess!
1931 - Monday. Did a lot of work today. Saw play at S.A. for Women's Club. Bed late. Bath etc. Munny still wif me!
1932 - Wed. Crazy little notes to & from Chubby! Cooler now! Washed hair & studied(?) "Barretts of Wimpole Street" with Mother. Keen! Cried & cried! Oh me. Bed late & up early tomorrow.

1933 - Thurs. Up late. Ping Pong. John came at 12. To movies. "Murder in the Zoo" and "Harmony." Murder good. To baseball game where Yale beat Springfield. To Cous. Marg. but she wasn't there. John left & Peanut & I got our dinner. Rain & fooled.
1934 - Fri. Cut Phil. Cut in Lit. Chem quiz. No Bible class. Oh me! Chubby came for diner. We had wine & messed around. Lit tonite & generally philandered around. Bed late at that.

1935 - Sat. French & then to Agora for job Vill on skates & got a new pair, also breakfast for tomorrow. Studied in libe & then walk into woods where I thought about Bill & Prom & what is everything coming to. Cool & calm, but I'm so worried! Agora tonite & I represented Russia on minimum wage laws.
1931 - Tuesday. School again. Took sick girl home during French. Had fun with Sally this aft. She in rumble. up to heights etc.
1932 - Note to Chubby & "Anna." Fashion Show. B.B. game with Sophs. Last 1. We won 28-20. Wotta game! Picture of Chubby from Mr. Winne. John home! G. Reserves & study.

1933 - Fri. Up & said G'bye to John at 9. Breakfast in Spa! Bus 10:50-4:40. Met in Boston by Mrs. Trask & Bobby. Keeno, but yet sad. To Peabody & was most pleasantly surprised. Everett, Dan & Al tonite. Dan awfully funny! Bed late.

1934 - Sat. Lab. Lots of fun. Studied & then to Boston on 3:44. Shopped. Met Fairbanks. Dottie & Mudge & us dinner at Russian Bear. Bets & I movies "Riptide." Norma Shearer & Robt Montgomery. Wunnerful. 'Nite.

1935 - Sun. Up late. Swell rest. Corridor breakfast & then we fixed up whole corridor with our art exhibit. Studied a bit this aft. Agora for dinner. Took Judy. Home, studied. Bed not too early. German quiz tomorrow.
1931 - Wednesday. Had music lesson. Got excellent. It's about time. I was getting some French early, roller skates etc.
1932 - Fri. Chubby not at school! Boohoo. Sally away, too on account of cold. However we went to see "Ben Hur" & then with Pinx, Otties, Moody & Sarah Murdoch. Bed early.
1933 - Sat. Up late. Walked to Peabody for Ginny's Hygiene etc. this a.m. Talked in aft & wrapped caramels. Wrapped again this evening & to bed quite late. Fun. I like the Trasks heaps!
1934 - Sun. Up late. Studied. Walk with Peanut & to Chapel. Studied & fooled in aft. Letters. Waited supper & then party for Dottie tonite at 10 & they liked the coffee I made.

1935 - Mon. More classes. We've been back a week & it seems like a year. Chem lab & awful results. But, oh me! Roller skated up to gym, but no classes. Home - A.A. Inaugural dinner. Gertie had crazy poem(?) to me. Everybody was in stitches & I nearly died. French lecture. Home. Bed.
1931 - Thursday. Went in for Geom. after school. Ruth Challis had Mr. T home all embarrassed. Ha ha!
1932 - Sat. Up early. Contribution to bake-sale & to History. Bill, Dan, Ralph, Joey & Wally here. Sally in bed today. Party at Ruff's tonite with Dan. Lousy time. (?) Pinx, Moody & Ottie to see me.

1933 - Sun. Up very late. Church. Tenor crazy! Late dinner. Met Ginny Arbuckle. Ride to Marblehead & saw ocean! Everett, Al & Bernie came in evening & we all had fun. I like them all. Bed late after talking with Peanut.
1934 - Classes not so bad. Spring is here! Physical exam. Talk with Miss Elliott. Oh me! Helped with motor test. Dinner late. French. Letter about Dammuddy & stroke! Awful bad!

1935 - Tues. Horrid rain all day, turning to sleet this aft. Physiology lab. Worked considerably. Ride to vill with Sue Potter & back with Ruth Boshovitz. Studied as usual tonite. Bill, Prom? Oh gosh, di!
1931 - Friday. Physics after school for 1st time. Mr. Bolin is very nice. Went to the movies tonite - good.

1932 - Sun. Up & to church with fambly. To Willards. Asked Bill to dance, but refused. Read "Forty-Niners." Bill, Dan & Ralph here. John Keeney, Eddy Weyman, Ki & Mr. Conneely here supper. Studied late & washed hair.

1933 - Mon. Up early. To Salem this a.m. & bought sweater & shoes. To movies this aft & waited around for pictures. Home. Supper. Fixed caramel boxes. Everett came to say G'bye to Peanut. Washed & packed & bed.
1934 - Tues. Prill ill, so since I was stiff & counting balls for Motor test we had dinner in her room. I forgot my bells & so! more next week. Studied & bed early.

1935 - Wed. Of all the blankety-blank things - snow today. About 2 inches & all slushy! Barn Board meeting this aft. Loads of fun, but I don't know. Missed 1st lacrosse. Studied & wrote up Physiology tonite.
1931 - Saturday. Went to town with Mumsie. We got me dresses, pajamas etc. Hooray! I'm going to Canada this summer.
1932 - Mon. Sally still sick. Cute notes from Chubby. Meeting after school. Studied. John left tonite. Boohoo! Bed rather late. I like Chubby best now.

1933 - Tues. Up at 8. Ginny sick. But we left at 10 anyway. Arrived Wellesley & got schedule for finals. Ugh! Zo in aft & I got B on quiz. B highest mark! Thrilled! A- on Roll call. Telegram about trip to Smith Fri! Thrills etc!

1934 - Wed. To Wellesley Hills on roller skates with Peanut to find out about Smith. Bad luck. Studied. Fooled around. Listened to KooKoo's (?) tonite. Mrs. Pennyfeather not so hot. House meeting & bed.

1935 - Thurs. Snow half way gone Grand day. Tea at Agora after nice Physiology class. I nearly died breathing etc. Tonite Fairbanks, Prill & I to Truitt's & had grand discussion on marriage & career, etc. Home. Bed late.
1931 - Sunday, Went to S.S. but not to church. Sally had to go home. Fooled around this afternoon.
1932 - Tuesday. Chubby & notes. He's dear. Stayed in for Latin, tho' late. B.B. game with New Brighton. We won! 38-20. Went swimming - Challis & Honey. Snow & home late!

1933 - Wed. Rained all day. Ginny's birthday. She's better. To vil several times. Got her socks. Sally Supplee & Bobby here for dinner. We all ate at Mrs. Wheeler's table. Fun. Surprise party for Ginny tonite. She came & slept with me!
1934 - Thurs. Peanut's birthday. Gave her perfume. She can go tomorrow. Grand. Studied about. Packed tonite or something. Concert - Lily Pons - Grand. Mlle Malbot. Party in Peanut's room Bed late.

1935 - Friday. Heard definitely from Mom that Bill can't come for Prom. Oh dear! Signed up at (?) Bureau - Oh me! Read June Play - Peanut & I went to "Hay Fever" at Z.A. tonite. Awfully good. Peanut hunt in corridor afterwards & Mudge won.
1931 - Monday. Sally & I went to hear Sewickley debate against McRees Rocks. We won both debates!!!
1932 - Wed. Notes to & from Chubby. He's disgusted, I guess! Saw "Grand Hotel" with Munny - Good. I drove & am dead tired at about 12:30.

1933 - Thurs. Up late. Mailed laundry case. Class meeting at 3:45. Honor day in chapel 4:00. Waited dinner. French lecture tonite. Messed around & bed rather late. Foul snow about ½ foot deep. Wet. Slushy!

1934 - Fri. Cut some classes. Left at 2 for Smith with Peanut. Ride to Worcester. Bill. (?)! Movies at Worcester & buses to Northampton. Arrived 8:45. Jean & we ate. Grand waffles. Good old Smith. Bed at Wilder. Awful priest. Broke glasses again.

1935 - Sat. Spent afternoon writing up Zo expts. Miss Leach crazy in the libe. Andy & Dayton came thru. Rained like Hell. Home & wrote up more & worked diligently all evening. Am I turning into a grind? Do I miss Bill?!
1931 - Tuesday. Got up early this morning & went for Physics. It's getting real springy out, now.
1932 - Thurs. Awful day! Cold! Mr. Gill moved seat. Missed Nat. Honor Society & Sewicki! Bad note from Chubby besides a cute one. Movies tonite with Sally "Business or Pleasure." Will Rogers!

1933 - Fri. Classes would hardly end! Left at 4:30 for Smith. Arrived at 7. Jean took me all around. Visited quad which is grand! Loved it. "Brownie" nice. "Paradise" lake nice but not like Waban. Bed at 10!

1934 - Sat. Up & to Scientific Conference most of day. More fun. "Ape & the Child" Back. Dinner at Park. Movies with gang. Will Rogers "David Harum" Awful good also "3 on a Honeymoon." Good. Food & bed!

1935 - Sun. Corridor breakfast & then cleaned rooms. Miss Murphy & Stede(?) here for dinner & Polly couldn't come. She was very nice. Then to libe & did Education for talk & wrote paper. Agora to Vespers & then home & more study.
1931 - Wednesday. Mother, Sally & I drove up to see "Trader Horn" at Nixon. Fine! Sally here all nite. What ho! Lots of fun!
1932 - Fri. Cute note from Chubby - apologized! Chose wall-paper for room. Saw Miss Roy about dance next Fri. I'm chairman. Gym team meet tonite with Sally. We won. Home & bed late.

1933 - Sat. Up early. To Wesleyan (Conn) & great Scientific Conference. Saw "Rasputin" again. Saw pole vaulters etc. Science also good. Awfully tired. Home 10 (Northampton) Ate waffles & bed - real cozy. 2 weeks ago tonite!
1934 - Sun. Breakfast at Park. Jean, Ginny & I read papers. Then walk to flood. Dinner. Miss Wylie. Fooled till 4:15. Radio on bus(?) Buick - from Springfield. More fun. Home late. Studied, ate.

1935 - Mon. More Education! What a bore, 2 meetings conflicted tonite. Went to AA meeting. Gosh, di - I'm so glad I'm at last in it - after wanting to be fore 3 yrs! It's thrilling. Finished many expts for Physiology.
1931 - Thursday. Sally had picnic today at French. She wore my sweater. I took gym with her this aft. Goody goody.
1932 - Sat. Up late & studied & washed hair. Studied all aft. Tonite, Sally for supper & then to movies with Wally & Joe. Down to Sally's for eats & cards & then home.

1933 - Sun. Up at 8. Breakfast at Park. Out for a long hike. Bath & to Park for dinner & ate with Jean's house-ma - Miss Wylie. Keen. E. Swan (Swanny) Crazy. Off at 5:45. Eliot at 9:30 after crazy taxi.
1934 - Mon. B+ on Chem quiz. First gym of Spring Baseball & lacrosse. Loads of fun at baseball! Rained tho. Bells tonite & ice cream afterwards. Studied, washed hair & bed.

1935 - Tues. First Archery class. Loads of fun. Miss Schroeder's swell. Out of Zo lab early as we seem to be ahead of the rest. Finished expt's & handed in quite a mess. Betty Richmond for dinner & we had quite a nice chat!
1931 - Friday. Jimmy, Sally, Jim Crooks, V. Rhodes, Dan & I went to movies "City Lights." Very dumb, but loads of fun afterwards.
1932 - Sunday. Church. Bill, Wally, Joe here. Bill cute. Studied. Took Wally to Warrendale. Studied. Sally. Supper. Studied & bed.
1933 - Mon. Classes again. How awful? More fun telling about Smith. More work to do for quizzes at end of week. How can I do it? Rained. Awful Physics lab. Felt lousey. Down!

1934 - Tues. The long awaited for day has come. We got our cats in Zo!! Mine is a female - Prill & is pregnant!!! French movies with H.L. Thurston "Mi-lady." Free ticket. Miss Clark nice. Studied tonite.

1935 - Wed. More lacrosse this aft (first of this year) after a wearisome lab. But life goes on & all is not always rosy. It rained but cleared & out we went. Studied like the dickens for Physiology quiz & my French is done for tomorrow!
1931 - Saturday. Went to town to oculist with Munny. Eyes are no worse! Sally took me to "Twelfth Night." Jane Cowl was in it.
1932 - Mon. Not answering Chubby's note. Mad at Bill, 'cause when I came home, he left! Ride with Saddie! Studied tonite & got much done! Sleepy - so - bed!
1933 - Tues. Crazy English class. Zo roll call. I messed it up. Fooled after Zo. Ran around block after dinner. Waited dinner. Felt miserable most all day. Studied tonite.
1934 - Wed. Forgot dinner bells. More fun. Keen day & baseball outdoors. Lacrosse O.K. I'm trying for 1st Base in baseball. Dobby grand pitcher. Studied for Zo quiz tonite.

1935 - Studied all spare time on Physiology & we had quite the quiz - taking 2 hrs. Oh me! Such is life. Munny called tonite at House-meeting & I was in a daze with Chemistry. So good to hear her. Gosh, I wish I were home. I'm sick of this life at times!
1931 - Sunday. Went to S.S. Sally & I fooled around in aft. Tonite I studied, nassy, nassy.
1932 - Tues. Oracle- no note to Chubby, but he wrote in Autograph - awful! Latin class. Roller skated tonite with Challis & Handy! Fun. Gossip. Joe Cook real cute. I like him. Want him for Prom!
1933 - Wed. Studied most all day for Physics. Lacrosse in aft & I had more fun! Hard, tho & I feel dumb. Wrote theme till 12:00 tonite. Dead tired. Sun at last came out after 8 days of rain.

1934 - Thurs. After Bible, Dobby & I fixed food etc. & she, Peanut, Mash(?) & I went on picnic down the Charles. More darn fun. Awful current. Got all wet. It got dark, but we were merry. Again sometime? Zo quiz. Not so bad.

1935 - Friday. Feel good after Munny's call. But spend spare time studying for Chem quiz which was really quite good! Signed up at bureau. Then to practice baseball & Archery - fun. Shot from 30 yards. I like Miss Schreader. Home. Fooled, Libe & did Education!
1931 - Monday. Took Bricky Rhoads, Jane Terry & Sally for ride. Sally's mother mad cause we didn't go home. Sally moving.
1932 - Wed. At last answered Chubby's note. Also Joe Cook. He wrote in autograph. Cute note from Joe about Prom! Meeting about clothes at Commencement. Cute chapel & movie. Invitations.

1933 - Thurs. Awful Physics quiz. Probably flunked. Zoo lab & Mrs. Hobbs thanked me for Easter card. Saw M.F. Smith about schedule. Crazy time at gym. Tea. To Astron. with Mudge & Ginny. Jupiter in telescope.

1934 - Fri. A bit stiff from yesterday. Awful rain. Dobby came for dinner & we toasted, buttered & salted the almonds Aunt Hat sent. Studied & fooled the rest of the evening. Cleaned & changed room around. M.K asked me to fix gown May Day. Hoop!

1935 - Sat. Cut in French & so to vill & got much junk. Home & jobs. Then to Outing Club Hut this aft & we had more fun. Painted, fooled & worked about. Kids so nice & we had a heap of fun. Home 9:30 & bed was good.
1931 - Tuesday. Rained & of course, no tennis. I came home & tried to practice for a while.

1932 - Thurs. No ans. to note. Lovely Spring weather. Out of school early & to town for hair cut & wave with Sally. G.R. & movies with (?) Mrs. Jennings! "Polly of Circus." Winona McClester. Talk - whooey!
1933 - Friday. Physical exam this a.m. Dumb! Posture better. Home from Zoo & went to vil. Got socks. Studied a little Speech & generally messed around tonite. Scared about Physics!

1934 - Sat. Chem lab & actually finished. Jean here. We tore to town in aft. Saw G. Arliss in "The House of Rothschild" Good. Museums. No lunch. Foot!(?) Cocktails Peanut, Fairbanks & us - Seville "Glamour" Paul Lukas good. Bed late!

1935 - Easter. Up & over to Agora with Fairbanks & helped get breakfast. Grand. Home & then to chapel. Thot of fambly! Dinner grand. To libe with Fairbanks & then out on lake in canoe for 1st time this year. Art Keown here & great news about Prom. I feel badly. Vespers again tonite & Art sat with the gang of us!
1931 - Wednesday. Early to school. Miss Koehler mad at us. Music lesson in aft. Excellent. Sally's all moved now - cutest house!

1932 - Fri. No ans. as yet. Out of school early & to Y & decorated - 5 hrs. Joe Cook just darling. Home, ate & dressed. Boys late. Dance. Pretzel Duncan & Jack Haley! I went with Irvin Sheasby. Fun Ride & bed late!
1933 - Sat. Awful classes. Whoops! Got B- in Physics quiz. To Boston with Ginny & Bets this aft. Shopped. Supper at Seville. "Cavalcade" - keen. Diana Wynward. Fooled & home on 9:30 & bed early.
1934 - Sun. Up late. Breakfast ourselves - Jean, Andy, Betty, M.K & I. Jean & I walked around lake. Dinner. Fooled till 4:30. Jean left. Studied & studied. Bed late after much studying.
1935 - Mon. And another week begins. Oh me! Have finished Immensee. Lab & then to lacrosse. More fun. Quiet day with rain & sunshine. Studied like Hell tonite for French quiz tomorrow.
1931 - Thursday. Stayed in for geom. Sally, Mother & I saw "The Brat" at Hi scool, tonite. Sally here all nite mit me.
1932 - Sat. Up & to Hist. Home. Lunch. Town with Clem & Red & met Sally at Nixon "Silver Dominoe." All home. Supper & kids all here. Also Jim F. Gang came, but left. All down to S's. Joey tore pants.

1933 - Sun. Up early & played tennis with Ginny. More fun, but stiff. Betty's cousin, Marian Beck here. Chapel with them. Studied for Speech all aft. Walk with Ginny tonite & cute little boys. Alarm clock. Station.
1934 - Mon. Went to lacrosse. Helen Jacobs & lieutenant - tennis matches. Swell. Cut baseball. Studied a bit tonite. Did my French & Bible. Bed late.

1935 - Tues. Tore around. Out of Physiology early. Bad time at archery, but I love it. Baseball O.K. To Peggy Kohen's for dinner with Prill. Fun. Home & studied & to Barn futilely hunting for Miss Stohl. Chase called - me oh my! I thought surely he had forgotten!
1931 - Friday. Stayed in for Physics again. Saw play again tonite with Sally, "The Brat," guzzled at Walkers afterwards.
1932 - Sunday. Up early. Took Red, Clem & Wally to Zelienople & Sally. No church. Bill here! Darling & cute picture. Slept & studied in aft & all evening. Bed late.

1933 - Mon. Awful short story to give in Speech "The Zone of Quiet." Was I ever scared. Lacrosse, more fun. Baseball 1st time. Incident of Miss Schroeder & "Casey at the Bat." Struck out. Off dinner. Studied (?) late.
1934 - Tues. Bells this aft & again tonite. Class meeting at 4:40 about May Day. Studied like a demon & bed late.
1935 - Wed. Up early. Chem lab this aft & got ahead Wonders! Barn at 5. Home for dinner & back again. Dob came. Operetta "Princess Ida" - wonderful. Saw about June Play - OK. Gosh di, I'm into it!
1931 - Saturday. Mrs. Harbison took us to Jewish Synagogue, Catholic Cathedral, Colonade (lunch) & "What's Up" at Nixon. Peachy time.
1932 - Mon. Sally & I to movies & picked up Joe L. Sally home & Joey back for cake. Then took him home. He's nice. Roller skate tomorrow nite - maybe! Oh me!
1933 - Tues. Awful Physics again. But I've renewed hope. Bones & more bones in Zo. Wrote theme on Sabrina Farms for English & studied Zo till awful late. Dress from Munny. Cute!
1934 - Wed. Got swell box of candy from Jean. Cut both sports. Got my major all fixed up. Went to society teas. Most fun at T.Z.E. I want in Z.A. however. Oh me!

1935 - Thurs. French quiz back & a C. I knew it too. Oh me! Physiology & she said my quiz was good - me(?) I was thrilled. Agora tea with Dob. & then Class meeting. Marching song lousy! All kids up for Offices Pres. Pen. is our Honorary Member! ->but I changed to Agora & I'm glad! Last day of signing - oh me. Barn tonite & stayed till 11!
1931 - Sunday. Right-ho! Went to S.S. Rained & snowed today. Bill & Wally here. Fun at nite with Sally, Jimmy, Done, Shirley & George Davis.
1932 - Tues. Stayed in for Latin. Then, Challis, Joe L. & I to Ben Avon to gym meet & lost. Good, tho! Joe Cook real cute. Joey cuter! To Myer's & then home & Munny angry a bit.

1933 - Wed. B- on Eng. paper. Cut Speech. Lacrosse this aft. Miss Harris complemented me. Whee! Baseball & Pete hit a home run. I hit twice out. Base on balls. Betty & I ate with Gentry. Studied all nite for Zo quiz.
1934 - Thurs. Room drawing in aft. I would get 318. And I'm to get Eve's room - 105. Oh me! Ginny wants my room. Sent candy to John, Mother & Jean.

1935 - Fri. Room drawing last year & we haven't done it yet! Gave talk on Russian Education, a bit scared. Ginny West visited German. A- on Chem quiz which averages to B-. Archery & I had a good day. Then out in canoe with Fairbanks & Ginny West. No Barn tonite! Di, what a difference a few days make! Will I ever be able to trust Prill again or will I always feel uneasy & afraid as I do now? What to do? What to do?
1931 - Monday Went down to Sally's & read Boners to her. Got 100 in Geometry test. Wrote 6 letters & essay of 1250 words tonite.
1932 - Wed. Sore throat. Waited on tables at church supper & then Mary Ott, Sally & I to Minstrel Show. Pretty dumb. Then to Sally's all nite & had a fine sleep but not enuf.
1933 - Thurs. Awful Zo quiz - Evolution. Probably flunked. Miss Hamilton read theme in class. Sarcastic. Sex lecture! To libe tonite. Had finger punched for blood in Zo & miserable. Bed early.

1934 - Fri. Dobby for dinner tonite & I sat again with Anderson gang. To libe & started my Bible report. Worked on it tonite. Messed around & got homesick & what not. Even cried. Bed 8:30 Up 6:35. May day Rehearsal. Missed Zephyr(?)

1935 - Sat. Down to vill early in aft & got food for corridor breakfast. Ms. Hopkins is awfully nice! Then studied, or tried to & even tonite I sat around & studied & retired early. (P.S. This is May 22, 1935!!!) I'll never do it again, di!!!
1931 - Tuesday. Worked & fooled around. Studied tonite, & didn't have time to write any more letters.
1932 - Thurs. Crazy Lit. club & cute Chubby & Joe Cook! Gym - dumb baseball. English at 4. Home, washed hair & up to Dr. Shanor's. Not there. Home, studied & bed early! 'Nite!
1933 - Fri. Conference with Miss Hamilton. Dumb. I guess I am! Spring here tonite & I couldn't study. Ginny & Dolly & I talked to Anthony boy. Rudy out in car & smoked cigarettes! Crazy. 'Nite.
1934 - Sat. Better this a.m. after 10 hours sleep. Lab this a.m. & for 2 hours this aft. More fun. Home. Movies tonite with Andy & Janet. We were 8 minutes late. Oh me!

1935 - Sun. Worked etc. after corridor breakfast & then, this aft. Miss Bradstreet & friend took Peggy Rohn & me to a man who owned a coach for coach & four, but he was awful. Suggested a Mr. Sampson. After Agora vespers I called him up in Framingham(?) & he is interested & is to meet us tomorrow nite at Ma(?) about it!
1931 - Wednesday. Sally & I waited on tables at church supper. Sheibie! Also, I stayed at Sally's all nite. Loads of fun!
1932 - Fri. Pictures of Student Council. Sally & Oracle - me. Mother mad. Orange dress criticized! Stayed in for Biology. Home. Studied history & bed real early.

1933 - Sat. Only 2 classes. Got Mother's presents! Ginny & I went to "42nd Street" this aft. Nils, the janitor, took us & brot us home. Ride tonite - Ginny & Freddy (Rudy) Michelson & I. Fun! Naughty us! Keen car. Echo bridge.
1934 - Sun. Up late. Studied & fooled in a.m. Prill & I to Danvers. She & her mother & I drove all around ocean. Melvin at Marblehead. Swell supper. Messed around & finally back here & studied. Damn!

1935 - Mon. Tore around today & even missed dinner. Over to Magces(?) & met Mr. Sampson, who is a most marvelous man! He is going to lend us his coach & we'll get horses for May Day nite Senior officer conveyance. Melva Clark, Peggy Kohn & I then dinner in vill. Bed late.

1931 - Thursday. Went to town with Sally & Munny this aft & saw George Arliss in "The Millionaire." Peachy! Sally & I late for school. Gym meet. Ben Avon & Sewickley. We won by 24 points. I stayed at Sally's all nite. G.R. Dinner & Miss Hubble(?)
1932 - Sat. Up & to History. Town with Sally to P.C.W. Met Jane Mitchell. Nice! Home & dates with Wally & Joey & movies. Bill R. & mixup. Darn! Joey awfully nice! More fun, then bed late!
1933 - Sun. Up early. Ginny & I played tennis after breakfast. Studied & fooled & slept in aft. We played again in evening & then talked with Rudy. Down to vil & ate & bed early. Washed hair.
1934 - Mon. More work. Baseball & lacrosse in aft. Sewed up M.K's & Polly's gowns. Studied till late. Messed around. Prill & I to vil for food.
1935 - Tues. Dot Fagg had me to dinner tonite. More fun. At Tower. Then home & did a mess of studying. Cut in Education tomorrow - oh me! All fixed up about tomorrow nite & conveyance, now!
1931 - Friday. Stayed in till 5:20 & then studied hard tonite. Fooled also! Miss Koehler made me move today!
1932 - Sunday. No church. Wally, Joe & Bill R. here. Slept & read in aft. Then Sally took Wally, Joey & I to Zelienople. Joey real sweet! He came for supper & helped with my Latin. Like him!

1933 - Mon. Up awful early. Senior hoop rolling! Doris Dunlop won! Cute numerals. Lacrosse & baseball this aft. Step-singing tonite. Marie Kass Senior president! Whoops! Crazy songs! Studied rather late. Keen day!

1934 - Tues. Wotta day! Fixed M.K's & Polly's gowns etc. Grand Hoop Race. Anne Grant won!! Chapel. We did numerals etc. Me in 8! May day in aft. 8 in French! Step-singing tonite. Ellen Webster Sen. Pres. Ruth Pitcairn editor Legenda! Whoops!

1935 - Wed. May Day & so forth. Sophs did grand job on Numerals & picture. Don Knupfer won the Hoop Race! Our officers tonite arrived in Coach & 4 after much worry, etc. Beth Brazee, Pres, Ellie Smith v.p., Miss Pendleton Hon. Member, Ester Edwards & Edie White, Legenda!
1931 - Saturday. Sally & I went to town. Shopped & saw "Macbeth" at C.(?).T. Came home in awful storm. Sally supped here. Studied tonite.
1932 - Monday. Note to Chubby. Nutty Picture at Diehl's. Also Sally. Top down on Ford. Tennis tonight. I'm dead, but won. Ride & saw Joey. He looked cute. Home, letter, lessons.
1933 - Tues. Up early. Warm today. Physics roll call. Started cutting frogs in Zo. Talked to Jean Anthony. Dobby for dinner. She & Ginny & I paddled in Lake Wabon. Home & studied.
1934 - Wed. Quiz announced in Phil. More fun in lacrosse & baseball this aft! Messed around. Invited Miss Johnstin for dinner next Wed. Oh me. Bed late. House Meeting. Studied Zo.

1935 - Thurs. No more worry about coach & 4 except paying. Tea at Agora this aft. Dob went with me. Then home & tried to study but package from Bill - wine & it is Sauterne. Letter yesterday & I'm so happy I think he's grander 'n' ever, di!!
1931 - Sunday. Munny's birthday! I gave her underwear. Had fun at Sally's this aft. & at supper.
1932 - Tues. Latin after school. Took Ralph home - Dumb! No note from Chubby, Darn. I also wrote to Joe Cook, but no reply. Tennis tonite with Sally. She's lots better. I'm dumb.
1933 - Wed. Munny's burfday. Wrote her. Lacrosse & baseball. Rain & was soaked! Saw Ruth Russell tonite & also Dobby. Wrote Hygiene paper. Peanut & I went to see Honey! Bed late.
1934 - Thurs. Awful thing about Miss Murphy & my embryos with fur. Kitties so cute! Thought of Munny. Letter from her with cute pictures. Prill & I to see Ms. Hobbs, not home.

1935 - Fri. Quite a day. Thought of Bill during most of it. slept most all aft. Then dressed. Prom dinner at Tower & large table of us. Prom simply grand & Art was swell! A grand evening is over. So much planning for so short a while. I missed Bill more than I can say here, di! Munny's birthday & she is away! I thot of her lots.
1931 - Monday. Played tennis tonite with Sally. Had a grand time. Also Jane M. & Ruth Challis. I was in awful form.
1932 - Wed. No Biology as expected. Fooled around. Sally ran out of gas & truck bumped her; so not much tennis, but fun. Home, lessons in bed, & early.
1933 - Thurs. Another Hygiene lecture. Passed canoe test. Drew for rooms. Got 126. Tennis tonite with Ginny but it was too cold. Home. Studied late.
1934 - Fri. Phil paper back. O.K. Rain. Dot Fagg for dinner after dumb afternoon. Dobby, Peanut & I to vil & then home & studied. Talked with Prill. Washed hair. Bed.
1935 - Sat. What a let down. Up late. Cut in only class. Studied all aft & also tonite. To vill & then studied again tonite. Did a lot of Physiology.
1931 - Tuesday. Went early for French. My poor arm hurts. Played tennis tonite with Sally. W. Richey, & Geo. Sheldon. Lots of fun.
1932 - Thurs. Keen chapel. Chubby real nice today. He got b.b. letter. Gee, I'd love to have it! English. Girl Reserves tonite with Challis. Treasure Hunt. Home, studied, bed.
1933 - Fri. Had conference with Mrs. Hobbs. Almost cried! Bon Zoo test & Evolution. Diner at Tower with Sarah. Step singing & sate with Dick Bogart. Wrote theme & studied late.
1934 - Sat. Dolly's little brother's friend came. Top of Green Tower. Carillon Concert. Got some tea. Drove around Wellesley. Soda at Seibre(?) More fun. Then studied & worked all evening.

1935 - Sun. Up for breakfast. Studied all a.m. Then cleaned room etc. Fairbanks & I out on lake for a while & also Mudge & Peanut. Down Charles. Loads of fun. Studied some more tonite after Agora vesper.
1931 - Wednesday. Only got Very Good in Music - tough! Played tennis tonite with Sally, Jimmy & W. Richey & I was rotten as usual.
1932 - Fri. Reports & was on Honor Roll. Biology after school today. Sally for supper & after crazy tennis, we saw "Tarzan." I still liked it. Home & bed late (11:30)

1933 - Sat. Awful classes. Jean arrived at noon. Lunch & to Boston. "Of Thee I Sing" in aft. Dinner at Seville. "Met" & saw G. Arliss in "The Workingman." Home. Walked around. Fooled. Bed. Betty gone to Ruth's.
1934 - Sun. Up for bekbets. All I can say is I worked all day & got things done - 8 out of my 14. Didn't let up & finally got to bed late tonite. Out on spoon-holder with Dolly. (?) with Peanut
1935 - Mon. Chem lab & I lived thru it, I guess. I'm looking forward to weekends at this point. Such is life. Lacrosse this aft & it is getting better. Studied as well as I could, tonite!
1931 - Thursday. Stayed in for Geom. Mum & I saw "Kempy." Dickie Long peachy! Incident of keys! Rainy! Oh! How funny!
1932 - Sat. Up at 10:15. Hair waved & picture taken at Diehl's after lunch. Messed around. Sally & I took Wally to Warrendale. I ates with Joey, (Sally, Jim) tonite. Movies & fun!

1933 - Sun. Up at 9:30. Breakfast at "Maples." Jean & I walked around campus. Canoed with Dolly. Dinner at Eliot. Visited Sarah & Pinx this aft & were up on tower. Jean left at 5:30. Ginny & I keen tennis tonite. New balls! Betty didn't come. Bed early.

1934 - Mon. Maybe it as tonite Mother called about Dammuddy, but she broke her hip & she's got to get well! di. Sports & fun. I love first base. Lacrosse really encouraging. Studied. Bells. Letters & Zo. Tennis with Chubby in aft. Fun. Sunburn.
1935 - Tues. Baseball isn't so hot. We need practice. To Tower to dinner tonite with Dobson. More fun. Third Tues. in a row I've been there! Studied later.
1931 - Friday. Physics & didn't go to town as planned. Home & bed not too late. Get up early tomorry.
1932 - Sun. Sally & I to church. Home. Bill & Joe here. Dinner. Loafed a present. Sally's for supper. Read. Studied. Bed not so late after a very dull day.
1933 - Mon. Betty not here. Crazy classes. Lacrosse & baseball this aft. Training. Talked French at dinner. Tennis with Ginny. Fun. Read at libe. Called Mrs. Smart!! Studied.

1934 - Tues. Zo again & Algy o.k. Still embarrassed about Miss Murphy. Oh dear. Step singing tonite only I didn't go on account of a quiz. Studied & messed around. Mother called about Dammuddy. Hope she'll be better.
1935 - Wed. Bus. meeting tonite at Agora & now I'm Purveyor & for next year which means a mess of work, but mayhap 'twill be fun. Lacrosse & I also did some work, perhaps.
1931 - Saturday. Play day at Bellevue. I was "black." Came in second. Captain of basketball. We won! Party tonite. I'm glad it's over. Tired now.
1932 - Mon. Down to Mrs. Atchley's at 4 - 6:30. Supper & then to Sally's where I messed around before coming home & studying again. Watta life!
1933 - Tues. Betty & I played tennis this aft. Hurt foot on bike. Dinner with Dobby & Ginny tonite. Fights! Step Singing. Open A.A. meeting about Play Day Sat. Up all nite with French. Bed 11:00!
1934 - Wed. Horrible Phil. quiz. Oh me! I never did see such a one. To vil for flowers for Mama's day. Saw Pinx. Sports fun. Miss Johnstin for dinner & she was wunnerful. Like her so much. Her humor.
1935 - Thurs. Academic Council with Senior acting this aft. Awfully good. Then dinner & studied tonite.
1931 - Sunday. Don't feel so hot today. Got up at 11. Read, slept & played with cat this aft. Wrote, read & fooled till 10:00 tonite.
1932 - Tues. Stayed for Latin. Took picture to Diehl's & got film from town. Crazy escapade with "picture of pictures" with Jack Hanlon, Frances Ferguson & Charles Stone.

1933 - Wed. Rain awful in a.m. Cut Speech. Fun in French. Lacrosse & baseball - wet - this aft. Mlle. Malbot came for dinner. Darling! Like her heaps. Talked in French. "Couper le chat"! Studied late tonite.
1934 - Thurs. Zo roll-call. Fun in class. Those Zo people are so swell! Studied Bible all aft after class. Ate early dinner. Wrote Lit paper all evening. Oh me! It was awful, but Milton was swell.

1935 - Fri. Barely lived thru classes. DH & I did some Physiology this aft. Last min. arrangements about trip tomorrow. Only 3 going at this point. Home & packed & bed at 8:30 although I couldn’t sleep.
1931 - Monday. Walkers & to Sally's. Fooled around & then worked tonite.
1932 - Wed. Sally & I to movies. It was dumb. Went to Isaly's for ice-cream. Movies "Play Girl" & "Alias, the Doctor." Home & bed late.
1933 - Thurs. "Zo" lecture on Eugenics this aft. Very good! Tea at Students Aid. Very nice people! Got crackers & ate. Tennis after diner with Ginny. Fun. Studied & bed late.
1934 - Fri. Lit paper done. Chapel with Prill. I was mad. Studied Bible till 3:30. Baseball. Archery. Awful bow breaking episode. Step singing & Bible studying again tonite.

1935 - Sat. Up at 4:30 a.m. & Dumpy came. Man brot car & we got Betty Eggleston. Off to Vassar. Ate at Stafford. Also flat tire. Got to Poughkepsie about noon. Then met Peggy & Maggie (?). Went to lunch at Alumnae House. Walked all around this aft. Dinner at Main. Peggy & some cousins & I to movies "Naughty Nannette" - Good! Home & bed in Peggy's bed! So swell to see her!
1931 - Tuesday. Down to Sally's for a while. Am not going to town till Friday. Wrote to A.H. also did lessons.
1932 - Thurs. English in aft. Girl Reserves tonite with Sally. Messed around. Isaly's. Home. Studied.
1933 - Fri. Conference with Miss Hamilton. Extempore speech. Present - awful in "Zo" test. Mrs. Smart & Fred came. Drive. Eats. Keeno. Coming next Fri. Saw B. Edmonds in Auburndale. Better tonite!

1934 - Sat. Lab fun. Studied in libe all aft & took Bible quiz. Home. Studied & talked with Andy tonite. Prill home for the weekend for Mother's day. Donuts & bed early. Tired. Chapel. Tennis with Carol 5-7, 6-4 oh me!

1935 - Sun. Up at 9. Peggy & I walked all around. Saw Nancy Clause, then to Chapel. Dinner in Lathrop. Then walk to Outing Club & back again. Then off to Wellesley. Car was magnificent. Perfect day & we made good time - 5 hrs driving. Home about 10 & tired.
1931 - Wednesday. Shirley's for lunch & she & Sally & I saw "Svengali" at Warner. Bad pictures taken at 5 & 10. Great fun!

1932 - Fri. (Fri. the 13th!) Stayed in for Biology. Mr. C. here. Y with Peg Handy. Cleared tables. Joe C. & Chubby both there. Had nertzy(?) time. Also saw Joey S. I likes 'em all. Oh me! Home about 10:30.

1933 - Sat. Awful classes. Playday this aft with B. U., Radcliffe & Simmons. More fun! I was blue in Archery. Poor & dumb I was, but fun! Blue won archery! Keen dinner & loads of fun. Alice McKee. Home. Cut hair. Bed 11! Got in Coop House! Keeno!

1934 - Sun. Waited on dinner. Then studied a bit. Betty, A.A. & I took over dinner (sandwiches from Miss Capin) & paddled up Charles. Gone 3 hours. More fun!! Oh I love the lake & the Charles. Back & attempted to study, but bed early.

1935 - Mon. Classes again & I was not prepared in German & got thoroughly caught. She gave me a lecture! Then A.A. meeting tonite & I tore around here & there & finally back to study. Lacrosse is swell. A grand sport, but no use after college.
1931 - Thursday. Girl Reserve Installation Services. Sally, vice-president. I'm treasurer. Not many there. Walkers (?)
1932 - Sat. Down for History & awful test! To Miss Roy's this aft. Ride with Sally to her house for supper & all nite. Movies "The Final Edition" - fair. Fun down there!

1933 - Sun. Up for breakfast. Studied & sun bathed in a.m. Fooled most of aft. & did French & Speech. Mr. & Mrs. Emery here & ate dinner at "Blue Dragon." More fun seeing them. Grand time with everyone. Letters & bed late.

1934 - Mon. Last quiz of year, I hope, Chemistry & it was a terror. Lacrosse & baseball - last time before games. Cut baseball for Tree Day rehearsal first one on the green. More fun. Vil & got food. Studied a bit t' nite.

1935 - Tues. Agora tea today & it went off O.K. Ginny Lincoln & I went after baseball & it was fun. Home at 6:14 & sat at dinner with Fairbanks & Mr. & Mrs. Truitt. Then to Barn & home again to a nite of study.
1931 - Friday. After Physics, went to Stewarts & saw Aunt Hat. Nice time & home at 9:30.
1932 - Sun. Church with Sally. Bill & Joe here. Ride with Sally. Joey came & for supper. Cute! Ride & then took him home. Top was down. Moon & stars out. It was grand! He's nice.
1933 - Mon. Awful Physics lab. Only 2 more! Lacrosse & baseball. Fun in both. To vil in evening with gang. Ate & shouldn't have. Coffee. Did French & bed early.

1934 - Tues. Tree Day rehearsal in Alum. We soldiers are pretty awful, but hope we'll come thru. Katherine Hathaway is terrible nice. Wish I knew her, friend of Dobby's. Millions of classes today. Bed. To A.K.X tea but not time for more.

1935 - Wed. Another day of rushing. Archery & lacrosse after lab. Made a 228 in 1st Columbia round. a 40 from 40 yds. Miss Murphy at dinner & sat there not knowing. To town & then home to a mite of studying.
1931 - Saturday. Up at 8:30. Dentist. Music lesson. excellent. Mary Thornes Bridge Luncheon (3rd), Sally supper & all nite. We played tennis.
1932 - Mon. School again! Chubby gave talk & kept looking up! Trig. Hair & Van Pelts & got M.W.'s picture. Tennis with Sally. Eskies. Home. Washed hair etc. & studied. Bill cut grass. Left sweater.
1933 - Tues. Teams announced. Sub on lacrosse & on baseball first! Tried to get sunburned this noon on roof. Lacrosse this evening with M. Yost. We broke dining room window. Sold bike.

1934 - Wed. Baseball game this aft. We lost to Junior-Freshmen. My dumb play. To Dobby's shower & dinner. We went out on lake. Paddled up by paint factory. Keeno! Back & studied. Libe for book. Home - Bed.
1935 - Thurs. After classes, went up & watched lacrosse, then 1st tennis game of the year with Steve. More fun! Then rush to dinner & over to Barn with Fairbanks & Ginny & fixed stage.
1931 - Sunday. Sally & I slept. Got up at 11 & I studied & worked this aft. 8 pr of stockings & 6 of gloves washed tonite - also hair!
1932 - Tues. Latin after school. Then took Frederick home. Again more tennis with Sally tonite. Came home & studied & wrote letters.

1933 - Wed. Tennis with Mudge this noon. Won. Lacrosse practice & then baseball game. Freshmen beat Sophs 7-6. I'm left field. Ate dinner with Miss Beall. Studied tonite. Betty & I slept out on roof!!
1934 - Thurs. Cut off Prill's left hind leg in Zo & gave it to Betty. Tree Day rehearsal this aft. Was I mad! - all during lacrosse game! Studied a bit tonite & letters & bed early.

1935 - Fri. Archery this aft. & 220 - not so hot. Rained during baseball time. Float Nite & I took tickets. Then Fairbanks, Betty Graf from '38 & I sat in '36 group & sang. More fun. Floats grand. Home. Bed & slightly tired. 'Nita Wilson & I went around checking for props etc.
1931 - Monday. Took Sally home. Came home. Read. Didn't get to go to circus, but I studied late. Got A in dictation in French.
1932 - Wed. Nothing in aft. Went up to Y. Messed with Sally. Tennis tonite again. We're getting better. Also letters.
1933 - Thurs. Miss Hamilton read theme in class. Got sunburned at noon. "Zo" & did frog arteries. Class meeting. Studied & finished writing short story. Studied tonite after Fitty(?) & Pete here.

1934 - Fri. In a.m. paddled canoe across lake. Simply swell. Chapel. 78 in Phil quiz & was I relieved! C+ - B- in Bible. Float nite after to Mack's for dinner. Paddled Float no. 4. Then saw rest of floats. Home. M.K's party. Met Izzy Britton, Mrs. Leich. Deeder Leich, Anne Walker & Lucy Walker!

1935 - Sat. French. Then hair done. Andy & I got food. Then Dayton & Tommy Farmer, my blind, arrived. Went to Tree Day, also with Jim Penney - an awfully nice person! Back - four of us picnic out on lake. Step Singing - House Dance , Tommy a marvellous dancer & loads of fun. Wotta grand day, it turned out to be.
1931 - Tuesday. Took Sally out riding, she driving, this aft. Practiced. Went to library & worked hard tonite. Gosh! I hope I pass the boards!
1932 - Thurs. No chapel, but crazy notes with Chubby in that period. Gym. English. Finished Silas Lapham. Tennis with Sally. Girl Reserves & tennis again. Loads of fun.

1933 - Fri. Baseball & lacrosse. Float Nite tonite. I sold tickets. Mr. & Mrs. & Fred Smart came & I sat with them a while. To Bendelevs(?). Back to Eliot. Mr. Smart met Trasks & we all had grand time. Betty, guests & I in Bell room tonite!

1934 - Sat. Lab & out early. Miss Jones is awfully nice! 2:30 dressed & Tree Day Soldier. More fun. Freshmen got to tree first!! Rushed. Town with Betty & A.A. No Pops - darn it! But we ate at "Old France" & went to the movies. Food. Bed late!

1935 - Sun. Up at 10. Keen day! Art got here about 11:45 & we had a set of tennis. Then off at last for picnic - 18 of us - almost whole corridor. Art's place is grand! More darn fun - I never felt so completely detached. Ride grand & then home in evening, me riding in front of truck with Art & others above. It's funny, di, I like Art an awful lot. He really is swell, but how can I when I love Bill so much? Oh me!
1931 - Wednesday. No music, but to town & saw Earl on his 16th birthday. Gave him belt - Mumsie, money. Aunt Hat not there. Boohoo.
1932 - Fri. Meeting after school. Fooled. Then tennis tonite & dates with Wally & Joey. Ride & then to my house & then to Sally's. Fun. Then home & bed about 11.

1933 - Sat. Awful classes. Tree Day this aft - with Peanut. We then missed train - made 6:26 to Boston. Met Rector & Dot & Hat at Seville & to a Pop Concert at Symp. Hall. Rain. Home on 11:39. Bed after a good day - in Bell Room!

1934 - Sun. Up late. Worked etc. Dinner with A.A. & a keeno Mrs. White from Chicago. Worked all aft. After supper Fairbanks, Peanut, A.A. & I canoed on the lake. Wonderful atmosphere. I do love the lake! Fambly called t' nite & I was so thrilled to hear them. But Dammuddy has had a stroke, but is better, thank goodness.
1935 - Mon. Up & studied! Got thru classes barely! Chem lab, then Archery & made 232 - best yet! Lacrosse, then rush to dinner. Home & studied & bed at some time. Some rush after the weekend.
1931 - Thursday. Got out of Geom at 4:30, but instead of serving at Blind dinner, I came home & ate with Mumsie.

1932 - Sat. Up & to Y all day for Play Day. Got real sun-burned! More darn fun! Tennis, archery, swimming - Betty Barrett cute! Sat at Speaker's Table. Home & studied. Saw Joe C. & S. Chubby & Bill! Oh me!

1933 - Sun. Studied & fooled in a.m. Ride on bikes with Betty's friends. To Mrs. Hobbs' at 4:30. Chubby Cutler, Faith M., Miss Alderman, Mrs. H. & I on long walk back. Cooked dinner - Toast. Laugh. Miss Bell. Keen fun. Flowers. Home. Studied.
1934 - Mon. Won 2nd baseball game by a great margin. Good game. Fun in lacrosse. Asked to be up for head of baseball. I'm so thrilled! Studied a bit t' nite & washed hair. Bed.

1935 - Tues. Oh me! French class good. Miss Beall & I to Suburban (?), but no soap. Then last Physiology lab this aft. Archery - Bad score. Baseball & fun!Tennis after dinner with Dempy & load of fun. Home & studied all evening!
1931 - Friday. Couldn't get to town. Rain & cold. Oh dear. 'Twas orful. Movies "Beau Ideal" with Sally & Frederick. Good!
1932 - Sun. Up & to church with Sally. Slippery Rock with Wally, Sally & Joey. Home. gingerale. Read with Joey. Tennis with Mary. Ott. Herman(?). Biology with Joey. Took him home. Studied. You.
1933 - Mon. Awful Physics lab! Lacrosse this aft & I didn't play. Lost to Sen. - Juniors. Baseball. Home & waited for Martha Ann. Studied Physics all nite in Marian's room. Scared stiff.

1934 - Tues. Lacrosse game this aft & we tied Jun. - Fresh - 4-4. They won 1st game so it is almost over. Saw Miss Beall about tennis request & I may get one. Bed late. Fun in Zo. Brot embryos home. Great sport! Not up for hd. of baseball - 3 & marked(?) present.

1935 - Wotta day! Dob & I gave Franny a (?) then studied all a.m. for Chem quiz. After it, lab & lacrosse & archery. Then Barn bus. board supper then Agora bus. meeting. Home Munny called at 10 & we had grand chat. Thinks idea of Germany O.K.!
1931 - Saturday. Mumsy & I went to town & what we didn't buy? Oh dear! Got a tag! Sally's tonite for party & all nite. Oodles of fun.
1932 - Mon. Down to Mrs. Atchley's after school. Awful history! Home, supper, & tennis. I got dizzy; so we left early. Home & bed early for a change. Fell better already. G'nite!

1933 - Tues. Awful Physics quiz. Probably flunked! Baseball game this aft with Jun. - Seniors. Lost 3-11. All runs in 1st inning! Waited dinner for Bets. Studied for Speech & played tennis with Peanut.

1934 - Wed. Libe & also messed about. Vil also. To Agora for Prop. Committee supper & had loads of fun. Am going to stay in June. Lacrosse this aft & baseball. We beat Jun. - Fresh. 16 - 1. What a time. Ann Grant swell.

1935 - Thurs. French swell. Then Bells. Then last Physiology class this aft. I got extension. Helped get tea at Agora after visit with Miss Salditt & later, Dempy. Miss Alditt's swell & thot plan for Germany is a good one!!
1931 - Sunday. Sally & I went to S.S. Home & dined at Edgeworth Club. Peachy(?) Sally's in aft & tried a little studying tonite. Bed at 6:30 P.M.

1932 - Tues. Hi ho! Imagine. I can hardly! Oh me! Tennis with Sally after supper. Trig in aft & maybe I learned a little. Home & studied. Walked down hall with Chubby & talked in 213, but no notes - Boohoo.

1933 - Wed. Dumb notes, but fun!(pointing to 1932 entry) Gave my long poem in Speech & perhaps I wasn't scared! Went off o.k. Lacrosse this aft. for last time - also baseball. Studied all evening for Zo quiz tomorrow!

1934 - Thurs. Fun in Zo. Spring Field Day & altho I made both baseball & lacrosse varsities I made a mess of the Faculty - Student baseball game which, otherwise, was loads of fun. Miss Murphy a good egg - also Miss Leach. Kitten in Zo - sweet.

1935 - Fri. Wotta day. German O.K. today. Chem & then to libe for French & nearly fell asleep. Baseball. We were better. Then Dempy for dinner & last Step Singing tonite. Sad. I nearly cried. Oh di, we sit in Senior section now!! Up til 12 with French.
1931 - Monday. Rained & so no tennis. Sally & I messed around. She here for supper. We messed around & walked up to Walkers etc.
1932 - Wed. Played tennis with Sally. Joey came about 9 & stayed till 10:45. We reminisced. He's awfully nice. Biology after school this aft & Bill was here but gone when I arrived.
1933 - Thurs. Field day this aft & I helped Peanut with things. Saw & talked to Mlle Malbot. Cute. Bobby Trask came tonite after P. & I played tennis. Ride in rumble. Good discussion. Bed late.

1934 - Fri. Rained all day but we had picnic anyway. Mrs. Hobbs & Zo Seminar Room - advisees & Dobby. We had a swell time & I'm crazy about that woman! To libe till 9:30. Home. Bed about 10. Keen picnic!

1935 - Sat. Up at 6. Barely finished reading. French & then Agora job! Some business - a purveyor! Then rest after lunch & archery, lacrosse & baseball in Field Day. 204 in Archer, high for our class! We won 5-4 Lacrosse & lost 26-3 in baseball. Sad - nothing yet, di!! I think posture has held back a lot. We shall remedy it!!
1931 - Tuesday. Played tennis with Sally, Jimmy & Dan at Shannopin. Fun! Down at Sally's all nite tonite. Studied & read!

1932 - Thurs. Clubs today & crazy Chubby. Cute talk with him! Gym & I broad jumped etc. More fun! English. Minicks party. Scotchy Walker played(?) Real cute. Danced. Chubby & "Drop Hanky." Pulled bench. More darn fun. Chubby & David both nice.

1933 - Fri. Mlle. Malbot can't play tennis! Tea at Mrs. Wheeler's this aft. very nice. Awfully hot! Had to wait dinner! Step singing - last! Took Soph. place. Saw kids to dance. Vil & bed late. Did rats in Zo today. B+, B+ on both quizzes.

1934 - Sat. Formal Chapel. To lab with Miss Jones. She's o.k.! Studied in libe all aft & to vil & got food. Party tonite after studying. I got coffee, crackers & cookies. Fun. Played "Ghosts". Bed late.

1935 - Sun. Up for breakfast. Studied absolutely all day. Wrote up Physiology rpt's till I was blue in the face & finally finished about midnite. I will get them in to her tomorrow. Last Agora Vesper. Sad!!
1931 - Wednesday. Music lesson - Ex. Went to see A.H. but she wasn't there. Shinbys for dinner. Movie "The Royal Bed." Wallly, Geo. & Sally. Bed late.
1932 - Fri. School out at 3. Messed around. Went to baseball game at Y. I felt dumb. S.H.S. beat Ambridge. Movies & tennis with Sally tonite "But Flesh is Weak." Darn cute. Candy & Chilly L.
1933 - Sat. Awful classes. On bells this aft & Ginny & I sent out etc. letters to all kids. I got baseball, lacrosse & indoor b.b. Bets, Peanut & I to movies tonite & saw dumb ones. Home. Hair & bed.

1934 - Sun. Up for bekbets. Studied in a.m. Tennis with Steve & swam in lake. Gang. Waited supper. Canoed afterwards with Prill & Carol. More fun. Studied, letters, food (I hope) tonite & bed early (I hope)

1935 - Mon. Meeting tonite about Swimming Pool Carnival & now I'm to be head of it all!! It's swell, but I'm scared. Miss Elliott & Miss Beall took me to Seibers & treated me. Then I forgot notebook. They're so nice - especially Miss Beall.
1931 - Thursday. Jim, Dan & I went to see Sally as she wasn't at school. Ride. Visited Mrs. Van Pelt tonite & studied Physics.

1932 - Sat. Down to Mrs. Atchleys. Didn't go to town - rain. Bill here & we had a nice talk. Took Joey & him to Y. Bill, Jan Murdock, Sally, Joey & Wally here tonite. "Coffee Pot" - more fun. Bed late.

1933 - Sun. Up late. Chapel with Fairbanks & Mr. & Mrs. Smart. Drive. Dinner at Kimballs in Cohasset. Flat tire. Down to Scituate & visited Edmunds in Marshfield. Roslindale, Brighams(?) and home. Keen time!
1934 - Mon. Tennis at noon with Steve. Home & showered & washed hair. Fooled around all aft. Walked etc. with Prill. To libe tonite & did Phil. Home. Tired. Bed early.

1935 - Tues. Miss Beall & I to Suburban Press to see about Blue Book. He'll do it for $72.50 which is O.K. & will also make Dodgers(?) Last Archery class this aft & I only got a 222, which is sad. Better luck next year! Miss Schroeder is swell, but My neck won't go straight!! 'Nite.
1931 - Friday. Munny & I went to town for suit. Didn't get it. Bill here tonite. Was I thrilled? I'm crazy about that boy!!

1932 - Sunday. Up for church but didn't go. Bill, Wally & Joe here. In aft, Joey, Wally & I to North Park. Fun. Jim came! Grrr! Ride in rumble with Joey. More fun but cold. To Sally's & Jim finally left. Home - bed.
1933 - Mon. Last Physics lab. Did keen experiment on spectra & colors. Remembering yesterday's good time still! Fooled around in aft & didn't study much tonite. Bed late - sleep tomorrow! Whew!

1934 - Tues. Last Zo lab. Sad! Tennis at noon with Steve. Classes, Lacrosse game with Hyg. Students tied 2-2. Man about tennis racket. Prill's mother came. Both talked. Prill left. Talked with Andy. Bed late.

1935 - Wed. No lab today. Wrote & finished Chem paper. Only 1 more dumb Ed. class. To vill to see about Agora & Vespers. Then up to gym. Appointment with Pres Pen about Carnival & was I scared. I made a mess of it!! Also saw Miss Crocker this aft!
1931 - Saturday. Memorial Day! Watched parade from Mrs. Morgans. Sally & I sunburnt! Down to her house all nite!

1932 - Monday. Up at 8. To cemetery with Munny. Booful - McKallips. Wally & Bill & long talk at Nevins. Home. Read & studied. Wally, Joey, Sally & I to movies at Ambridge. Fun. Gave Joey my picture. Oh me!

1933 - Tues. Breakfast at Hole! Studied in a.m. Peanut & I for long bike ride this aft. About 20 miles! Baseball game. Ate huge dinner. To Hole again tonite for coffee & donuts. Ride with Pete & Kelly Wallace & Bets!

1934 - Wed. Up late. Ate with A.A. etc. bekbets. Tennis in aft with Miss Murphy & Leach. They beat Steve & me 3-6, 6-1, 6-2. Oh me! Swell. Got new racket. Canoeing with Andy & Janet. Charles. Swam. Fun. Tipped. Court after dinner & fooled. Mrs. Paschal & Miss Davies

1935 - Thurs. No Physiology. Sad. Did bells. Then tried to work this aft but not too much success. on final paper in Education. Worked on Blue book for A.A. Wrote 1 or 2 letters. Dempy & I to Outing Club. Swam a'la nature & almost got caught. Cooked grand supper. Then messed around till 8. Hicky El(?) took us both ways & it was grand!!
1931 - Sunday. Sally & I late for S.S. Bill here, but he doesn't like me. I wish he did! Studied & fooled this aft.

1932 - Tues. School again. Gave pictures away. Asked Chubby again for his. "Crazy Cook" in Solid Class. Stayed in for Solid. Took S. Campbell to Diehl's, gas station & home. Studied & read & wrote tonite.

1933 - Wed. Good old classes. Miss Hobgood spoke on Russia. Bill Nevin came this aft & I nearly fainted. Stayed an hour & was very nice. To vil tonite after the rain finally stopped. Ate dinner with Miss MacDowell. Talked. Good sport!
1934 - Thurs. Tennis at noon with Steve. Fun. Good new racket!! Did errands. Dobby for tea. Fooled around. Have become lazy. Wrote. Phil paper tonite & bed not too late.

1935 - Fri. Last Fri. classes of year. German I will have more of but thank God, no more Education. I have just about reached the limit! Dob & I did Chem problems this aft. Marian W(?) & I swam. Meeting of Swimming Pool thing tonite & I had to lead it. I was scared, but it was O.K., I guess!
1931 - Monday. Skipped gym today. Nassy! Nassy! Went with Sally to music & to movies to see
1932 - Wed. Down to Mrs. Atchley's in aft. Studied hard. Did oracle stuff. Got bawled out as usual in Latin. I might have gone to town with Sally. I think I did. My memory's failing me!
1933 - Thurs. Found out I couldn't have a (?) John came at 4:30. We all drove to Peanut's & had dinner, etc., and sat around & talked. Just missed an accident! Awful. Talked till 11.
1934 - Fri. The general! My what an ill atmosphere! Waited breakfast. Tennis at noon with Dobby. She won. Last Bible. Sad. Good lecture. Hate to have all last classes. Studied Bible for exams.

1935 - Sat. Last French class I'll ever, ever have! Oh gosh, di - I hate to think of it. To vill & then this aft I fooled & then started French chart. Bed early tonite & am prepared for quite a week next week!
1931 - Tuesday. Music lesson this aft. Last before tomorrow! My suit came! Am crazy about it! Party in Fr. for Terry. I gave little presents!

1932 - Thurs. In gym we had tests. Baseball throw 106 ft. Brd jump 13-2, 2 baskets, 4 chins & 12 seconds for rope climbing. English etc. Not asked to Prom, but found out Scotchy & J. Crooks both misinformed.

1933 - Fri. Last Fri. classes! Tough in French & Zo because I like Mlle Malbot & Mrs. Hobbs. John left after we got up at 6 at Trasks & came back. Canoed tonite with Peanut & Dobby. Laughed & Petty. Studied & had fun!

1934 - Sat. Last Chem lab. ½ hr. to Zo bldg. & got drawings. Studied Bible rest of a.m. & this aft. Swimming at 3:30. Studied a bit. Gang to movies tonite & saw K. Hepburn in "Spitfire" & a dumb mystery.
1935 - Sun. Up for breakfast. Did some Education review in a.m. Cleaned room etc. Then took German out by brook(?) & also bathing suit & got quite a burn. Studied German all aft & evening.
1931 - Wednesday. Physics! Man! Etc! Recital at Miss Moores. I played "Prelude" by Chopin & "Shepard’s Tale" by Nevin. Was I scared? "A Gentleman's Fate" with S.(?)

1932 - Fri. Nite of Junior Prom - Will I go? I hope!!! Due to J.C. & D.W. error I didn't go to Prom. Instead, Wally & Joey came over & we waited for awhile. Talked till 12 & Sally & Jim came for some gingerale. Boys left & all's well!

1933 - Sat. Last classes! Oh me! Characteristic English with me all embarrassed about theme! B+ in Physics quiz - I nearly died! Swam this aft with Peanut. Mrs. Hobbs & Miss Alderman there. To Lasell Sem. this eve. with Smarts.
1934 - Sun. Up for bekbets. Studied Bible & Zo in a.m. Zo all aft & evening. Oh me. To vil for a while to get a mite of food & air. Wotta life - till a week & 2 days from now!!

1935 - Mon. Up & did German in a.m. Sat out in sun a bit, but back is all red. Got Chem & Zo lab books & good on each! Then studied Physiology all aft & evening. Such is life! No exams till Thurs. but will I ever finish studying?
1931 - Thursday. Early to school. Geom. till 5:00. Came home. Studied. Bed late. Brod jumped 12 ft. 1 in & threw baseball 84 ft. Fun with Copy.
1932 - Sat. Sally & I to town in aft after I was at Mrs. Atchley's in a.m. for History. We messed around. Took Joey. Wally & Joey home! Dates tonite - Lost Babs. Movies, home & bed.

1933 - Sun. Slept till 8:25. Breakfast. Studied & had Hygiene hash parties all day. Bets & I on long walk this aft & again tonite for little. Moon & Jupiter close together & lovely moon - a week & 2 days!

1934 - Mon. Studied Zo in a.m. & finished it up. Spent all aft & evening on Bible. Betty Muther & I worked together tonite & I was exceeding tired. Milk & crackers & bed late. Wotta day & week ahead of me.

1935 - Up with the birds. Studied Physiology all day. To see Miss Moody about Germany. C on Ed. paper & I'm furious. Did Ed. with Prill tonite. Munny called at 9:30. Bill also talked to me!! Oh di! I'm so happy! He is so swell & I can't wait to get home etc.! Munny is so grand & always thinks of everything!
1931 - Friday. No track meet. Came home. Read. Washed hair. Shirley & I to Operetta tonite. Bed at about 11:00. Early to school - 7:30.
1932 - Sun. Sally & I to church. Joey read Responsive read. Wally carried flag & bill "ushed." Keen! Home. Studied. Joey came for supper. Left at about 10 & then I to bed.
1933 - Mon. Hygiene exam this a.m. Not bad. Dumb. Studied & went to vil & slept in aft. Dinner with Gentry. Studied after diner. Milk & bed early. These awful exams!
1934 - Tues. Big day. Bible exam in a.m. & I thought it was difficult. Zo this aft, a swell exam. Miss Leach proctored. Miss Murphy in afterwards & Dobby & I'll play tennis! Phil a bit tonite.

1935 - Wed. Oh gosh di! Will I ever have any exams! I'm going mad with waiting! Studied Chemistry & did problems all day till I was blue in the face. Finally night came. Bed & thot of Bill and this summer & Xmas etc.
1931 - Saturday. Got up at 8:00. Erranded. Took Sally to Horse Show. Dan, Allan & Russell Newbury took me to E. Rye's party. Bed at Sally's about 2.
1932 - Mon. Down to Mrs. Atchley's in aft. Stayed till 6:30. We've almost finished! Hard work. Sally & I cruised in Ford & then studied some more. Fixed dresses, etc. & bed.
1933 - Tues. Eng. Comp exam this a.m. Not so bad. Studied Physics all aft & evening. Oh! It's awful! Milk & crackers at 9:30 & I went to bed early. Letter to Munny. Week from today! Whoopee!

1934 - Wed. Studied Phil. all day. Tennis with Steve after lunch. Tonite, almost finished, so "L.B" Hobbs, M. Casselberry, M. Athenholt & I went to movies. Dumb. "Bitter Sweet"! Fun, tho' & bed late! Naughty! Munny called tonite while I was at movies. Was I mad? Oh dear! So sweet of her.

1935 - Thurs. Wotta day! Education exam in a.m. Thank God, no more Education! Chemistry this aft. It was pretty awful, but I guess O.K. Rested a bit till after dinner. Present. Then went at Physiology for a while. Bed at 9:30.
1931 - Sunday. Sally & I up at 11:00. Came home. Dinner. Studied from 2-7. Oh boy! Dinner now & bed later. (Can't wait till Wed!)
1932 - Tues. Trig class after school. I was late and took Sally home. Bill was here while I wasn't home. Darn old luck! Studied & Joey here. Got to bed at 12:15. Oh me! Cute.
1933 - Wed. Studied Physics all a.m., p.m. & evening! What stuff! I'm so dense & the heat is intense. Ginny got awful sideache. Infirmary. Present. Party for Miss Hall at Seiber's tonite.
1934 - Thurs. Phil exam this a.m. & it included everything. Awful hard! Back & did English Lit all aft & evening. Tea in parlor & fooled a bit. Beginning to weary of studying!

1935 - Fri. Studied Physiology all a.m. Exam this aft. Not too awful. Party for Seniors. Herman(?), too & we had more fun! Sang a song etc. Then ride on bike with Fairbanks & Dolly. She's going to Germany! German a bit tonite.
1931 - Monday. Came home. Got sand etc. Washed 10 pr. stockings. Worked etc. Can't wait till Wed!

1932 - Wed. Wore John's lacrosse sweater to school in aft. Track meet. I won broad jump (13.5) & high jump (4.7 ½ ) & got most points of girls, but Juniors won meet. Joey & Wally there. Joe brot flowers tonite. but was in bed. Darn!
1933 - Thurs. Studied French & Zo. Hot as blazes. Conf. with Miss Heyworth this aft. Hope. Did Zo with Betty all evening. Milk & graham crackers. Washed hair & bed early. Big, huge, yellow moon.
1934 - Fri. Studied all a.m. Rested. Lit exam & it was hard. Oh dear! I wish I could get better than a C!! Started right in tonite after tennis with Steve & did Chemistry all evening. Didn't get far!

1935 - Sat. Up early. German exam. Long & I didn't have enough time. Fairbanks & I into town this aft. Dinner & sherry at the Russian Bear. Saw "In Caliente" at the Met & then some drinks & then home on the 11:35 & in gay spirits.
1931 - Tuesday. Early for Physics. Went to movies with Sally tonite. "Born To Love." Gym meet. I got a first & 2 thirds. Broad jumped 13 ft 8 ½ in.. 3rd in 50 yd. dash & high jump.
1932 - Thurs. Refreshed today! Took flower to school all day that Joey brought. Chubby said I could have picture! English. Chubs, fun! Dentist. He hurt me. No Joey tonite; so I studied!

1933 - Fri. Studied Physics all a.m. Exam this aft & it was much easier than I expected! After 15 hours of study! Studied French with Peanut tonite & Speiker(?) bawled us out. Milk & graham cracks. Last tea after Physics

1934 - Sat. Studied like all heck. Barely finished before Chem exam. Awful hard!! Tennis with Dobby. Walk after dinner with Carol. Vil with Love-Bucket Hobbs & Peanut. Bed afterwards! Let down tonite after 5 exams this week!

1935 - Sun. Up for breakfast. Cleaned room for last time except the tail end. Studied most all day. Out in canoe for a little while. I feel as if all exams are all over. Only 1 more! Sat with Mrs. Paschal at dinner. Probably last time.
1931 - Wednesday. School in a.m. Hair & eyebrows (darn) at 2. Left with Mrs. M. at 5:15 train for Boston - Hurrah! Munny & I!
1932 - Fri. Kid day. More fun! S.A. Commencement. Nice. M.W. home. Got Chubby's picture. He signed it cutely! Sally, D. Walkingshaw, J. Crooks & I to movies, Bellevue C.S & home. Fun enough.

1933 - Sat. Studied French most all morning. Terrific heat. Exam this aft & I messed it up. A let down after Physics. Peanut & I to movies "A Bed-time Story". Rosemary walked home with me. Saw Mrs. Heyworth.

1934 - Sun. A bit relieved after strenuous week. Party for Seniors & Miss Murphy & Leach after Dobby & I played 'em to a tie. They're swell. Iced tea & great trouble, but 'twas fun!! Fooled tonite. Prill mad!!
1935 - Mon. Spent almost the entire horrid day studying French. Up to gym in rain & over to Alum to see Miss Stahl. Then back to Munger & studied like Hell for the exam! Finished my powerful chart!
1931 - Thursday. Got up 8:15. Arrived Boston 12. Andover - 1:30. John & his room are fine. Saw Bun. Class Day Exercises. Play "The High Road." Show(?).

1932 - Sat. Up at 8. Down for History until 4:00 P.M. Had car fixed. Home. Joey came. Both Joey & I to movies after supper. Sad! Ride. Cute. Home. We sat until 1:30. I R F H for fist real time! Oh my!

1933 - Sun. Up for breakfast. Studied with almost no clothes on! Bets & I to say G'bye to Mrs. Hobbs this aft. Such a good egg. Met Mr. Hobbs. Nice! Studied this evening. To vil with Bets & Marion Maynard. Peanut went home! Oh dear me! Sad!
1934 - Mon. Prill left at noon. Mad. Studied. No tennis. Dobby & I down to the Sanders to say G'bye to Mrs. Hobbs (as above!) She's still as swell. We had more fun. Stayed late. Home. Studied. Bed.

1935 - Tues. studied all a.m. on French. Finally exam came and I was in some muddle! Over to Barn after it was over. Celebrated tonite by beginning to pack & messing around. The end is about upon us, di & now I'M A SENIOR!!!
1931 - Friday. Commencement. Impressive. Lunch - Commons. Mrs. Eccler. Dinner with J.G. at Phillips Inn. Baseball game in aft. Al 5 Ph 2.
1932 - No church. Bill, Wally here. Jim F. came. Joey in aft. Ride with M.W. & Sally. Home. Made supper for Joey at about 8. He left right after. Washed hair. Studied. Bed early! "Looking Backward"
1933 - Mon. Up early & packed. Bets off at 11:40! Boo hoo. Zo exam this aft. Awful. Hot! Dinner with gang. All excited! Off at 7:30. Cute girl in lower! Slept well! Can hardly wait to get home!
1934 - Tues. Tried to study but it was hard. Exam - French, finally this aft. Not so bad. Fairbanks & I to Boston. Rain etc. but we had more fun. Durgin Parks & to Orpheum. Cab Calloway.

1935 - Wed. No more books! etc! Fee feeling except for Barn. Got (?) & we took over all the furniture today! Then played hookie this aft & went down Charles & swimming with Butsch & Walbron. Barn till 11 tonite & all a (?) about love-seats.
1931 - Saturday. Up at 10. Studied. Met Bill. Lunch at Manse. Ride to Lawrence. "Drive yourself." Exeter. J. Keeney - Boars Head Inn - ocean. Lots of fun.
1932 - Mon. Test in History. Got 98. On program in period. Chubby mad at what I said about "leaving out." Cute! History with Mrs. A. in aft. Took her down to Ambridge. Home. Studied.
1933 - Tues. Awful mess about Buffalo. Finally got underway! Excited! Cold weather. Munny met me & she's going to be married! Eke! I'm so excited & happy. Queer feeling. M.W. over tonite.
1934 - Wed. Waited breakfast. Back to bed. Packed a bit. To Alum after swell game of tennis with Murphy & Leach. We beat 'em. Barn all aft & evening. Tired tonite.
1935 - Thurs. Barn all day long - from 9 - 4. Then Vill with Prill. Took food over tonite to Barn, then bicycle ride with Fairbanks. Then home & packed & bed rather late!
1931 - Sunday. Got up early. Left for home. Grand time on train except for tonite. Two men talked & I couldn't sleep!

1932 - Tues. Last of whole days at school. No Health! Voted for girls etc in 10 min. period. I was one of 3, but won't win! Chubby & darling notes (3) in Study Hall. Pete mad! Hit etc. I'm crazy about him!
1933 - Wed. Munny & I to town in a.m & got dresses for wedding & hats. More fun! unpacked all aft. To M.W.'s & we went up for Sally. Gosh ogee! Home. Talked around. Movies & bed late.
1934 - Thurs. Up for bekbets. Packed. Tennis at noon with Steve. To vil etc with Peanut. Slept. Barn after dinner till late. Bed finally. Mother had called about Dammuddy. She is worse. Oh dear!

1935 - Fri. Up early. Meeting about Blue Book with Hickey Clarke & Butsch. Finally got it off. Then canoeing with Fairbanks - to vill. Barn after packing & the play was o.k. tonite. Crowd not large, but such fun, di!!
1931 - Monday. Got to school in time. French test in A.M. Also in aft. Studied for boards for 5 hours. Brrr! I hope I pass!

1932 - Wed. 1st of Half days. More Chubby hitting! History in afternoon. Also Biology practice. Joey & Wally in evening. Mad! Took them to Meriville. Sally & I to Gladys Hamiltons. Not home. Home! Chubby & baseball at S.A.
1933 - Thurs. Sally & I slept late. To town & got shoes & a hat. Played tennis tonite & Wally came for game of Anagrams! Met M. Trimble. Not so hot.
1934 - Fri. Packed frantically & Andy helped & then found out I don't go till Sunday. Worked around. People coming - Mrs. Carter & Prissy. Mrs. Britton etc. Orchesis. Barn. play

1935 - Sat. Up a bit late. Dolly had we some orange juice. Packed in all spare moments & rested! Barn again & we were hardened(?) by this time. Dear committee sent me flowers & was I thrilled. It has been such fun. Step-singing & I nearly cried at Alumnae songs. Parade in aft was good, but then was sad! Saw Tooly, Carol, W.K. Apple, Deeker Leich, Allie, Ruth Carter & Steve etc!!!
1931 - Tuesday. Early for Physics. Geom. in aft. Bed at 8:30 tonite. Oh! I'm scared for tomorrow! Ride with Sally in aft.

1932 - Thurs. All morning exams. Back in aft for Biology. History. Hair curled. Senior Banquet. Got Chubil. Chubby next to me. Going to give me gold basketball. Dance with Wally. Bill, John McCara, Chubby. Keen!

1933 - Fri. Up late. Served. Paid bills in village. Dammuddy & Aunt Nellie came. Said G'bye to M.W. in aft. Class Night. Only was last of it. Dance at Longvue with Jim C. Scotchy, Sally & I. Fun. Home, Bed at 2.

1934 - Sat. Got tickets etc. & finished packing. Alumni parade this aft. Sad - how old they get! Vil & fire engine house, etc. with Andy & Prissy. Carol & Steve about. Steve went to station with me & good-bye Wellesley till September. I'm now a Junior! Think of it, di!

1935 - Sun. Up to a flying start. Took furniture back & arrived late to corridor breakfast. After packing & dinner, G'bye to Mrs. Paschal & I felt awful. Train after Tooly, Prill & XP(?) & Fairbanks drove up. air cooled. Jane Murdock at N.Y. & pleasant trip.
1931 - Wednesday. Town all day. French in A.M. Got 67. Physics in aft. Got 48!!! I don't think I passed Physics (Boy I didn't!), but I do, French. Poor Charlotte - couldn't take Fr!

1932 - Fri. Up at 10. To town with Sally. Got her grad. present. Gave me mine. Class Nite practice. Cute talk with Chubby. History. Hair & bath. Joey here. Dana at Ambridge Country Club with Jim Crooks. More fun!

1933 - Sat. Bill at last in a.m.! Cute kid! Pitched horse shoes with Sally. Helped with (?) Jane Griffith dropped around. Ice cream cones [Sunday. Met Dan Miller tonite. Nice. He & Jim Crooks & Sally & I]
