1934 - Sun. Arrived in Harrisburg at last after a time in N.Y. station. Munny & Pop peaches! Dammuddy looks awful weak, but she didn't wander much. We stayed a long time. Sad, di!

1935 - Mon. Home at last. Munny grand. But Pop's liver, oh di, I got frightened! Hair-cut. Town about job tomorrow. Home. Anne Rose's wedding. Sat around after dinner & at last Bill came! Oh di. He's a swell as ever! Babs & Betty Terry came & then Bill 'n' Mon 'n' I . Kissed me good nite, di & I'm convinced!
1931 - Thursday. Public Speaking test in A.M. This aft. Geometry College Board. Got 81. It was awfully hard, but I think I passed.
1932 - Sat. Up at 11. Lunch. Down for History. Home. Rest. Supper. Studied. Down to Sally's & had nice talk. Ice cream & cake. Home. Read & bed early.
1933 - Sun. (Last nite - Wally & Anagrams) All of us to church. Sally & I to see Aunt Hat this aft. She seemed much better. I waited on dinner. Good supper. Eke(?) cooked both.
1934 - Mon. Munny & I went to see Dammuddy after I got me a hat. Fun. She was much better. This aft we went again and she was wandering. But she was also rational some. Aunt Nellie's a peach.

1935 - Tues. First day of work! Drove Bill up. Then to work. Miss Baily head. Miss Healy, sec'y Betty McKinniss, Sally Hall, Mr. Langor, Dr. Stock, Doc etc. Fun. It's all so different, but fun! Bill came tonite again. We sat on porch - Munny left & we kissed each other. The in & talked with Munny. That's what I like best. Bed at 11.
1931 - Friday. Had 2 tests today - English & geometry. Last this week. I need a rest now!

1932 - Sunday. Up at 11. No church in a.m. Joey here. Dinner. Studied & read in aft. Got supper for Dammuddy & Aunt Nellie. Church at U.P. for Baccalaureate sermon. Chubby spoke to me. Izzy Clark brot me home. Joey there! R. McCabe invited me to picnic, but couldn't go.
1933 - Mon. Bill here in a.m. Talked. He & I pitched horse-shoes. Eke & Sally watched. He won 27-12. Saw "Oliver Twist" tonite. Dan McC. behind us & was silly. To library & got books.

1934 - Tues. Rode all day after good-bye to Dammuddy. She looked & acted well this a.m. Oh! I fear old age, di. I hope, now that I won't live beyond 70! Home at last! Read & bed early. Babs called. Wally about.

1935 - Wed. First day to work on train. Rode with Dorothy Cook. Helped with urines. Went around with Miss Bailey & got blood. Helped count etc. Home on 5:35. Pop home tonite. He's a grand Pop, di! Miss Rowena so and so here tonite & sold us underwear. Bed 9:30.
1931 - Saturday. Bricky Rhoads' party. I got booby! Oh dear. I'm either real good or terribly punk! Fun with T or C.

1932 - Mon. Aft. tests at school. Hair cut short. Class Nite Rehearsal. Mrs Atchley's for History. Home. Studied. Joey here. Sat on back steps. Sally here. J & I planned keen Sat. nite. Took him home.
1933 - Tues. Tennis in am Jim Crooks took us swimming this aft. Awful sunburn. Doggone. Suffered tonite. Read & fooled. Bed late.

1934 - Wed. Up early. Messed around. To Babs' this aft & talked. She & Betty Terry & Rae Merril & I played bridge tonite. Bill here for first time before dinner. So swell. I can't help it, di! Merril's all rite.

1935 - Thurs. Rode in with Bill, then work again. Loads of fun. Pop 'n' Mom 'n Bill 'n' me tonite. They went to bed about 8:30 - from then till 12:15 Bill & I had wine & a session. It's so heavenly di & yet I get scared. He was so grand & we liked each other. I love him, di, I do don't I?
1931 - Sunday. Slept late. Drove with Sally in aft. We were way up in the country.

1932 - Tues. Brr! C.B's Up at 7. Went with Shirley & C. Davis. English easy. Got 67. Trig awful. I'm sure I failed. Got 36. Francis Ferguson & lunch. Class Nite. Was 5th. Chubby didn't speak. Home late. Joey, Wally & Bill here. Boxing match radio. Joey cute! Saw Aunt Hat.

1933 - Wed. Bill her in a.m. Darling! Sally & I to town in aft. Martha Ann Henderson. Met some girls. Ate a lot. Home tonite & tennis & Dan Miller came to see Sally. Ice cream cones & read. awful sunburn, horse-shoes.

1934 - Thurs. Up at 9. Home. Unpacked. Babs & Dan & I made cookies this aft. Bill here later. Went with me to get ice-cream. Still has his Chobil! Oh dear! Stayed for ice cream. Dan, Wally, Babs & I bridge tonite.

1935 - Fri. Work again. No bill on train! Did most of a count on a little colored baby boy. Miss Baily is very nice. Did a rush urine in a.m. Fun! Counted etc this aft. Let me out early. Home on 5:00 train with Bee & Charlotte. Wally for dinner. Alone. Bed at 9:30 after a call from Bill. He's so swell, di!!
1931 - Monday. School in a.m. John got home! Had Physics test & got 86! I nearly fell over. Last test of all.
1932 - Wed. Up at 10. Studied Biology. Town. Aunt Hats. Biology. Got 70. Think I passed but it was hard. Brought Joe Haley home. Ride with folks. Gas. Studied. Bed early.

1933 - Thurs. Town in a.m We got Munny's & Eke's wedding presents. Met Mary Smith & Marge Singleton. Liked them. Jane Griffiths & we all saw "When Ladies Meet." Darling. S & I "Hell Below" tonite. Bob Montgomery. Wally & Joey (?).

1934 - Fri. No Bill! To Babs & we called up about Scavenger Hunt for tomorrow nite. At last, all fixed up. Dance tonite at Edgeworth Club. Dan, Babs, Wally, Franny, Marth Curtis, Jim & Jim. Highball. Fun. G. & W. Home & bed - tired 1:30.

1935 - Sat. Bill & I drove to work. Easy day - not much doing! Then brot Miss Hall & Miss McKinness to city & picked up Bill. Unpacked this aft, then tonite Bill & I to Warner - Joey Brown in "Alibi Ike." Good. He bot Sauterne. Welcome home & drank whole bottle. (?) it, di! Then we sat & so froth till 1:15. I do love him, di. It was so grand to feel him so close!!
1931 - Tuesday. I ushered at Commencement. No prizes! J. Fullman, B. Jetter & E. Ruff won some. Home & bed early.

1932 - Up at 7. Took Joe Haley to C.B.'s. Latin in a.m. Got 62. Walked with Joe. Solid Geom. in aft. Got 28. Think I passed both. Ha Ha! (better) Home. Studied. Joey here. Real nice. Left at 10:45. Bed, washed hair.
1933 - Fri. Fooled around all morning. Slept most afternoon. Tennis tonite. Dumb Hal! Home. Ate. Read till late. Slept well. Wrote Dolly.

1934 - Sat. Up & got ready for Hunt. Cleaned up. Bill here in a.m. & sort of cross about party etc. Ride on motorcycle! Here again at dinner-time & out in garage said he liked m' dress. Party o.k. Babs, Wally, Dan & I together. Bill & Jane Terry - Oh dear! I still think she's awful dumb. Bed 2:30.

1935 - Sun. A diff story now from last year! Up at 11. Bill came. Sat & talked. Munny & Pop also. Dinner at 3:30, then nap, Bill came about 7:30 & stayed till 9:30. He looked so swell in his blue suit & white shoes. Pop left. I'm happy, di, 'cause I'm in love!
1931 - Wednesday. School for Chapel. Dance tonite at "Pines." Don took me. Jim, Franny, Sally. Richard Morroco, an awful pain.

1932 - Fri. History (U.S.) Got 73. Not so hard. Pinx's for lunch. Com. rehearsal. Next to Chubby! Darling. Commencement! Diploma at last! Chubby to car! No Joey! Great speaker - Dr. McGowan. 7th in class. Didn't win prize (1 of 3 business)

1933 - Sat. Asked Bill to dance Fri. Maybe he'll go. Jim Crooks called & took Sally & me to Penn to "College Humor." Ate at Stouffers. O.K. Home & Jim came in & he & Sally fooled on couch & I was bored. Finally left & bed!

1934 - Sun. Up late. Dinner with Wally. Bill came & we took back junk - also Ralph. Then got Janet Terry (grr) & we all swam at Windwood. Fun! Bill cool when we got back. Left & I wrote letters etc. tonite, di. I was disrepointed!

1935 - Mon. Up early again. Home. Walked to train & rode up with Bill! Saw first autopsy on a kid 7 ½ today. Quite an experience. Lunch with Franny. Home on 5 train & Bill 'n' Ginny brot me down. Then Munny & I to movies, Shirley Temple in "Our Little Girl." Good. Read etc. Up stairs with Munny & bed!! Bill's so grand, di!!
1931 - Thursday. Got up in time to get report. 1 A & 3 B's. Not bad, but a C in gym. Hoped pass boards!
1932 - Sat, Up at 7. Awful Scholastic Aptitude Test. Movies with Charlotte, Shirley & Betty? Home. slept. Cute date with Joey. Town. Movies. "Merrily, we go to Hell." Ride & home. Bed two.
1933 - Sun. Church with Sally. Bill here. Came after dinner & stayed all aft. Didn't do much. Papers on floor, etc. Dear me. Read tonite & talked with Munny.

1934 - Mon. Took Pop to Youngstown. Town with Munny & shopped. Hair cut. Up to see Izzy Clark & we messed. Bill here for few minutes. Honest, di, I've got to get over liking him so much 'cause he really loves J.T. Oh dear!

1935 - Tues. Took Bill up in car. Then another day at hospital. Urines. My blood test. Present of lollypops for Miss Martoff. Shopped at 4:40. Dressed. Bill came & we went to Charlotte's Bridge with her & B. Nevin. Loads of fun, but felt messy. Home 11:30. Bill seemed cool to & what have I done - or not done? Or was he afraid? I dunno! He looked grand, di -in brownish pants & the coat to his green & blue suit! And I looked lousy!!!
1931 - Friday. Down to Sally's in afternoon in a.m. with Munny. Met Virginia Brown. Nice & very quiet. Wears glasses.
1932 - Sun. Up late. Bill & Joe & Wally here. Down to Mrs. Atchley's with Crutchy this aft. She wasn't there. Home. Read. Joey came for supper. I fixed it. Stayed until 10:45. Real nice.
1933 - Mon. Bill here. Washed garage. Sally & I to town & got prizes etc. Saw "I Loved You Wednesday" at Warner. Keen. Bill & Dan & Eddy here all eve. Nice talk. Ate etc. Mix up about Friday.

1934 - Tues. Bill here in a.m. Slept in guest room! I felt good all day!! He's working 4-12 now, the shift I like! Thot we would go to movies, but rain. Instead read at home. Bed early. Wrote letters.

1935 - Wed. To station & rode up town with Bill. Lunch with Franny. Urines & then did work for Dr. Stock. Home on 5:35 with Joey, after at car with Mr. Laeger. Pop home tonite. Bill came. We had quite a long talk, more like the good old times! We touched on many subjects. Then we loved & he left at 11:15. I do like him, di & I will always love him!
1931 - Saturday. Sally's for supper. Dance at Shannopin with Jim F, Sally, Bill Jetter, Effie & D. McConnell, Jimmy Brown & E. Ruff. Chocolate Shop. Fun!
1932 - Mon. School in a.m. Oracle letter. Sewiki. (No (?) from Chubby! Boohoo!) Babs Merrill's bridge in aft. Fun. Ralph Miller's party with Jim F. O.K. Dan improved dancing. Home 1:30.
1933 - Tues. Munny married Mr. Conneely! Darling! Left for Wachopeague. Had a lovely birthday. Sally & I to "Reunion in Vienna." Good! Mac run over. Awful. Not killed, however. Munny called.

1934 - Wed. Babs here till late. Mom 'n' Pops 1st anniversary. Champagne at noon & Bill came & had some. Left soon. To Emery's. Then movies tonite after grand birthday dinner with Munny & Pop. Gosh! I hate to be 20! I fell gray! Dan, Wally & Babs here till late.

1935 - Thurs. Drove to work with Bill. Fun today. Got Pop's ann. present & home by 5. Grand dinner. Pop 'n Mom 'n I after I opened presents. Grand radio from Mom 'n everything! Jim came after a swell dinner. Bill in - oh so cool, di & he left right smack away! I felt it, di, but took it on the chin & stood Jim all evening, tho' I don't know how!! Wrote letter, listened to new radio.
1931 - Sunday. Slept late. Down to Sally's for present. Picnic with Emery's. Loads of fun. Home about nine & bed late.
1932 - Tues. Up late. Town with Joey after lunch. Bank. Aunt Hat's. Market. Home. Movies tonite with Sally - "Mouthpiece." Dumb! Home. Talked with Munny. Bed.
1933 - Wed. Mac better. Bill here for a while in a.m. Dan came this aft. Still a mess about Friday. Wrote letters & fixed diary. Dan came tonite & we talked over Friday.

1934 - Thurs. Washed etc. Munny & Pop to Butler. Awful about Collie being killed. Bill came. First good talk since I've been home. He & I took a ride in "Cindy." More fun! Talk about ideal home etc., etc. Swell! Tennis with Wally. Hot. To Babs' & all night. Bridge, Wally & Dan.

1935 - Fri. Up on rain with Bill. Jane had been at his house last nite. Oh me! Urines & then not much work till aft. Helped move out of Chem lab. Then helped Dr. Stock wash bottles. Then parts for Miss Healy. Fun. Dr. Stock brot me home. He's terribly nice, di!! Then up to Babs' tonite. Terry & Ginny McKibbon there. Fun. Home & bed 12:30!!
1931 - Monday. Dammuddy here! Hoorah! Charlotte for lunch. M.W. here. Washed stockings & bed at 11:30 about.
1932 - Wed. Bill came as I washed stockings. Nice talk. Sallly's party in aft. Fun. Joey came tonite & stayed till 11:15. Crazy fixing porch. Letter to Pegsie. Hope I can go.
1933 - Thurs. My luncheon & bridge. Hot as blazes. Fun. Good meal & fun at bridge. Dan came tonite & we played croquet. All decided about tomorrow. I go with Bill. Am I glad? Well I guess.

1934 - Fri. Babs & I shopped. Home. Bill here. Long talk. Home, love etc. & Jane came. Wine. Bill & I in Cindy & we got ice cream cones. Bricky's party. Phyl Agate cute! Fun. Dance at E. Club with Dan, Wally & Babs. Fun, but didn't see the good part. Washed hair.

1935 - Sat. Up with a sigh. Bill 'n I drove up to town. Half-day & didn't work too hard. Bill & I home again & then, me has Hives! How dumb! Bill here all aft, but he slept & so did I. No food to speak of. Wrote letters & bed early. These Hives itch & how!! Oh me!!! Got marks today. All B's & was thrilled!! Better than I expected.
1931 - Tuesday. Hot? Whewy! M.W. here. Effie, Sally, Jinny, etc. Am all excited about leaving at 11:15. Hooray!
1932 - Thurs. Weeded garden with Joey. Cute. Sally, Joey, Huston McCulloch for lunch. Picnic with Jim F, Jim C, & Sally. Keen! Supper. Movies, "The Rich are always With Us." Home. Food. Boys.

1933 - Fri. Jim F. got home. Went swimming at Dravo's with Shirley & Emery's. Fooled this aft. Bill here. Went with him to dinner at Fullman's & to Benefit at Club. Darling! Had a swell time. To our house for eats. He took me in car.

1934 - Sat. No Bill today. Town with Babs & Dan in Cindy & registered for summer school. Hot as hell! Home. Rested. Small supper. Babs, Wally, Dan & I to movies in town in Cindy. Ann Harding in "Vergie Winters." Good. Here & food & fun. Nite.

1935 - Sun. (Something like last year!) Up at 9 & bathed in soda. Did German. Bill here for a while. Awful peculiar di! I guess Jane has entered the picture again for sho!! Oh me! Charlotte here for a while. Hives better. Up to Babs' for a while. Then home. Read. Listened to radio. No Bill. Bed 10!!!
1931 - Wednesday. Met Peggy on train. Hot? Oh boy! Mignon & Nadine awfully nice. Swam as soon as we got here. Mosquitoes.
1932 - Fri. Waited around for John. Arrived while we were at Club. Ushered at Edgeworth Club benefit. Dance with Jim C. (Joey came.) Chocolate Shop, also Jim F & Sally. Fire & home about 2:30.

1933 - Sat. Up at 10. Ordered etc. Read. Washed stockings after lunch. Sat with Bill till Jim, Sally, Dan & I went to Windwood. Rain. Bill here when we got back. Also tonite. Bill leaves for Chicago! Sally & I (?) tonite. Gang. Bridge. Read. Mac home. Better we hope.

1934 - Sun. Up at 10. Bill here, also Lou, & John's two guests - Merrit Raley & Sis Brechin. Good guys. Bill cross at cocktail. To Bab's in aft & home. Sleep. Supper & John Keeney here. He's o.k. Read. Talked to young men. Bed!!

1935 - Mon. Saw Bill but queer, di! Then a full day at the hospital. Helped Dr. Stock again with media. 38 urines!! Jabbed a colored boy! Then home on train with Bill & more like himself & myself! Came this evening & was swell. Then Jim Crooks appeared & was very nice. He is awfully nice, di! But Bill left. I don't understand him!! And oh gosh, di - I love him so much. But there's no use in getting upset or anything.
1931 - Thursday. Got up at 8:30. had a grand time. Rowed, paddled, swam. Sun bath over at Annex. Got all wet. Tired now.
1932 - Sat. Up late. Down to Sally's in aft. Scotchy there. Fan belt broke. Movies in town tonite with Jim F, Sally, & Joey. "Hollywood." Good! Home. Joey stayed. Left late. Bed.
1933 - Sun. Up to late for church. Washed & ironed & got down for dinner. Peach ice cream. Rain. Dan & Jim here till supper time. Bill gone! Wally & Sally & I walked up street for cones. Read. Bed.

1934 - Mon. I guess Bill's mad. Saw cycle at Terry's as I drove to s. school. Dr. McKinley swell. Met Janet Slece, Bill ? & Martha Burns. Histology to be good. Home & stayed with Munny tonite. Washed hair. Bed. Got marks - 4 B's & 2 C's. 2 surprises & 2 disappointments.

1935 - Tues. Walked to station with Bill. Said he didn't want to cut in on Jim, the meany! Saw autopsy on syphilitic colored body. Not so bad. Beautiful syphilitic brain! Messed around. Home on 5 with Bill. It was fun, di. Then Babs & Terry came to talk about the affair demain soir. Munny & I together & bed 11:30!! Missed Bill, but wot the 'ell (?), I, shouldn't, I guess, see him all the time.
1931 - Friday. Swam. Rowed to Shield's Bay with Leta & Phil. Have a terrible sunburn now. Rowed alone also Nadine.
1932 - Sun. To Episcopal church with Aunt Nellie. Bill, Wally here. Slept all afternoon on account of intestine trouble. Joey here tonite. 2nd RFH & we had a keen time. Bed & Mr. Conneely (?)
1933 - Mon. Got my marks! All B's. Maybe I wasn't thrilled! Shirley's bridge-luncheon. More fun. Met Kate Bingham & Miriam …. Jim came after. S & I saw cute movie. "A Woman's Possession." Dan here.
1934 - Tues. 2nd day of work. Forgot my scalpel. Messed around. Got out early. Home. Rested. Dance tonite with Dan. To Franny's afterwards & ate & messed around. Dan peculiar. Bed 2:30. Tired.

1935 - Wed. Up on train with Bill. Not such a busy day. Home on 5 & Ginny R. brot us home. Then the big affair opening of bar. Franny, Terry, Babs, Charlotte, Bea, Walter, Bill, Dan & Joey. Fun. A couple got sick. I went up near the end & Bill & I sat alone for a while. I felt the influence! Babs here all nite. Bed about 3!
1931 - Saturday. Got up late. Rowed with Nadine. Incident of pajamas. Movies at Carling tonite Bed at 1:30. Went woodsing.
1932 - Mon. Wakened by firecrackers. Joey here in aft. Then he & Wally & firecrackers. Gang for supper. Franny's with Sally. Home & sewed & bed.
1933 - Tues. Up late. Read. Jim here & I worked. Picnic with VanPelts this eve. Fun! To M.W.'s. Home. Read. Bed. Fine - 1:30. Bomb. Huge blaze. Mr. Tallman & Austin. Met Chubby. Darling as ever.

1934 - Wed. My, the 4th! Bill here & I couldn't go to Washington. Damn. Isabill & I went to ball game this aft. Pirates lost. Dan, Babs, Wally & I at Merrill's tonite. (Bill rode by) Watched fireworks from hill. Bed 12.

1935 - Thurs. a holiday! Up at 10 with Babs. Huge bekbets. Bill came about 1 & stayed till 5. Talked & he moved radio upstairs. Then, down on (?) & he was sweeter & grander than ever. But he said & I thot that we shouldn't do this very often. Rested. Dinner. Wally in , but I couldn't go to Babs! Messed around.
1931 - Sunday. Slept late. Over at Annex & sat. Picnic supper on porch. Rowed in evening.

1932 - Tues. Up late. Stockings. Wally & puzzle. Saw Franny. Swimming with Sally, Charles McC., Wally, Babs, Joey & Fred. Met Chubby. Darling. Swam a bit. Again I like him! Fooled this evening. No one.
1933 - Wed. Up late. Took Dammuddy & Aunt Nellie to town. Shopped. Home. Bath. Cleaned up. Tennis this evening with Dan, Sally & Jim. More fun. Movies. Jim Crooks, Polly & us. Ate here. Bed.

1934 - Thurs. Dan & Babs & I to town in a.m. Shopped. Met for lunch. To school. Worked on slides. Took Janet down & stopped at Hornes for Challis. Home. Babs & I cooked dinner. More fun! Ride & home & bed early.

1935 - Fri. Walked to station & to town with Sir Bill. Another autopsy today, 9 mo. old colored boy - pneumonia. Dr. Stock very peculiar. Then home on train with Bill. He couldn't go to movies on account of boating, so Babs, Waller & I to see "Escapade" with Bill Powell & a new girl - Good! To Babs for whissey(?). Home at 1 & was I tired?!!
1931 - Monday. Peggy's birthday, gave her hankies. Picnic supper on Annex. Went for a row.

1932 - Wed. Up! Messed around. Picnic at Windwood with Jim F, Sally, & Jim C. Sally ill. Got sunburn. Home 6:30. Wally & Joey came & worked on Xword puzzles. Joey stayed after Wally went. Left about 12.
1933 - Thurs. Up late. Got picnic stuff ready. Left about 3. McConnells Mills - Wally, Babs, Jim, Sally, Dan & I. Car trouble. Rapids. Pickles, Ice cream. Rasputin. Slow ride home. Tired & happy.

1934 - Fri. And still no Bill. Kept late at school because of those d. slides. Pop home. Munny & Pop in bad humor. They left. I packed etc & bed early 'cause we have to get up early in the a.m. Off to see Dammuddy.

1935 - Bill, his father & I drove up. Bill funny, but (?) nice to me! Then work. Back to town & shopped. Then lunch. Home Bathed. Bridged at Sarah's with Terry & Babs also. Home. No Bill tonite & I was awfully disappointed. German & bed early.
1931 - Tuesday. Nadine's last nite here. Played fooey Hide & Seek. Girls went bathing after Marshmellow roast at nite.
1932 - Thurs. Up late. Brunch. Town to baseball game. Pirates lost 4-3, but good game. Dinner at William Penn with Eke & Mun! I drove. Rain. Home. Joey here. Stayed till 10:30. He was tired.

1933 - Fri. Tennis this a.m. Fooled in aft. Betty Dunsford's for dinner with John & A. Lousy time till Bill came late. Fun then. He was disgusted tho, I guess. Gosh darn, diary. I like him an awful lot!

1934 - Sat. Up at 5 & left for Carlisle. Arrived at 12. Munny & I to see Dammuddy. Weaker but rational. Rested. Munny & Pop & I went back again. A bit better. Johnstons & Aunt Nellie for dinner. Fun. Bed early. Rain, but still hot!

1935 - Sun. Up at 9. Bill came about 10 - the bum! But at least he asked me to a picnic Sat. Then said he might come back, but didn't. Oh me! But he wasn't at Terry's! Did German. Called up Babs. Listened to Amateur Hour. Then Pop left. Bed about 11. 'Nite!
1931 - Wednesday. Got my marks. Dagnabit! First nite in tent. Nadine left. Boohoo. Rowed & read. Airplane. Sail-boat ride. Mrs. Sheaffer came. Very nice.
1932 - Fri. Up at 10. Got C.B. marks. Munny furious. Town with M.W. Missed Aunt Hat. Shopped. Home. Tennis. M.W.'s for supper. Fooled. Munny called as Joey here. Stayed till 12:30. Did puzzle.

1933 - Sat. Bill here this a.m. Didn't think he'd come. Awfully nice. M.W's bridge & tea this aft. Fun! Jim & Sam Semione, Johnny Mayer, Charlotte, S. & I to town & saw Clark Gable in "Hold Your Man" O.K.

1934 - Sun. Up & said G'bye to Dammuddy. Sad! Old age, di! It's tough to think of. Home at 6:15 & Bill here. I was taken aback. But he left. Fight with Munny. Merrils & bridge. Walking home & Bill came along. Talked. Then home - bed 12:30. Ain't love awful?

1935 - Mon. Up on train with Bill. Had to work quite hard today. Dr. Stock & I made Media. Steam in kitchen took it all out of me. Then home. Met Helen Trout. O.K. Then home to Babs' After movie in Ambridge "Oil for the Lamp of China" Good. Bed late.
1931 - Thursday. Walt Coles' family came. Bertha nice. Rowed with Mignon & Peggy to Footes Bay. No mail. Boohoo.
1932 - Sat. (I'm mixed up) Joey came tonite & we went to Street Fair. I won a cute lamp. No rides. Walked. Home & Xword puzzle until late.

1933 - Up late. Bill came before dinner. Ice cream. Here all afternoon. Cute. Wally had me embarrassed. Legs on pillow. Dan came. Supper. Dan & Jim & Shirley & M.W. & Jim's friends in tonite. Hilarious.
1934 - Town at break of dawn - 9 a.m. & worked at school 6 ½ hrs. running up some tissue. Mistake - I guess. I stayed home & moped about. Wrote a couple of letters etc. Nuts!

1935 - Tues. Babs & I up & to work. Drove up with Bill. Lunch in Pittsburgh with Sally Hall. Betty drove us down. Home. Dressed. Bill & I to Babs. Dinner. Trout. Dan, Walter, Babs, Terry, Jane, Bill & me. Fun. Played Monopoly - Fooled. Bed late!
1931 - Friday. The Cole's left. Bob & Harry went to Gravenhurst & didn't get back. We miss them. Gibby is only man now.
1932 - Sun. To Sunday School. Walked home with Bill. Nice. M.W. over in aft. Talked. Got supper. Joey came. Took M.W. home. Movies in Ambridge. Home. Talked. Munny mad. Bed.

1933 - Mon. Had hair-cut. Tennis. Awful Sam Simons. Town with S. & lunch with Mary South, M. Singleton & J. Griffith. Fun. Move "King of Jazz." "Looking Forward" Dan & Jim here tonite. Franny came. Movies. Tea. Bed.
1934 - Tues. Lunch early & town early. Again worked long time in lab. Not so long as yesterday. I miss Bill these days. Mended a bit in the a.m. & cleaned up room. With Munny tonite & bed early.

1935 - Wed. Up & walked home in bedroom slippers for shoes. Then up on train with Bill. Stayed in after work. Dinner at Stouffers with Trout, Terry & Babs, then Stanley. "People Will Talk." Charlie Ruggles & Mary Boland & at last home.
1931 - Saturday. Boys didn't arrive till late. We went rowing & swimming. No sun.
1932 - Up & played tennis with M.W. in a.m. Won. Fooled in aft. Hair cut & waved. Down to Sally's after supper. Saw Chubby at Isaly's. Sally & I to bed early after Street Fair. Read story. Bed.

1933 - Tues. S & I to Crutchfields for lunch. Awfully nice on porch. Ottie had bridge & tea at the Club in aft. Loads of fun. Jim Pullman(?) & Dan here tonite & we had croquet & then bridge. Bed late.
1934 - Wed. Lunch early & worked 4 hrs in lab today. Loads of fun but patience needed. Dan, Wally, Babs & I to Warner to see "Lets Try Again" & "Cockeyed Cavaliers." Fun. Home. Ice cream & cake.

1935 - Thurs. Up on train with Bill. Then to work. Did a lot of urines. Then helped Dr. Stock most of rest of day. He drove me home. Then thot I'd go to bed early, but Jim came & stayed till a little after 10. Then bed! John home tomorrow!! Be glad to see him!!
1931 - Sunday. Got up to go to church, but no one went. We read. "Jane Eyre" is good. I cried over sad part.
1932 - Tues. Up at 10:45. Fooled with Sally till lunch. Tennis with M.W. Won. Movies tonite with Joey. "Letty Lynton." Good. Bent fender. Ice cream twice. Joey, Wally & I talked. Bed 12:30.

1933 - Wed. No tennis as expected. Worked & fooled around. To Franny's bridge party tonite with Dan. Keen. Pink dress. Bill there. Danced 3 times. Grand. I love his dancing! Ride. Sam S. followed. Fun! Bill yelled. Bed late.

1934 - Thurs. To town to dentist. Bill here while I in town. (Bitter) Worked 4 hrs. Dr. McKinley no longer likes me. Bill Jetter came for a talk after I had finished a letter & was listening to Rudy. Bed 10:30.

1935 - Fri. Another hard day of work. Helped Dr. Stock again & fun ! Missed Bill on train & thot it may be he's sick. But he came tonite. Yes, di, he came & I had to go to Merril's for bridge. Fight with family about car & I was ashamed of myself after so many dresses, hat, etc. and so home late & to bed & I was miserable. I missed a night with Bill & Monopoly & Jane was there & I had that fight. Oh gosh, di - what is the use?
1931 - Monday. Harry has fallen for Mignon. Tonite we all went rowing. It certainly was funny but I'm crazy about that boy!

1932 - Wed. Up & played tennis with M.W. in a.m. Swimming at Camp Horne(?) in aft. Neatzy! Movies "Careless Lady" with Joey tonite. Grand! To Fair. Ride on Heydey. Met with Wally. Home & talked. Walked to Chale & saw Chubby in white linen suit!

1933 - Thurs. Had to get up early to no avail. S & I went to Betty Terry's bridge this aft. Loads of fun except for Ottie & Mugs Miller. (Bill has been here). Wally, Bill Jetter, Dan here tonite. Bridge. Fight. Hair (?) 1st movie with Dammuddy's crowd. "Secrets" Good.

1934 - Fri. Town & dentist again. Filled teeth. Ate lunch with Jane Griffith. Fun. Out to school. Janet not there. Worked hard. Babs & I got dinner. Then Wally & Dan came. We all saw "Sadie McKee" at movies. Cute. Back to Babs' & messed about.

1935 - Sat. Oh what a time. Bill & I up in C.G's car & then work. Finally thru & home. After much discussion etc, picnic with Richardsons & Bill Murdock & Miss Reed at McConnell's Mills. Home after grand time & Monopoly up at Richardsons. Home. 11 & then to bed. Oh gosh, di - I love him so much, but always the business of Jane etc. What to do!!
1931 - Tuesday. Went woodsing in morning & swimming this afternoon.
1932 - Thurs. Messed around in a.m. Swimming with M.W. & Sally in aft at Camp Horne. Dance there with Jim Crooks tonite. Awfully nice. Home & bed late.

1933 - Fri. Worked around. Munny & Eke arrived at 2! Whoops! Tea at Noakers. Fun. Also tea at Bricky's awful nice. Sally to dance with Dan Miller. Dan here for a minute. Bill & Joey here. Bill darling! Joey stayed.
1934 - Sat. Up early. Worked. No Bill. I'm discouraged about this point. Movies with Isabill "30 Day Princess." Darling. Shirley there. Isabill & I ride & talked for hours. Home. Late dinner. Bed.

1935 - Sun. Up at 10. Read & Bill came about 11 & stayed till 5:30. Charlotte & Walter also here for a while. Crazy. We all felt lazy. Then Bill & I talked & read magazines. he's so swell, di. I dunno. I shouldn't keep saying it, I guess! John arrived about 8 & brot Peg Mitchell. My first impression was very good. I like here a lot. John is certainly in love. What fun. Listened to radio - bed early.
1931 - Wednesday. Doris, Franky & Walt left. We girls drove to Bracebridge. (Peggy stalled 2). Misses Porter & Baldwin came.

1932 - Fri. Up late. Brunch. Circus! Nertzy. Got a chameleon. Movies "Huddle" with M.W. Her place all nite. Guild Hall struck by lightning. Big fire. Joe Cook talked to me. Saw Joey or "Curls." Bed. Nervous.

1933 - Sat. Town with M.W., Franny, S. Lunch & "Storm at Daybreak." Good. Dance at Shannopin tonite with Dan. More fun fighting. Silly. Last dance with Bill. Divine! "Lone Wolf." Dan loving! Breakfast at Babs. John et. Bridge. Bed 4.

1934 - Sun. Up early & fixed up house. Bill came as I ate bekbets. And then Wally. Nary a chance for a talk. Jane & K Cuthbert, Wally, Bill here for dinner. Swimming with Wally & Babs. Dan came later & bridge at Merrills. Fun!

1935 - Mon. Hard to get up & go to work. But did. Worked like Hell. Mrs. Hap & Ki in for a while tonite. Bill also. But he left when the eclipse of the moon started. It was good. Mom & I watched till after midnite. Bed & tired.
1931 - Thursday. Put pepper in boys' beds & fixed pajamas. Went to movies & saw "3 Faces East." Dumb. Harry took Honey & I was lonely.

1932 - Sat. Up at 8:30. Still excited! Home. Washed hair, stockings. Sewed. Bill here! Street Fair with Sally & family. Keen. Saw Chubby! Cute! Full moon, but no Joey. Came home from Sally's. Bed early.

1933 - Sun. Up hideously late. Sally packed. Gang here to say G'bye. Bill awfully nice on porch! We all rode to town. Sally off - darn it! Dan, Bill, M.W. & I bridge tonite. Fun. Bed early. Mrs. Townsend called up & I'm to go to Canada Tues. or Thurs! Whoops!
1934 - Mon. Up early. Mess of dishes. Town. Took Dan & Clare Nevin. Worked. Lunch with Dan. He was awful nice! Work again. Brot Clare & Challis home. Mom 'n' Pop 'n' I fun tonite.

1935 - Tues. Up on train with Bill. Quite a day at the lab. Worked. Lunch in kitchen. Home in (?) Then, after dinner Bill n I sought elderberry blossoms, came home & peeled them. Then he left. We talked di, all about men & women - very illuminating. Munny & I up & to bed after a talk.
1931 - Friday. Mignon & Harry together all day. I got homesick tonite with noting to do. Better now. Harry taught Peggy & me diving.
1932 - Sun. To S.S. with Sally. Home. Read. M.W., Franny & I to Pinx's in aft. Met Gerry. Cute. To M.W's for supper. Good. Shirley came. Sang & home late. Joey had been here & gone. Oh dear!
1933 - Mon. Bill came after I got home from town shopping. Darling! Played horse shoes. He had to leave. Said G'bye to me! Oh dear! M.W & I horsed around tonite. Ran into gang at Legion fair.
1934 - Tues. Up early. Baked a gingerbread, not bad. School & last day of making slides. Home a mite late & got supper with Munny. Bed early. Getting late now. (I miss Bill!!)

1935 - Wed. Up & to station & train with Bill. I was (?) today but worked hard. Then home on 5 with Bill. He came for dinner. Munny in Washington. We fixed elderberry blossoms. Then we were together on C.C. (T.L. di & only) - I hereby vow to always, only, and never anyone but Bill. He was so nice, di & we had a grand talk. Someday we will!! Oh gosh di. Did that slip or did he mean it? I hope so! I'd never want to marry anyone else! --so help me!
1931 - Saturday. Mignon left. Boo hoo! Harry, Peggy & I are lonesome. I got ducked with my clothes on by Bob. Glasses broken, but no other damage.
1932 - Mon. Down to Sally's & sewed pajamas! Stayed for lunch. Swam at Camp H with Bill, Sally, Fred & Sam Fader. Fun. Movies at Cosy with Joey tonite. Station. "Nice Women." Home. Left early.
1933 - Tues. M.W. & I rode around this aft. Ran out of gas. Date with Dan tonite. He & Babs & Wally & I to movies. "Eagle & the Hawk." Good. Home. Bridge. OK. Dan's right nice, but Bill! Oh dear!
1934 - Wed. Sunned in a.m & Bill came. I hardly ever see him now. Talked a while & then left. School. Worked on study of slides. What fun. Home & talked with Munny & bed early. Cool.

1935 - Thurs. Kept thinking of yesterday all day & worried a bit. Drove up & back with Bill. Town with Sally Hall at noon. Bill in & out. Then down to Joey's & tennissed. Sets 3-6; 3-6;8-6. Fun! Movies "Naughty Marietta" - again. Good. Home late. Joey's so cute & just as nice as can be.
1931 - Sunday. Sailboated with Pardow's in a.m. Read & in aft got aqua-plane & went for rides. Swam tonite in nature's clothes!

1932 - Tues. Up & to Sally's & sewed on pajamas. To Pinx's in aft for bridge. Sally's this evening. Home. Jim Crooks, Wally & Joey here. Wally stayed on. Then old meany. Bed early & fixed you, diary! Bill here at noon. Real nice about dance.

1933 - Wed. Packed. Munny, Eke, Wally & I to double-header this aft. Won 1 & lost 1. Great! Home late. Supper. Off to New Brighton with Wally & Babs. Saw Weedy(?) & Bob. Be off tomorrow! Dammuddy & Aunt Nellie left. Sad.

1934 - Thurs. A bit more sun in a.m. Town in aft. Harry Litman very nice. Seminar - Good. Or rather dumb. To Babs' tonite. Bridge. Marg Campbell, B. Terry. Dumb. Dan came. Wally late & Wally's first day of work.

1935 - Fri. Up on train with Bill. So nice, di. Worked hard all day. Punched a couple of kids for blood. Found out Dr. Stock's engaged!! Home with Bill n Charlotte. Great rain. Munny met me. No Bill tonite.. down to Emerys & great fun, really , bridging. Home. Ice cream with Katy. Bed early. Letter from Prill! Tomorrow??
1931 - Monday. Tonite we were to go for ride, but Peggy & I hid. Naughty! I wrote letters & fooled around.
1932 - Wed. Stayed home. Rested. Washed hair. Bathed. Read. Dance at "Pines" with Jim Crooks tonite. Scotchy & Sally. More fun. Intense heat! Home 1:30. Oh me. Gingerale.

1933 - Thurs. Up early. Met Judd Youtes. He & I drove. I very little. He is awfully nice, but that's about all I can say. Drove all day. (?) & Mrs. Townsends. More darn fun. Got to Onillia at 10 & stayed here all night.
1934 - Fri. School on time. Awful punching of fingers for blood. Dan, Franny, Jim & I to Lib Crampton's and dance at Club. Too hot. Ride. Home. ate. Fooled & finally bed a bit late.

1935 - Sat. Drove to work with Bill. Morning flew by. Then home & Munny had 2 dresses for me! Then Bill, Bert, Dan, Babs, Marion Sarchet & I picnic to McConnells Mills. Loads of fun. Sun great. Back to Babs about 8. Home 10. Bill, Bert & I gingerale & cake. They left early. Bed & now am I tired?!!
1931 - Tues. Drove to Bracebridge got candy etc. Swam & sewed in aft. Tonite, Harry (dear boy) paddled & took P & me for ride in Idyllook!!!
1932 - Thurs. Took Dammuddy & Aunt Nellie to station. Home. Luncheon in honor of Jerry & Pinx. Swimming. Fun. Home. Wally, Joey, Sally & Scotchy here tonite. Fun & bed 12! & you!
1933 - Fri. Up early. Breakfast in Orillia. On to Footes Bay. Arrived noon. Peggy & Betty swell. Met Marian Murray - "Chico." Betty & Judd (?) He's young, but nice. Good old Muskoka. Swimming, etc.
1934 - Sat. Oh for a year ago! Hot as blazed. Cleaned bar. Franny's for bridge party with Babs. Loads of fun. Dan, Babs & I to "Operator 13" tonite & got Wally. Bar cool & we talked. Bed 1:20

1935 - Sun. up at 10. Bill came about 11:30 & stayed till 5:30. New Palm Beach suit & he looked awful nice. Read etc. Lazy day. He still hasn't mentioned Jane, di, but I got him worried. I still don't think Mother likes the idea. It hurts so, di, because she doesn't like any of my friends & I don't know what she thinks about Bill. The only thing she likes is that I'm in college. It makes me feel simply lousy & almost awful whenever I think if it, di. But it's no good to change I can't - so help me!!
1931 - Wednesday. Rose at 8:45. Cleaned shoes etc.
1932 - Fri. Swim at Camp Horne this aft with Sally, Joey & Mary Wells. Fun. Home. Fixed for supper. Buffet supper. Franny, Sally, M.W. & I & boys. Keen. Dance at E Club. Ride. Home. 3,4,5 HFH.
1933 - Sat, Swan a kit, Great to be here. Expected to go to dance but didn't. Fun tonite with Judd, our Sultan. His harem. Sill as heck. Oh dear. Bed late.
1934 - Sunday. Up early. Bill came again. Don (?) Stayed for quite a time & we talked. More like old times. Supposed to have date with Dan tonite but he didn't come. Swell! Oh me. Read till late.

1935 - Mon. To & on train with Bill. Walked across bridge. Worked all day, hard. Gosh, I love it, di! Punched another kid for blood. Home on 5 with Charlotte. Franny & I to movies after lost supper with Pop. HC leaves for Calif. Saw "No More Ladies." Bill had been here. He went to movies & came back & we had another swell talk, on many subjects. Pop left & 'twas sad, 3 whole weeks!! Bill stayed till 11:45. We fixed porch & then he kissed me G'nite & I love him so much!! I can't help it!!
1931 - Thursday. Believe it or not. I was in Canada & I wish I were there now swimming because I am hot. July 21, 1932 12 P.M.! Rain & a little relief! Oh me!

1932 - Sat. Up again will & played tennis with M.W, Conant Buckmaster & Rinehart Thieson. Riney & I won. Took boys to town. To see Aunt Hat. Not home. Movies tonite with Joey. "Mouthpiece." 6K FH Oh me!
1933 - Sun. Great day. Sailed this aft with Bill Steele, Chico, Judd & Betty. Storm. Stayed at Steeles. Supper. Swim. Horse-shoes. More storm. Everybody worried. Search. Home at last.
1934 - Mon. Up & to school early today. Messed around. Cleaned house, too. Babs & I cooked dinner for Munny. To Walkers for dark cow. Down to bowl. Dan out. Home. Bed early.

1935 - Tues. To station & train with Bill. Then record of 74 urines today. Did a couple of bloods & counts. Present today & I was glad, but early! Home on 5. Bill & Charlotte. Then called Babs & I was dead tired & couldn't go to Rickey's. But Bill came. Munny & he read & I did German - till 10. Then we talked till 11:15. He lay on my lap! Kissed me g'nite again & it all seems deeper than ever. Di - I'm really happy again!
1931 - Friday. Big fight with H. Peggy & I were ruined after nearly being thrown in lake. "Hot & Cold."
1932 - Sun. Up very late. Bill & Joey here. To Mary-Wells's in aft. Fun. She came for supper, also Joey. We all went to Ambridge to movies. "Case of Clara Deane." Good. Home. She stayed all nite!
1933 - Mon. Honey arrived. All went to party at Marg Wheatons. Swam. Ate. Played Ping Pong. Home late. Played bridge tonite. Bed late.

1934 - Tues. Tennis with Wally in a.m. He beat me 7-5. Lesson & town. Nasty policeman yelled. Isabel & Catherine Clark rode in with me. Babs' grandmother died. Sad. Wally & I to see Babs. Little ride. Home. Bed.

1935 - Wed. Drove up today. To Hornes to be fitted at noon. Then, Franny, Bill & I home. M.S. home & called up! Bill & I to Stanley to see Grace Moore in "Love Me Forever." Good. Home. Munny & he & I read. Then we sat on Pops chair & again we were naughty. But, ok di, it makes us love him all the more. I love him so much, I could just die!! Nit, di!!!
1931 - Saturday. Misses Baldwin & Porter left. Frankie & Walt back. Stayed up till 10:30. H. pushed me in lake 2 times, but not with clothes.
1932 - Mon. Up & took crowd to Dravo's for swim. Back to MW's for lunch - bridge. Almost won booby! Home. Movies "As You Desire Me" with Joey, Sally & her mother. He stayed till 11:30. I'm dead!
1933 - Tues. Up late. Cleaned path to Nellies. Fun. Went aquaplaning with Gubby this aft. Couldn't get up 1st time. About ruined. Fun. Tea. Monkeyed tonite.

1934 - Wed. Helped clean house in a.m. Tennis with Franny. Beat her 6-2. Town. Tonite Babs & her cousins. Don & I took Jim S. to town & showed it off. Stouffers for drinks. Babs better tonite. Home. Bed late.

1935 - Thurs. Train with Bill. Then to work & Uncle Mose felt badly! Did a whole mess of blood punching & included Jean Dobbs the Strep meningitis! Then home on 5 with Bill. Saw Lou & Chubby!! Imagine! Up to M.W.'s. She is home. Went to movies in Ambridge. "The Woman is a Devil" Home Bed!! Tired!! So good to see M.W. She makes me restless, but I'll always like her terribly much!!
1931 - Sunday. Swam in morning & aft. Finished Ariel by Maurois. Piddled around in evening. Ride & Harry's darned silliness Phlt.
1932 - Tues. Down to Sally's & sewed. There for lunch. Town & shopped with M.W., Sally & her mother. Home. Movies "Dark Horse" in Ambridge with M.W. & Dossie. Home. Bed early & you!
1933 - Wed. Swam all a.m. This aft Phyl & I swam from sand bar home. Swam all around. Bridge tonite. Lou Campbell, Sam Fader & Henry Nevin tonite.
1934 - Thurs. Worked on house. Then town early to work. Next to last day! Swimming tonite at McKnights with Franny, Babs, Wally, Don & Joey. Here for eats. Talked. They left early & I bedded early.

1935 - Fri. Up on train with Bill & said G'bye to him. Worked hard. Saw an autopsy on a baby girl - 11 mo. who had co(?) & broxcho-pneumonia. Got blood etc. Then Munny came & we were off to Carlisle at 3:30 or so. Arrived 10. Talked with Aunt Nellie. Then to hotel & bed.
1931 - Monday. Washed clothes. Down to Carling in aft to regatta. Fun with H. He's a dear. Had a ride in one of Gravette's speedboats. Fun.
1932 - Wed. Down to Franny's. Swim in rain & luncheon at her house. Fun. Supper at Mary Wells's. Strip Poker. Bed early. Read fooled & ate. Sleep late & dead tired! Sewed hem on her dress!
1933 - Thurs. Present. Mignon & I paddled to Arma. Rowed around in aft. Played bridge tonite & learned a lot (I hope). Ate in kitchen & to bed late.

1934 - Fri. Up early. Town early & finished work. Dan in for a min. Janet, Don, Murphy, Joe F. & I lunch at Isaly's. Fooled. Sprinkler. Test. 2 wrong out of 25. Joe 1 wrong. To Janet's Tea. Fun. Home. Letters. Pa home. Bed early.

1935 - Sat. Up. Breakfast at Molly Pitcher. Munny & I got Aunt Nellie & took her to Hershey. Quite a grand place. Mom loved the snakes at the zoo. Then to Johnstons tonite for dinner. Awful nice but Jean is (?) Talked & then back - left Aunt Nellie. She is so nice, di! I hope I’ll be as nice as she if I live that long!
1931 - Tuesday. Went to Carling. Saw "Father's Son." Rode home in rumble with H. We talked whole way. He certainly is interesting. Movie good.

1932 - Thurs. Down to sew on pajamas in a.m. after M.W. & I rose. Lunch at home. Town with Sally, M.W. & Franny. S & I to Aunt Hat's for supper. Home. Joey & Wally here. John, too. Sally & I to bed at 11. Admitted to Wellesley. Whoppie!
1933 - Fri. Fooled on Lock in a.m. Winslow's picnic this aft. More fun. Paddled. Lovely little island. Good supper. Home late after much fun.

1934 - Sat. Up at 4:45. Off to Carlisle. Pop in a huff at first. Dammuddy much better! Will be able to come home in about a week. Nice visit. Aunt Nellie for dinner. She's a swell guy! Bed early. Dead tired!

1935 - Sun. Up at 8:30. Over to Mooreland & said G'bye to Aunt Nellie. Mom n I drove on home. Got here about 5:30. Bill supposed to come but didn't. German & Jim came. Joey & Walley also (?) the evening & played Monopoly & watta game! Missed Bill, oh so much!! - 2 days now!
1931 - Wednesday. Gubby worked on steps. Bum job.

1932 - Fri. Sally & I up late. Finished pajamas. John to hospital & had operation for appendicitis. Getting along fine. Poor kid! Messed around. Joey here. Left early. Fixed college schedule. Letter to Jim & you!
1933 - Sat. Went to unexpected dance tonite after Lon was here to see Chico in the aft. Stuck with Hank & had a grand time. Home & sherry refreshed us. Bed about 2.

1934 - Sun. Saw Dammuddy. Wandered a bit. Said G'bye, also to Aunt Nellie. Came on home. Mom 'n' Pop 'n' I. Arrived about 6. Dan & date forgot to show up. He's nuts. Bill had been here at noon. Oh me. 'Nite.

1935 - Mon. Met Bill & Lou at station up on train. Worked hard today. Did all urines alone! Helped also with blood. Home with Bill. Then he & I fixed elderberry wine. Aliquippa. Louise & about Terrys. Oh gosh di! And then, Munny to Uncle Sams at 10 & till 11:15 when Pop called, all was too sublime. We were naughty but that Philosophy about youth only once etc!! I hope we can always be naughty without being evil. He left at 11:40 & then me to bed & I think he's too grand, di! 'Nite.
1931 - Thursday. Dance at Casino of Cleveland House. Bob best dancer. H & Walt nice, too. Hard time getting there. Discussion about nature etc on way home.

1932 - Sat. Up early to see John. Getting along fine. Worked around. Bill here. Real nice on porch. He & Wally & I chocolate milkshakes. Joey & I to Cory station & movies "It's Tough to Be Famous." Movie good. Home. Bed late. Tired!
1933 - Sun. Up late. Brunch. Steele boys came this aft & stayed for dinner. Met Glenn Wilton , Murray's brother. Lou Campbell was around to see Chico. Horse-shoes. Punt Archery. Dancing. Bed late.

1934 - Mon. New course - Embryology today. Promises to be good. Five of us now. 3 boys & 2 girls. One boy asked me to show him to book store. He's awfully nice. Comes from Steubenville. Nicest one yet. Babs, Wally, Dan & I bridge tonite. Bed 1.

1935 - Tues. My I felt lousy today. Stomach trouble & diarrhea but I went to work. Bill so sweet about everything. Then worked pretty hard. Did 3 counts & took the blood entirely alone. Home & felt lousy; so bed at 7:30 for about 12 hrs sleep. 'Nite!
1931 - Friday. Drove down to Gravenhurst with Walt, Frankie, Peggy & Weeze. Others left us. Fun rowing! Ate lunch at Orillia. Bot pants. Oodles of fun. Walt is a peach.
1932 - Sun. Up real late. Bill here. Also Wally. Bill cute. Saw John in aft. Better. Joey here. John again in eve. Sally, Joey & I chocolate milkshakes. Bed early. Hair wash. Sore throat.
1933 - Mon. Sun bathed & washed socks all morning. Out again this aft. Lou took Chico to dance tonite. We all fooled around, pitched horse-shoes, etc. Drank more sherry. Good.

1934 - Tues. Worked on dress. To school & still didn't learn the new boy's name. I don't know whether or not I like him. Harry Lipman nice. Oh gosh, di - I miss Bill!!! Messed around tonite. Babs & Charlotte. Boys here.

1935 - Wed. Bill & I up in car to town. Felt refreshed. Asked him for his picture but don't know, di! Worked hard. Little Jean & Dobbs so cute! Home with Bill & he's so damn independent, di, about Friday! To M.W.'s for dinner & then she & Munny & I to club for to watch tennis. Munny joined the pool for me. She's so swell di, always doing such things, and so in love with Pops.
1931 - Saturday. Regatta at Country Club. Boat races. Dance tonite, but I was too tired. Bed early & darned sorry I didn't (couldn't) go!
1932 - Mon. Haircut. Town with Munny. Shopped. Home. Visited John. Baseball game. Got a checking account. Packed for tomorrow & worked around.
1933 - Tues. Mrs. Townsend, Peggy & Judd to Carling for Peg's ear. We played bridge & swam & messed around. Nellie came over. Her dog has pups. paddled with Harry tonite after (?) supper.

1934 - Wed. Worked on dress somewhat. Fun at school but still didn't learn Israel Kaufmann's name. Babs, Wally, Joey & I to carnival at Cory then to Babs for eats. B'gosh, I almost fell for Joey again, di, I've got to be careful! Oh me!

1935 - Thurs. quite a talk with Bill about independence. But he's so cute di, I can't scold him! Worked hard & Uncle Mose liked the wine. Met Dr. Jenney, taller than me. Home on train with Bill & then swim at Club. Dinner. Tennis with Joey & I was lousy. Fun. Hot today. home. Bed 11:15!! Munny is a lamb & I love her so much, di!!
1931 - Sunday. Got up at 11. Leta sick. Rotten day. Read "Dark Forest." Swam a little in aft. Read tonite & bed about 12.

1932 - Tues. Packed. Franny & Picnic lunch at McKnight's pool! Bill, Sally, Joey & Wally to see me off. Said g'bye to John! Better off & cute letter from Joey. I'll see you in the a.m. Canada! Hot dogs!
1933 - Wed. Up late. Knitted. Bridge in aft till 4. Swam then. Betty, Judd & Chico to dance. Honey, Peggy & I whopped it up. Honey & I paddled to Wheaton's for my bracelet. Fun.
1934 - Thurs. School as usual. Charlotte & I to movies tonite to see "The Thin Man." Best movie I've seen in years. To Pharmacy for black & white sundaes. Home & read.

1935 - Fri. Wotta day. Drove up with B & Bill. Bill's so sweet! Worked. Dobby & Franny in at noon. Then, broke glasses - great wind. Uncle Mose Langer drove me all way home & back to town - so nice, di!! Then met M.W. Stouffers for dinner. Stanley to see "Becky Sharp." Good. Home. Sat with Munny. Bed late. Everybody's so nice!!!
1931 - Monday. Fooled around the house. H. drove us to Footes Bay. Ice cream cones & back again. Loads of fun.
1932 - Wed. Got to Toronto. Scared. Changed train to Footes Bay. Arrived 2:20. Met by Towny Moore. Got here. Lousy weather, but am enjoying myself!
1933 - Thurs. Rain & cold in a.m. Discouraged. Cleaned. Picnic on Annes. Gubby silly as usual. Kenny Pesny there. Full moon. Grand time. Home about 2. Sherry. Food. Bed late!

1934 - Friday. Cut class today. Bridge party at Millers for Margaret Watts - a Wellesleyite. Fun. Babs, Wally, Dan & I to Union Cafe tonite. I had 2 Old Fashioneds & part of a Stinger. We were happy. Bed late.

1935 - Sat. Up in car with Bill. Then worked till about noon. Home & I think Bill has a heavy with Jane Terry tonite. Why do I worry, after what he has said & done? Nature, I guess. Franny had a tea for Dobby. Went after swim at Club with M.W. Then Babs for dinner. She & Walter & Joey & I played Monopoly after movies to see "$10 Raise ".
1931 - Tuesday. Leta still sick. Washed dishes etc. Woodsed. H tried to drag me in lake 'cause I took his picture. He didn't & was kind. Bob griped(?) me.
1932 - Thurs. Honey & I paddled to Footes Bay. Ate crazy picnic lunch. To Stony Brae. Paddled back. Letter from Mum. Messed around & read tonite.

1933 - Fri. Up & finished packing. Awful to leave. Gub took us to station. G'byes. Sad. Kisses, etc! Honey, Chico & I to Toronto. Honey left with family. Chico & I to movie "Voltaire" Good. Hurried dinner. Excited. Sat till 12. Knitted.

1934 - Sat. Up late. No hangover. Bill here for a few minutes. I nearly fainted. Babs & I to town & saw Leslie Howard & Betty Davis in "Of Human Bondage." Very good! To Babs' for supper. Dan came. We three went to movies & saw "Little Miss Marker." Babs' lip cut. Wally came later.

1935 - Sun. Up at 11. Babs stayed while. Bill came & then Dobby & Franny for min. Bill left. Charlotte came & here for dinner & then she & M.W. & I to Oakmont to races. Fun. Motorboats. They came home with me for while. Then Munny & I, fun. Listened to Major Bowse & missed not seeing Bill. My psychology is not letting me understand Bill. I wish I could, di!
1931 - Wednesday. Played tennis at Country Club. I beat Walt 6-3. He beat me 6-4. I beat Peggy 6-3 & 6-2. Swam twice. Dead & blisters tonite.
1932 - Fri. Washed some clothes. Went to Pardows in aft. Came home. Slept. Rain. Swam with Honey. Mrs. Townsend, Honey & I talked. Read & ate in kitchen & bed.

1933 - Sat. Arrived home 8:15. Dan here in a.m. also Wally. Bill came this aft & was here till late. Just as swell as ever. Date tonite with Don. Wally& Babs, Franny, Jim, Joey, Bricky Rhoads. Movies Bellevue. Home & ate. Bill, John & Looey here. Got to bed at 2. (?) is swell!

1934 - Sun. Up at 9. Pop sore at something. Bill came at 12 & stayed for dinner. Looked swell! Joey came & we three went to club to see Sam & Dr. John beat Dr. Dave & Billy O'Lough(?) 4-6; 6-3; 2-6; 6-0; 6-2. Over 5:30. (12 - 5:30!) Babs' party tonite. Fun except Richard (?)

1935 - Mon. Blue Mon. Miss Bailey sort of off. Came home after work & Mom was in awful sour grapes. Tried to blame it all on me, but she isn't feeling well, I guess. Made me feel good(?), but Bill came, as I hoped. Watched tennis. Then to movies. Victor McLaglen in "The Informer." Very good. Home. Gingerale. Mom in bad mood still & stayed up long after I went to bed reading. Couldn't say what I wanted to Bill.
1931 - Thursday. Betty & Mrs. Townsend arrived. All went swimming. Betty is awfully nice. I like her heaps.
1932 - Sat. Up early. Read & fooled in a.m. Paddled to Footes Bay & drove to Bracebridge with Honey, Peggy & Betty T. Got yarn. Watermelon feast at Arma tonite. Home. Dead tired. Bed late.
1933 - Sun. Up at 12:454. Bill here. Wally & I to Bab's this aft. Dan there. Bridge & wine & crazy game. More fun. Dan & I fought on porch, but he isn't so bad. Loads of fun. Home. Bed late.

1934 - Up at 9. Tennis with Joey. 3-6 & 7-5. Fun. Found out boy's name is Jack Tracy. Martha told me. Awful lecture & Dr. McKinley embarrassed us, about reprod. urge. Home & read tonite. Dan & Babs called about Dan's (?) French theme. Oh me!

1935 - Tues. Up & on train with Bill. Worked a good day. Home with Dr. Stock in great rain & he drives well! He is extremely nice, di! Mary-Wells & Dan came tonite & we talked & fooled. They left about 10. Bed & I missed Bill, but wot the 'ell!
1931 - Friday. Started "My First Two Thousand Years" by Eldridge & Viereck. Terribly good. Discussion on Slums. H & Peg vs. Betty & me.
1932 - Sun. Up real late. Cold! Letters Warmer in aft & swim a la nature! Read & messed around & ate this evening. Bed early.
1933 - Mon. Town with Munny. Got clothes. Home. Bill here. He & Wally & I talked. Hair cut at 3. Dan, Babs, Wally & I to town to Penn. Rob't Montgomery in "Another Language." Good! Home. Fight. John.

1934 - Tues. Answered a few letters etc. Worked on dress. School is fun & Jack Franey is O.K. Wears a different tie every day to school. Wally & I to say G'bye to Babs. I came home early & read more of "War & Peace" by Tolstoy.

1935 - Wed. To station & train with Bill. He seemed better today. Mixed up urines, but worked hard most of day. Home with Bill & Munny met us. Saw Chubby again. Bill came for ice-cream. Wouldn't go to E(?) Then went to say G'bye to Dobby. Home & Munny & I sat. Ate rest of grand ice cream. She was so nice to me tonite, di. The first for several days & I do love her so much.
1931 - Saturday. Gub & H had dumb argument. Sater, H, Peggy, Betty & I had discussion.
1932 - Mon. Knitted & read. A World Begins by Skariatina. Over to Arma for Springer's birthday party. Gubby mean. Loads of fun. Home when storm threatened. Tired. Washed socks in lake.

1933 - Tues. Washed, etc. Bill is grand! Marriage discussion. Bill came before lunch & we had long talk on swing. He has job. Good kid! Horse shoes. Wally, Joe, Ginny R & Red came. Bill left. To Franny's tonite. Home bed early.

1934 - Wed. Worked around in a.m. Out to college & made dots till I'm blue in the face. Babs left today for country. To Izzy's & there again this evening. We went over to see her Bill. Tazzy(?) is nice. Home. Got Walter at 11 & bed soon after.

1935 - Thurs. Bill 'n' I drove on up to town. Worked hard all day. Saw Jean Dobbs's parents. Got writing paper. Then home in car with Bill & something is indeed wrong. I shall remedy it. Wrote 7 letters tonite. Called Franny Forsdick, & M.W., also Polly Frederic. Munny & I sat together. Then bed. Get ready for tomorrow!
1931 - Sunday. The folks all went to church. H drove us all around. I was silly & got griped. H is disgusted I guess. Darn it!
1932 - Tues. Over to Pardows. Swam in aft. Paddled to Wheatons & Arma tonite with Peggy, Honey & Betty. Home & moonlight swim. Eats, talk & bed late.

1933 - Wed. Tennis with Wally. Bill here, Jack Deasy. Canoed & sailed with Wally & Joey. Fun. Dan came tonite & we all went to Franny's for bridge. Fun. Bill starts work tomorrow. Won't see him much now.

1934 - Thurs. Worked on drawings etc in a.m. Took Izzy & Catherine to town. Quite a talk with Jack. He thought I was a school teacher. Oh me! Google-Eyes wanted a ride but I fooled him. Studied tonite & Munny & I listened to radio. Wally came in later & talked.

1935 - Fri. Up on train with Bill. We talked of this & that. He acts so nice & yet seems distant. Oh well!! Tea at Polly Fredericks after Mrs. Merrill brot me down. O.K. Then Babs, Wally, Dan & I to "Pines." Loads of fun. Got nice & tight, then to Gamm(?) in East Lib. Home at 3:15 & I just sort of fell into bed!
1931 - Monday. Peggy drove us to Carling. Mrs. Townsend & Frankie scared. Met Marg, Brownie & Lib. Bought cookies. Woodsed.
1932 - Wed. Up late. Knitted. Swam in aft. Also paddled.
1933 - Thurs. Rained & spoiled picnic. Jack Deasy, John Keeney, Morten Moore, John, Wally & I bridge. I was mad. Bridge party here tonite a tableo. Fun. Dumb prizes. Bed 2:30. Oh dear!

1934 - Fri. Bill here this a.m. Wine. Talked & he read & I worked. Oh di, I still can't help it! Janet Sleece at school. Jack Francy's a Beta & is 22. We worked a bit. Dan here tonite & we went to movies "Half a Sinner" & "Call it Luck." Wally came & we all drank. Bed. Great heat.

1935 - Sat. Nothing much more could happen to make things worse. Bill & his father & I drove to town. He was funny on way down. I was still under-influence, I guess. Came this aft when M.W. here & left quite soon. Damn. Then Prill called & is in town. Maybe it's good she came when he's so cool & won't be around! God, di - I'm in love too, too much & I just can't help it!
1931 - Tuesday. Went woodsing in a.m. Painted etc. Tipped canoe in aft & so just read advertisement at cabin.
1932 - Thurs. Cleared away the brush & went for a swim. Wrote letters & generally messed around. Looked at stars tonite - shooting. Interesting clouds.
1933 - Fri. To see Izzy Clark in a.m. To Lib Crampton's for bridge this aft. Won 3rd prize. Met Dee Klug. Good. Dan, Wally, Franny & I to movies in Ambridge. Home Bridge. Bed 2.

1934 - Sat. Rain. No tennis. Worked about & read most of day. Charlotte here this evening. Talked. Fun. Wally & Joey came at 11:30. Charlotte home 12. Little ride, di, oh me! I don't know what my trouble is. I can't be in love, but Joey was warming up! 'Nite.

1935 - Sun. Up late. Bill came at noon & stayed for dinner with Mom 'n' Pop 'n' me. Here all aft & we talked & read. Everything joke(?) again, di & I'm happy. Left at 5:30. I called M.W., then up to Izzy's & we had grand talk. She' so awfully nice. Then home & letters & bed early. Shooting stars tonite.
1931 - Wednesday. H pushed me in lake. Fooled around in aft & went swimming. He didn't want to.
1932 - Fri. Went moonlite swimming tonite & had grand time. More shooting stars. Peg & Betty slept on dock.

1933 - Sat. Town with M.W. Shopped & saw "Tugboat Annie." To see A.H. Not home. To M.W.'s for supper. Home. Billy, Wally & Dan, Charlotte later. Bridge. Shooting stars. Hair. Bed. Bill here, but I wasn't!

1934 - Sun. Bill here today for quite a time. Another swell talk, about books & reminiscing! I hope he & I will always be grand friends! Read tonite & studied a mite. Do I like Joey again or don't I? I think I do. Oh my!

1935 - Mon. Up on train with Bill. Beginning last week of work. Awful thot!! Home & Pop home. In sort of bad humor. I was sick 'cause Bill didn't come tonite. Then Izzy & her aunt & I to Ambridge to see "Broadway Melody." Dick Powell good. Home Bed. Tired & I wonder just what troubles Bill.
1931 - Thursday. Went to Carling. H. drove us down. Betty, Peggy & I. Saw Marg, Brownie & Lib Craig. Discussion tonite. Walt also. Toted bricks.
1932 - Sat. Swam a lot and the Steeles, Bill & Dick, Springer M, Bob Kahne, Bob, Weedy, Betty, Peg, Mignon & I went to a dance at Clevelands. Fun. Cold. Home & ate. Bed about 4.

1933 - Sun. First up. Bill here about 11. Stayed all aft. I knitted. He threaded needles. Whole gang of boys here. Rain. Dan, Wally & I to M.W.'s tonite. Bridge. Sarcasm. Oh dear! Bed late again! 1:20

1934 - Mon. Up late. Rain & so no tennis. Messed around. Train for class, I was nearly late. Dan, Wally, Charlotte & I to movies in Ambridge. Saw "The Bowery." Back here for eats, but not much. Bed late. O me!

1935 - Tues. Up in car with Bill & we talked. When I left him I never felt so low. But shook it off at work. Lunch at apt. with Franny Forsdick, her mother Prill. More work. Then 3 of us to Smithfield Grill. Met M.W. Grand dinner. Stanley & saw "The (?)." Home late. Saw Pitts. from roof of R(?)!! I miss Bill, di!!
1931 - Friday. H's birthday. Gave him weird cigarette lighter. Newnan(?) bag here. Boys had tulipae(?) tonite. Stayed up to see them. Bed 3 A.M.
1932 - Sun. Up at 11. Messed around. Knitted. Read. Swam all aft & sunned. Over to say "G'bye" to Bob Kahn this evening. Rowed & blistered. Swam a' la nature in moonlite tonite.
1933 - Mon. John, M.W. & I whitewashed cellar room for a bar. Keen fun. M.W. & I scrubbed floor this aft & nearly died! All excited about it! Wally, Dan, M.W. & I played bridge tonite. Bed late.

1934 - Tues. Sun bathed in a.m. Town for class. Worked on dress when I got back. Joey came tonite, also Jim Fullman. Jim left about 10:30. Then, me & Joey 10:30-11. But gosh, di - I really do like him a lot. We got Walter & then bed late.

1935 - Wed. Up on train with Bill. Nice today. Then to lab. Stat. blood count & Dr. Albirgotti sarcastic. In aft, found out it was Mr. Langor's birthday. Party. Lunched with Prill today. Fun. Then home with Bill. Munny & I had supper alone. Then Bill tonite & all my old fears & worries vanished. Talked of later etc. Wine & we were so close, di! I will always remember that & out on the porch. Bed late & he kissed me G'nite on porch.
1931 - Saturday. Played weird slapping game. Fooled around with Peggy & H in aft. Went to cabin tonite. Tickling with Weedy etc.
1932 - Mon. No water fun. Marg. Wheaton here. Weedy & Boob left this aft. Keen day. Letter from Chubby! Whoopie! I still likes him heaps. Got sick tonite. Corn. Bed early & soda. Oh me!

1933 - Tues. Down in Ambridge all a.m. with M.W. shopping for bar. Cut out stuff this aft. Ottie's party tonite. Went with Bill & Dan. Thrills about Bill. He likes Polly, though. Oh dear! Dumb me. Francis Hy(?) awfully nice.

1934 - Wed. Up early. Tennis with Joey. He beat me 10-8. Oh me! We were awful. Town & worked hard today. Harry Lipman talk with Martha & me & kidded. Worked tonite & read more of "War & Peace." Bed early.

1935 - Thurs. Bill so swell, di! Up on train & we were happy. Then to work. Not much more, di & I have loved it. Home on 5 with Bill. Lunch with Miss Baily & Healy. Great (?). M.W. came tonite & she & Munny & I talked. Bed at a late hour.
1931 - Sunday. Packed to go home. Boohoo! Had a dip in a.m. Fixed boys beds. Terrible tussle tonite. Water etc. Loads of fun for last nite. Oh gee Ma!
1932 - Tues. I lay around all day. Watched girls swim. Letter from Munny. Betty's Mother & Sophia arrived. Learned a little about contract. Knitted & read & enjoyed my lazy self.
1933 - Wed. Sewed all day on pillows, etc for bar! M.W. & I. Bill came at dinner time & stayed till 8:30. Rain. Wally & I to Babs. Dan there. Me Dick Beck. Rain. Wine. Walked home (?)

1934 - Thurs. In sort of a mess about party Sat. but fixed it up. In town early to buy dress & prizes. Got perfume, too. Pop home for dinner. Dan & Chart(?) came, but left as I studied hard - 3 hrs - for awful Embry. exam tomorrow.

1935 - Fri. Last day to station & town with Bill. Last full day of work. Uncle Mose & his trouble. Learned of death of Will Rogers & Willy Post. Awful. Home on train with Charlotte & Bill. Munny & I to club for dinner. Fun. Then home & read. Mrs. Graff came. Talked with Munny, then & bed!
1931 - Monday. Got up at 6:30. At last a Muskoka Sunrise. H, Bob, Weedy, Mrs. T. & I to Toronto. Left after shopping at 6. How I miss 'em (H, Weedy, Peg & Gub mostly!)
1932 - Wed. Up late. Rain. Dismal. Honey left. Sophia here. Miss Porter came. Sat around & generally spent a very dull day. Fixed you.

1933 - Thurs. Up & drove Dan, M.W. & John to town. M.W. & I painted furniture this aft. Bill here. Night shift now. Darling. Movies in Ambridge after dinner at M.W.'s. "Melody Cruise." Mr. McKallip here.

1934 - Fri. Bill came just before I left for town. Good omen for exam. It was awful hard & we just fooled afterwards. Watched baseball game. Movie, "Housewife" & then got Jean. Home. Dinner. Dan, Cousin Walter, Jean & I to Ambridge to movies tonite - "Bulldog Drummond Strikes Back."

1935 - Sat. My, what a blow. Bill broke the date for celebration. Then, had to say G'bye to all. Miss Baily, Healy, Sally & Dr. Jenney & Uncle Mose. Home & I was furious at Bill. Swam with M.W. & got a swell tan this aft. She here for supper & then down to Ambridge to see Charles Boyer in "Shanghai" Good. Home & wept 'cause Bill can be so damn mean! & I love him too much, I guess. I must think more of work!!
1931 - Tuesday. Met by Smarts. Home to Scituate. Swim at Humarock. Movies tonight. M. Chevalier in "Smiling Lt." Very good. Called up Dammuddy. See her tomorrow.
1932 - Thurs. Rained all day. Knitted & finally finished sweater. I likes it. Read "Madame Bovary." Played Contract. Also read "David Copperfield." Awful present. Bed early tonite.
1933 - Fri. Finally got car & Wally, Babs, Dan & I to Salem for picnic. Grand swim. Rain. Bridge at McConnells. Supper in their garden. Fun. I drove home. Bridge at Merrill's & home at 11. Tired.

1934 - Sat. Jean & I up early. Tore around all a.m. getting ready for bridge party - 4 tables - this aft. Loads of fun. Bill helped serve, etc. Dan came tonite & we 3 talked. Went up for Cousin Walter. Home & bed. Tired as heck.

1935 - Sun. Up at 10. Determined to be cool to Bill. Sunned in a.m. He came in aft. Reiberts for ice & then the explanation. Says he'll be definite after this. Also, on the table about Jane & says how he likes her & hates her & sort of even with me. Swimming with Pinx & left him here. Munny & Pop & I dinner. Listened to Major Bowes & then up to bed.
1931 - Wednesday. Washed clothes. Went to see Dammuddy. Swim & Clifford Ward here tonite for cards. Very nice boy. Wrote letters.
1932 - Fri. Last of 3 days rain. We finished "Madame Bovary" by Gustave Flaubert. Sunset keen tonite & took a late dip. Washed hair & hoped for a keen day tomorrow.

1933 - Sat. Worked in cellar all a.m. Bill here. Only chatted a bit. Worked in bar all aft. M.W., Bill, Wally here for dinner. Eke mad. He's got job, tho. Dance at Shannopin with Dan. Bill with Duns. Oh dear! John & Bill - elderberries. (?) & home late.

1934 - Sun. Up late. Jean & I read papers. Bill here & told about Jam's accident. Tough. Jean, Wally & I swam this aft after Dan & Bill Jetter brot 2 St. Louis boys around Don, Walther, John & I bridged tonite after going to Merrill's & McConnells. 'Nite!

1935 - Mon. First day of study & I worked hard. Tennis in aft with M.W. Then Wally, Bill & M.W. for dinner as Pop & Mom left for N.Y. in aft to be gone all week. Good dinner & then to movies in Aliquippa. Awful ones "Keeper of the Bees" & "Only a Woman." Home & ate & they left sort of late. M.W. & I alone here. Fun.
1931 - Thursday. got up 8:30. I rowed etc this a.m. Fished this aft. Caught 7 & threw 2 back, perch. Swam. Fun! Walk to breakwater tonite. Fun & bed early.
1932 - Sat. Swam a good bit today. Supposed to go to dance tonite with Steels & Bob Banes, but boat broke down. Bill Steele came over & we played Contract. Fun. Peggy & I won. Danced. Bed 2:15.

1933 - Sun. Bill came as I got up. He & I de-branched elderberries. I worked in bar. Bill, Louis, John & I for lunch. Tea all over me! More bar this aft with M.W. Bill here & there all aft. Thrills! I like him s'much! To M.W.'s for supper. Read. Home. Bridge. Letter. Bed. Munny & Pop to Cleveland.

1934 - Mon. Up at 9. Jean & I messed about. Bill here for awhile. Class & left Jean at station. Got A-. Thrills! Bill came, we ping ponged. Fun! He's s' nice, di! Charlotte came tonite, (Henry Penny & Aunt Betty) We were crazy. Studied & Pop left.
1935 - Tues. Studied hard. Then tennis with M.W. & swam at pool. Fun. Home & we got supper together. Bill came in midst & stayed all evening. We all talked & read. He left early & bed early.
1931 - Friday. Sally & I swam long distance. Cliff came for part, too. Orange-peel etc. Cliff played cards & walked to breakwater with us tonight.
1932 - Sun. Up late. Off for a tramp & picnic on a rock high up. Swim & sunbath. Nice tromp home over rocks. Wrote letters to Aunt Hat, Bill, John & Joey. Bed about 11:30.

1933 - Mon. Finished bar at last! Bill, Wally, John & I walked home from village & Dan came. Bill darling! "Lust Lounge." John Keeney & Wally brot stuff. Babs, Wally, Dan & I bridge tonite. Pinx came & M.W. called!

1934 - Tues. Up & studied & polished car. Took Clarks to town. Saw Bill. Crazy time with window-washers. Worked a bit. Home 5:30 Bill came & we ping ponged. Loads of fun! Down to Emery's & Steve & I were trounced. Home. Studied. Bed.

1935 - Wed. Studied like Hell & finished the book. Then tennis with M.W. Supper at her house & she & Dan & I to Ambridge movie to see "Hoosier School Master." Darn good! Home to M.W.'s & stayed there all night.
1931 - Saturday. Barbara Edmunds came in a.m. Plymouth parade & rock in aft. Rushed to movies with Bill Howes, awfully cute. "Dirigible" - good. Bed about 12.

1932 - Mon. Grown folks went off to Beaumaris to get Miss Porter's sister. Cleaned house. Felt keen. She came. Left later. Dance tonite with Dick & Bill Steele & Bob Banes (cute). More fun. Arma & they left 4. Keen.

1933 - Tues. Up at 6:30 & took Pops to Youngstown. Home noon. Bill here. Sat in bar. Talked. Read. Radio. Tennis with Joey. He won 6-2 6-4. Fun. Dan, Wally & I to Charlotte's tonite. Bridge. Walked home at 1. Tired. Think (?) Bill!

1934 - Wed. Up at 8:30. Town & Harry helped me with my Histology slides. Fun. Then worked. Emrick & Store came in. 5 ½ hrs of work. Challis bot me Klondike. Bill here. Again ping-ponged. Left after dinner. Swell, di! Worked on drawings all evening. Tired - Bed! Munny beat me at ping pong 4-6 6-2 6-4!!

1935 - Thurs. Up early. Home & studied hard in a.m. Then Wally here in aft & was awful. Never again, di! Then M.W. & I supper here. Then to movies. "Lady Tubbs" & "Chinatown Squad". Saw Bill's car at Terry's - damn! Home & 2 old fashioneds. Homing(?) Felt them severely. Horsed around & bed about 12.
1931 - Sunday. Got up about 11. Swam in aft. Picnic supper. Pearsons here. Walk to breakwater after supper. Sally & I bed late.
1932 - Tues. Up at 11:30. Breakfast. Gabfest in Sophia's room. Swim. Over to Pardoe's & another gabfest with Marian Nichols & Harriet Winslow. Bed early tonite.

1933 - Wed. Up late. To M.W.'s & painted. Lunch. Home. Bill here. Talk. Tennis. Pinx & Duns beat M.W. & me 8-6. Painted John again. Home. Shower. To Lib Crampton's with M.W. Bridge. Miss Miller great fun. (Gus's foot - pointing to smudged ink)

1934 - Thurs. Finished drawings today & was in quite a mess. Ogle-Eyes & I came down together. Last time. Bill not here today. Babs, Wally, Dan & I to circus tonite. O.K. Dumb side-show. To Babs' afterwards for fun. Bed 12:30.

1935 - Fri. Could hardly live thru day! Kept thinking of Bill! Met him at train. Then supper at M.W.'s. Home & he came about 7:15. To Cory for wine. Then home & we celebrated 1) our friendship 2) almost a year (Aug. 29!). Then di we were off in the heights again. Str. & M & we decided we shouldn't anymore because it's hard when we're not married etc. We shall only kiss g'nite. But I love him so much, di. It'll be hard! To M.W.s & straight to bed. grand night, di - the grandest yet.
1931 - Monday. Rain, rain, rain! Sally & I alone all day. Cards, meals, read, etc. Mrs. Patterson left. Movies tonite. "Huckleberry Finn." Very good!
1932 - Wed. Got up to see Miss Porter off. Back to bed till 12. Swam all aft. Pushed punt out to the stake to dive. Mary Wheaton over & Contract bridge. Dip in lake & bed 11:30

1933 - Thurs. Up & painted at M.W.'s this a.m. Home for lunch. Bill here. I went to bar. He came & we talked. Di(?) about Duns. M.W. came & we walked Moo. Home & bridge with John & Wally. Also Dick Blue. Letters. Knitted tonite & bed 12.

1934 - Fri. Up early. Last day of class. Sad! Said g'bye after we all went to top of Cathedral. Airplanes. Bill came as I baked cake after dinner. Ping ponged. Saw Jam also Richardsons at hospital. Band tonite. Walter sick. Mad at Dan. Bill here & he also drank. Bed late.

1935 - Sat. Up at 8:30. Did clones. Then M.W. & I to club. Tennis & then swimming. There all aft. Talked about everything. Got great burn! Watched tennis. Home. More chores & then finally Mom & Pop arrived about 7. So grand to see them! I missed 'em!! Bed early. Awful sunburn!
1931 - Tuesday. Rose 9. Packed. Left for Hingham about 11. Miss 'em! Ride with Dammuddy in aft. Movies tonite. Barbara Stanwyk in "The Miracle Woman." Punk
1932 - Thurs. Up at 9 & took a dip. Fixed you. Swam all aft with Betty & Peggy. Washed hair. Cards tonite & I was silly. More fun! Big surprise - Candy!

1933 - Town with Munny. Grand evening dress etc. Lunch at Duquesne Club. Home. Bill R., Dan, Ralph here. Talked in bar. M.W., Joey, Dan, Wally here t'nite. Bridge. Jack Deasy came down. "I doubt it." Wants to come tomorrow to party.

1934 - Sat. Up late. Worked about. Franny's Wellesley bridge luncheon. Bill came for dinner. We ate late. Ping ponged. Talked. (Didn't have car tonite). He got sort of sick after dinner. Left & I was plenty sad - Jane will be home any day.

1935 - Sun. Bill away for weekend! Tough! Up late. Bad sunburn. Charlotte here, also Dan & Mr. Van Pelt. M.W. & I to tennis matches. Dr. Dave & Billy O'Laughlin beat Ahern & Unger. Lib Craig & Dr. Dave also, Wally & Joey & M.W. here tonight. Messed around, then M.W. here all nite.
1931 - Wednesday. Last day of vacation! Rose 7:30. Swam in a.m. with Betty. Wellesley this aft & I'm nuts over it! "Just a Gigolo" & "Laughing Sinners" tonite.
1932 - Fri. Up late as usual. Went out for ride in sailing carol. Fun. Messed around. Read & went to Nellie's tonight. Marian played cards mit. Fun & bed late.

1933 - Sat. Worked around all day getting ready for bar opening. M.W.'s for lunch. 5 tables of bridge tonite. John & friends tended bar. Awful mess, but loads of fun. Bill cute. Came back & we sang. M.W. all nite. Met Pete McCleane. Nice, but shallow.

1934 - Sun. Up early. Off to country. Babs, Wally, Dan & I. Dan got on my nerves so terribly that I could hardly stand him. Oh! What a person! I'll be so glad when Thurs. comes! Jane Haskins nice. Missed Bill altogether. Damn. To Babs' for supper & home early. Tired!
1935 - Mon. Up at 9:30. Katy back. Did German all day & evening too. Swam for a while this aft but sun-burn hurt. Walter here. M.W. called up. No Bill!
Have been there ↑ - Boy! I hope so → YES!! (My 1st nite here!) & now about to be a Senior!!!
1931 - Thursday. Dull day for last! Left Boston at 4:30. Fine time on train, Dammuddy & me. Slept well & can hardly wait to get home!
1932 - Sat. Read in a.m. To Steeles in aft. Sail boated. Keen. Swim. Supper out on rocks. Cute Murray(Graham?) Wilton was his name. Fell for him. He liked me & sat mit. Fun!

1933 - Sun. Up late. M.W. & I cleaned up cellar while Bill fixed his wine. Conversation, more about marriage. Chicken dinner. More wine. Bill's so nice, mais iln'ya pas d'esperance! Wally, M.W. & I in cellar tonite. Fooled till 12!

1934 - Tues. Dammuddy got here tonite. Grand! Up & Bill & I out to country for elderberries. Here for lunch & we de-branchesd all aft. We decided we would get married. Me immoral(??)& Dan. He & Mrs. Lipinacci! Came tonite & helped with Dammudy. Ping Pong. Wine afterwards & he was swell, di!

1935 - Tues. Up at 7:30. German all a.m. till 3, but time out to Ambridge for drink with Munny. Tennis with Pinx & M.W. & Moody Berg. Swam. Then M.W. called & she & Doss & I to Ambridge Penn to see "An Orchid to You" & "The Scoundrel." Both excellent. Noel Coward especially. Dr. Stock in movies & came & spoke to me. It made me feel good, you know, di!
1931 - Friday. Home again! Good to see Mother! M.W. came down. Also Dan & Jim. I likes Jim. Movies tonite with M.W. B. Stanwyk in "Night Nurse." Good.
1932 - Sun. Up real late. Read with Phil. Arma people came to say "Good-bye." Swim. Cards & read some more tonite in cabin with Phil. Bed 12:30. Thackeray.

1933 - Mon. Up late. Pops left for Youngstown. Worked around. Bill got a motorcycle. Tooted around a lot. Here at lunch-time. Darling as ever. M.W., Munny & I to movies "Voltaire." Good. Home. M.W. & I read. Bed late. Fixed boys' bed with salt. Revenge for pie-bed.

1934 - Mon. Messed up days here. up & worked around getting ready for Dammuddy. Franny & I played tennis. I won. Bill here for little while. Ping Ponged. He simonized his Buick (again no car tonite) Wally, Babs, Dan & I to town "Affairs of Colline." Good. Last date with Dan. Whoopie!!!

1935 - Wed. Studied hard all a.m. Then M.W. & I to town & shopped for college. Got nice things. Then met Charlotte & we all had dinner at Smithfield Grill & movies. K. Hepburn in "Alice Adams." Good. Drove home. Arrived 12:00. Louis here. John'll be home Fri! Messed around. Bed.
1931 - Saturday. Drove Damuddy to town. Lunch, shopped. Tennis with M.W. in aft. Beat her. Mr. Howard here tonite. Wrote letters & bed 12.
1932 - Mon. Up late. Packed. Ironed. Read D.C. with Phil in pup tent. Swim. Visit to Armites. Over to Marg. Wheaton's after supper. Won at Ping Pong. Swim. Eats. Cards. Bed.

1933 - Tues. Town with Munny. More shopping. To see Mrs. Smith. Saw Mrs. Atchley. Home. Saw Bill on motorcycle. Wrote letters. Movies in Ambridge with M.W. & Dossie. "A Stranger's Return." Good. Sad. Home. Bed early.

1934 - Wed. Oh me! Di! It has happened. Bill came early & we berried. Then on l.l & he was grand - before & after lunch. I love him so much di & 4K. But does he love me? Rested & tonite sat with Dammuddy & A.N. & nurse & Mom for long time. Read. Bed early. What will happen now, di, after all this? I hope, nicely!!

1935 - Thurs. The anniversary & I couldn't be home tonite even tho' I tried! Munny to Youngstown & so to M.W.'s for supper. Then she & Doss & I to Bellevue to see George Raft in "The Glass Key." Awfully good. Back to Pelts & bed about 12. Sort of sad!
1931 - Sunday. Rained & stopped. Took Dammuddy for drive. To Mary-Wells' tonite. Read & bed early.
1932 - Tues. Up at 9. Back to home. Lunch. Left on train for home. Toronto with Leta. Sorry to leave but glad to get back to Munny. Talk with Leta on train.

1933 - Wed. To see Mrs. Atchley with M.W., but she was ill. Bill here for a while. Offered me ride on motorcycle but was afraid of Munny. Tennis with M.W. this aft. Jim F. called. Bridge with John, Looey & Wally. Jack D. & Martin in. Jack's awfully nice. Wally sarcastic as heck. Oh dear! They all suggest I like Bill so much & I really like him more as a friend don't I? Oh dear. Wine is working.

1934 - Thurs. Read all a.m. Bill here while Franny & I played tennis 7-5: 5-6 & afterwards helped her. Came again for a few minutes later. Babs here for minute tonite. Jim came & we went to movies in Bellevue. "Murder in Private Car." O.K. Ride & home 12:30. What a life. I'm so in love with Bill I can't see straight; so help me!!
