1935 - Fri. A whole week now since I've seen Bill. Finished reading German & started theme. Ride with M.W., Doss in aft. Bill at train. He had come last nite. Damn! But he came tonite. Ambridge to see "The Irish in Us." Home & wine & we couldn't keep our resolution even after we tried. Di, I can't help loving him so much!! We did the same evil things & it only makes me love him all the more. He said he never loved me less etc.
1931 - Monday. Took Dammuddy to station. Shopped. Smiths. Home & hair-cut. M.W.'s for supper. Movie. Joan Bennett in "Hush Money." Good! Letter & hair.
1932 - Wed. Home again & found John home! Thrills. Miss Powner awfully nice. I like her a lot. Jim & Joey over tonite & we had a grand talk while I knitted. Fun. (Joey worn off now)

1933 - Thurs. Bill here for a short time. He's too interested in motorcycle. To Sarah Murdock's for bridge with Betty Duns. O.K. only I don't get along with Mugs Miller! Bridge tonite with Lib Crampton, Dan, Jim F, John, J. Keeney, Looey & Wally. Fun!

1934 - Fri. John arrived unexpectedly. What fun. Another rather dull day. Bill here for a while 2 times this aft. No tennis today. Cousin Walter here tonite & we talked & Ping Ponged. Bill also Pinged with me this aft. Oh di! It's awful!!

1935 - Sat. Up reasonably early - 8:30. John home & is swell. We talked. Then German. Tennis with M.W. Home & more German. Then up there after Ginny R. here for a while. She, M.W., came for dinner, also Mr. McKallip. I got sort of peeved & then she stayed all night. John to Pike Run!
1931 - Tuesday. Jim, Dan, Bill, M.W., Franny & I played Michigan etc. Franny had to go at 11 & so broke up early. M.W. here all nite. No sleep.
1932 - Thurs. Wrote letters. Knitted. Went up street. No one knows I'm home. Messed around & stayed with John. Down to Franny's tonite & stayed till 10. Home & bed.

1933 - Fri. Town with M.W. Shopped. Movie. K. Hepburn in "Morning Glory." I cried. Awful mixup about Lib's dance. I got sick. Finally Bill took me & I had a grand time. He was so nice & cute. Oh gosh & I have to leave Sun. & why doesn't he show some signs?

1934 - Sat. Up early. Dull day & hardly did a thing. Bill here for a while this aft. (Whistled "Good-Nite a 1000 Good nites." Left soon. Mr. & Mrs. Nack here tonite. Martha swell. Mr. McKallip came & we got to bed at 2. Oh me.

1935 - Sun. M.W. & I up & to church. Very good sermon on faith. She came home & stayed for lunch. Bill here & left to go on family picnic. Charlotte here. She & M.W. left as Babs came. We talked. Up to her house. Home then. She left. German. Then the Lyons came & Marty, Bill & Johnny Powell. Last one - swell fellow, but I guess I was a little tight. Oh well! Major Bowes & then bed. I'm happy, di!
1931 - Thursday. Went to M.W.'s all night after Jim took me up to her house. Franny, Bill, Dan & Jim, M.W. & I played cards.
1932 - Fri. Again I see more of Chubby & like him once more. Went to play "Mad Money" at H.L. with Shirley C. and saw him after it. He yelled "Hi Beer!" Darn it. Bill here. I like him, too.

1933 - Sat. Had to get up & say G'bye to Dan. Oh me. To village for last things Bill came! Alone with him for some time. Played vic. I wish I didn't care so much for him! M.W. came. Packed. He left! Oh dear!

1934 - Sun. Up late. Bill here & stayed for dinner. Awful nice today. Pictures taken & then they all left me here alone. Oh heck. Bill back for a min. to see wine. Babs home. She & I to see Jam. Then to her house. Cousin Walter came & I left about 9. Bed early. What to do about everything? I guess I'll just let it (?).

1935 - Mon. Up at 7:15 & started to work hard on paper in German. Joey called & we tennised. Simply smooth. Never had such a grand rally 6-4; 3-6; 6-3; 11-9, Walter, Babs, Dan & I off at 10 to Sky Club & danced & drank. More fun. I wasn't so tight. Dan leaves tomorrow. Then home late after eating hamburgers at the Brass Rail!
1931 - Wednesday. M.W. & I went to Aliquippa to movies. Saw "The Run Around." Good. Weird movie & didn't pay ticket.

1932 - Sat. Up late. To Sally's. Home, lunch. To Ball game with Sally, Mother & Eke. Fun. Home & to Scavengr Hunt tonite with Joey at Babs'. Lotsa fun. Dan & B. Terry with us. All but electric clock gotten.

1933 - Sun. M.W. came in a.m. & said G'bye. Everyone on edge. Bill came at noon. Had coffee ice cream with us. Jack Deasy said G'bye. Bill stayed till we left. Munny & Pop - Oh! I hated to leave them all! 3 ½ months! Arrived Carlisle 7:35. Talked with Dammuddy & Aunt Nellie for long time. Called Munny. Finally bed at Argonne. Tired & how!

1934 - Mon. Up late. Mom 'n Pop to ball game & John back to Bill here & he took apart barrels. Told me about Annabelle. He has had disappointments, too. Ping Ponged. He left & we had great hitting fight. Dick Blue here for a while. Aunt Nellie for drive. Wally, Babs, Joey & I to movies "Chained." Clark Gable & Joan Crawford. O.K. Then up to Babs' all nite. Swell wine.

1935 - Tues. Up late. Studied & my Bill came! I was so glad to see him again! He & Mom & I to Ambridge to see Major Bowes people. he stayed for dinner! Then dressed & he came & he & Mom & I sat up waiting for John. She gave up at 11:30. Bill & I talked & discussed & had such a divine time. Our next celebration is to be soon! John got home at 12:45 & got to bed about 2!
1931 - Friday. Party at M. Handy's & got 1st prize. Dinner at Crutchy's. Tea at Polly's. Home with Jim after party. Sally home tonight & all is well.
1932 - Sun. Up late. Down to Sally's. Met Jim F's cousin, Sam Simons. Nice. Bill here in aft. Knitted. Bill, Dan, Ralph came tonite. Shocked. Down to Franny's & plenty of sarcasm. Bed late, but fun.

1933 - Mon. Up at 6. Rained most all day but we averaged about 34 mph & arrived Boston about 7:30 P.M. At Hotel Statler. Called Munny. Last time I'll hear her voice for ages! To bed. Read & finally to sleep.

1934 - Tues. Babs & I up early. Home & no town. Called Bill. We strained elderberries. Took all afternoon. He was a little grumpy, but also swell. Bot me ice cream cone. We did a nice job in the cellar. I got last hit at him. Read tonite & bed early. I think Jane is holding us back, di - but he's so swell anyway!!

1935 - Wed. up & did German. Bill came. Then John & Peg Mitchell & Mom & I lunch. She's awfully nice! Bill, Jam, Wally in. Dull talking! Up to M.W.'s afterwards. Walked home. John & Peg had gone. Munny & I together tonite & I read "Abendliche Hauser." Bed early. Bill & I talked again about things. Maybe, someday, something nice will happen.

1931 - Saturday. Went to town with M.W. Penn & saw Joan Crawford in "This Modern Age." Good. Swimming with Effie & M.W. this aft. Bill had gone away, so Jim & Sally. Eddie Ruff etc to Sally's & cards tonite.
1932 - Mon. Up late. Down to Franny's for party in aft. Copped 2nd prize. To movies with Jim C tonite & Shannapin Dance. Bill here in a.m., & at dance I fell for him. Followed us, winks & I like him.

1933 - Up at 10:15. Fooled around. Wrote letters. Ate at Seville. Went to Met & saw "This Day & Age." Good. Met Smarts at 3! To Marshfield Hills swimming. Good old ocean! Thought of Bill & this time last year. A whole year now!! O dear!

1934 - Wed. Up early. Worked on dress. Tennis this aft with Joey. I won 6-0; 5-7; 7-5; 7-5. Oh me! Ate grapes. He's O.K. (Bill at air races all day.) Baked cookies & Babs & I took them & flowers to Jam. He's getting along O.K. Walkers & home & bed early.

1935 - Thurs. A grand day started but Hell toward the end! Up early & Germaned. Then John, Bill & Nancy Averill Clepper, M.W. & I lunch at Club. Then 4 of us town - "Anna Karenina." Good!! Tea at Reymers. Home & hoped for Bill & a date, but no soap! Walter in. Then Charlotte, then B & we monopolied, B winning. Fun! and I like this sort of life. Why should I worry, but I had speech ready for Bill(?) Damn & to Hell with it! I'll give it to him demain. Aber nicht H cute!!!
1931 - Sunday. Church with Franny & Sally & M.W. Sally & I talked all about Scituate & Clifford, etc. This aft, saw Aunt Hat with M.W. Seemed better.
1932 - Tues. Up early. Town with Munny & shopped. Home. To Sally's this evening with Wally. Home. Washed hair & bed early. Knitted some more.
1933 - Wed. Up late. Walked to Post Office. Swam this aft. Little tan. Not much sun. Yummy clams for dinner. Movies at Scituate "The Secret of the Blue Room." Sort of dumb. Home. Cards. Bed 11.

1934 - Thurs. Up early. Washed stockings. Joey called but no tennis. Took Aunt Nellie to A.H.'s, Aunt Biny's(?) & Mrs. Tanners. Got present for Pop & saw Bill on motorcycle. To Babs' with Mac. Home. Cracked nuts. Mrs. Nicholson nice. Read. Washed hair. Bed 12 (What about Bill?)

1935 - Fri. Did German all a.m. Then the Cleppers & M.W. & I swam at E. club. Cocktails at our house. Then to M.W.'s for supper. Bill, the Cleppers, Conant(?) - all of us went to town tonite & saw Will Rogers' last picture "Steamboat Round the Bend." Conant(?) awful & I had a lousy time. Bill sort of sad & we started so late. Bed about 1 & I was down in dumps!!!
1931 - Monday. Tennis. M.W. & I beat Pinx & Sally. Effie took us swimming. M.W., Effie, Sally & I with Jim F, Bill, Dan & Jim Crooks to dances tonite.
1932 - Wednesday. Up early. Up street. Home. Sewed. Bill came! Took him as far as dentist. (I like him more than I can say). M.W. came & also Joey & Wally. Sewed & messed around.
1933 - Thurs. Spend all afternoon fishing in the Scituate Harbor. I only caught 3 perch, but we got mackerel & flounder & had a grand dinner on them. Doris came over. We played bridge & (?) Bed late.

1934 - Fri. Town all a.m. Shopped. Munny & Pop away. Home this aft. Tennis with Joey. Lost 10-8 & 6-4. Bill here when I got back. Up street for yeast. Ping Ponged. He was awful nice again. He was away 2 days. Said he'd be back tonite but didn't. Franny, Lib C. & Marg Kincaid here for bridge tonite. Bed late. Talked with Barbara Donnell in town today. Be seeing Prill soon. Oh me!

1935 - Sat. Up late. No German today! Tennis with M.W. then town & lunch in Urban Ray with Charlotte. Loads of fun & I never felt grander. Shopped at Hornes. Home. Dinner. M.W. & I to "Lives of a Bengal Lancer." Awfully good! I cried. Home. Eats & grand ice cream cone. Bed late at M.W.'s but fun!
1931 - Tuesday. Well! I'm a Senior! How funny that sounds. I hope to be that twice in this book, but who knows? Schedule changed etc. today. Said goodbye to Franny.
1932 - Thurs. Miss Powner gone. I liked her so much. Bill her in a.m. Drove to Wellesley tea in aft & met some nice girls. All hepped up about college now. Home tonite & served etc. Lazy.

1933 - Fri. Drove to Plymouth after swim at Humarock. Looked at monuments, etc. Ate dinner at "Holy Darby's" Simply delish! Movies "Shanghai Madness" & "I Have Lived." Both good. Home after a grand day.

1934 - Sat. No tennis on account of rain. Bill came & he's leaving really early tomorrow for Erie. Oh gosh! We didn't get to say g'bye because he came back later & I was gone. Aunt Nellie messed it all up. She didn't know. Babs & I to Wilson tea. Awful! She & Franny & Mary C. & I bridge. Wally in & we ate. Bed late. Bill here at 8 & I was not. That shows the he - well, there's something there. Oh di! How long will this go on?

1935 - Sun. Up late. Nan came & then Bill Clepper. We all came here, home, Dose, too. Franny in. Then B, Walter, Charlotte. Bill here all the time, Uncle Bob, Mr. Chidester & Mrs. Averill all here at various times. Bill came tonite, proving something for me. Major Bowes hour. Then Bill & I talked. Down to bar & (?) Came back. I did German & Bill finished Anthony Averse. He said awful nice things tonite, di & I was so extremely happy (except for present!)
1931 - Wednesday. Came home & studied & read & played tennis tonight with Sally. First whole day of school. Latin awful. 83 in class. John arrived from Canada about 5!!

1932 - Fri. Town & shopped for college in a.m. Bill here all aft till I left for tea at Berg's. So cute on couch & lipstick business. Dance at Ambridge CC tonite with Jim Crooks. Loads of fun. Last! Boohoo
1933 - Sat. Worked around. Went swimming over at the Pearson's in Scituate Harbor. Awfully cold, but grand. Messed around this evening. Wrote letters & bed late again.

1934 - Sun. Up late. Babs & I breakfasted. Home about 11. Called up M.W. She's home. Dull dinner. Munny called. Oh Lordy I miss William! Hope I'm still here when he gets back. To M.W.'s for supper. She came all nite & we got to bed late. Told me all about Newport & her mess.

1935 - Mon. Up early & worked quite a bit on German. Only talked to Bill today! M.W., Nancy & Bill Clepper & the 2 Nashes we all went dancing & drinking tonite at the Union Grill. Lousy time & so I got a little oozy & then awful time in car on way home. I hope I never see the Nashes again. Said G'bye to Clepper & realized that Bill R. is by far the "Only one" for me!!!
1931 - Thursday. Came home after school & meeting Jean Critchlow at Dunford's. Tennis tonight with Sally. Beat her 6-1 6-2. We played on into the night! Fun tho!

1932 - Sat. Up & knitted & sewed pillows. Bill came. Sat down with me during games on radio. So cute. I love him (I do). Oh ear. Incident of Joey & couch & Bill & me. M.W. to movies "Back Street." Good. Home & bed & you!
1933 - Sun. Up late. Rain, but cleared. Picnic at Humarock beach. Lovely swimming. Sandstorm & sand in our food & hair. To Pearson's tonite & then home. Cards & I knitted on John's sweater. Bed 12.

1934 - Mon. M.W. & I up late. Breakfast & took her home. Packed a bit. Got Babs & we went to Rae Merrill's tea. Fun. Saw all the old gang, inc Jane Terry. Home & stayed home tonite & read. Bed not too late. I do miss him, di!

1935 - Tues. Up & town. Haircut & to Oculist. Left eye worse. Then to hospital to say G'bye to everybody. Dr. Merten there & I'm just crazy about her! Then lunch with Betty McKinnes. Shopped. Then to Wellesley tea. Not so bad! Home with Franny & Pinx. M.W., Charlotte, Uncle Bob, Robin, Joan & Peg here & Mom & Pop. Fun. Robin took M.W. & met to "Glenfield Opera House." Fun. Home. Bed 1:30.
1931 - Friday. Home after school & awful time about Jim calling etc. Dance tonite & with the heat etc, I nearly died. Dan, Bill, Sally & I. Home late.
1932 - Sun. To church with Sally. Last Sunday. Home & Bill there. He's so darling. To see Aunt Hat with M.W. this aft. Supper at M.W.'s. Home. Sally, she & knitting bee. Sally all nite. Fun.
1933 - Mon. Present. Awfully cold. To Pearson's this aft for lobsters. Had salad for dinner. "Wonderful good." Cards tonite & fooled around till quite late.

1934 - Tues. Up at 9. Up street & finally Munny & I off to town for last bit of shopping. Home & rested & read. Called M.W. Franny & I to "The Kid from Missouri "- Franchot Tone - good. We bridged. Paps & I against Franny & Stephen. We won but I was dumb. Home early. Read. Washed hair. Bed.

1935 - Wed. Up early. German all day & a little packing. Munny here & she's so grand, di! I was upset at dinner worrying about Bill & gosh he came, di & we did everything I had hoped. To Aliquippa in his Chevy, then to movies. "China Seas," Clark Gable & Jean Harlow. Home. Talked with Munny. Then Bill & I together & great conflict within me. My vow(?) still tops! And all I could think, but not say was "I love him. I love him. How can I stand not seeing or being with him till Xmas! Oh my, di!
1931 - Saturday. Sally & I to town & met M.W. & saw "Caught Plastered." Also Duke Ellington. M.W. & I tonite to Joe E. Brown in "Broadminded."
1932 - Mon. To oculist & eyes swell. To bridge luncheon with Eleanor Critchlow & Franny. Pretty good time - Jean Morton, nice. Bernice Steinberg - cute. Home & bed early for a change.

1933 - Tues. Didn't do much. Cold. Sally's Uncle Bill Patterson & his wife arrived for dinner. Sally & I got coffee ice cream cones. Talked after dinner. Frederick & I played Honeymoon bridge. Bed late.

1934 - Wed. Up & washed hair. Took Ma(?) to be looked at. M.W.'s for breakfast. Home & then I packed a bit. Rested. Franny, Betty Richmond & I to Wellesley tea this aft. Loads of fun seeing everyone again. Finished "War & Peace" tonite. Decided to leave Sunday. Munny & I together this evening. Oh me! I'll miss her so!

1935 - Thurs. Up early. Studied till 10:30 & almost finished! Munny & I to town & last bit of shopping. Home. Packed frantically. Then Bill came. He was simply wonderful, di!! Babs, Walter, Franny, Lib C. & M.W., Doss & Mr. V.P. all down. Then Pop & Mom & John & Peg & Bill & I had dinner. It was just perfect!!!! I love them all. 10 came all too soon. G'byes & kisses & I was off on the train for the last year. I felt sad all the way through!
1931 - Sunday. Church. Studied. Walk with Jim F. (fun) (Rea's) M.W.'s for supper. Studied & read & stayed all night. Talked till midnight.
1932 - Tues. Packed. Mother & I both furious. Up to school with Sally & we had grand talk with teachers. To Sally's for dinner with Jim Crooks. Fun. Home & bed late. No Bill. Doggone. I like him.
1933 - Wed. Up late. To Scituate Harbor. Bot candy. Swimming at Humarock. Last time. Oh dear. Doris came tonite (awful nice) & we played Pounce - nervous game. Guy on radio. Smoothy. Bed late.

1934 - Thurs. Up late. Worked about. No town on account of rain. Had Ford fixed. M.W. & I up to tennis matches today & some fun. Berkeley Bell marvelous. Hall good but I don't like him. O'Laughlin beats Heck. Helped get dinner. Read & bed early.

1935 - Fri. Arrived in Philly & Sally met me. To Smarts & grand chat in a.m. Lunch & called Dottie G. I had a sort of cold; so Sally & I slept this aft after walk in Wanamakers & Bl(?). Sally & I to see Fred Astaire & Ginger Rodgers in "Top Hat" - Excellent!! Eats. Home, a whisky & bed late.
1931 - Monday. Came home & read. Tennis tonite with Sally. Saw M.W. & also S. Campbell. Beat Sally 6-3 6-1. Home & studied

1932 - Wed. Up & said G'bye to Wally. Bill here on & off all day. Hair done by Mr. Darcy. M.W. over. Billy & Sally for supper. So cute. Jim C & Jim F. to say "g'bye." Up to Kuhn's. Anne awfully nice. To Izzy Clark's but she wasn't home! Incident of Bill "Good bye" & seeing Chubby at once!!

1933 - Thurs. Up early. To Rodindale, Auburndale, & Wellesley. All thru Munger. Janitor nice. Left stuff in room. To Ad Building about Sally transferring next year. Keen. Back to Marshfield & bed early. Oh me!

1934 - Fri. Up early & washed things. M.W. & I to town. Norma Shearer & Frederic March in "Barretts of Wimpole St." Wonderful. Rain. Boys & gum. Oh me! M.W. & Doss & I to Ambridge tonite to see "Of Human Bondage." - 2nd time & I liked it. Will Bill get home tonite or tomorrow?

1935 - Sat. Up at 9. Sally & I to market. Then home & fooled. Dottie Gorrel came for lunch. Then she & Sally & I to movies. Claudette Colbert in "She Married Her Boss." Eats. Then Dottie left. Mr. Mrs. Smart, Fred, Sally & I dinner, then talked & reminisced & I went for train about 10:30. Nice visit & I hated to say G'bye.
1931 - Tuesday. Came home & rested. Bill R. & I alone here at noon. I like him. Awful cold in nose. Doctor's tonight & medicine, etc.
1932 - Thurs. Up at 7:15. Present. Pleasant drive to Philly. 9 ½ hours to get here. Benjamin Franklin Hotel. Supper. Read & bed early for early trip tomorrow. G'night.

1933 - Fri. Up early. Packed. To Grand - Smarts for lunch. To Jamaica Plains & then to Boston. Bot chair and shopped in 5&10. G'bye to Smarts. Boohoo. Met Mr. Trask & back to Peabody. Good old Peanut. Swell fun. Rain.

1934 - Sat. Up early. Worked about. M.W. & I to horse show at Greensbury this aft. She saw Paul Mellon & I bumped into Chubby who was awful nice! Show grand! To M.W.'s for supper & home & packed till all hours. Tired as hell. Blowout & Bill not home yet! Oh gosh!

1935 - Sun. Arrived Boston 8:30. Out to Wellesley by 10. Worked on German till dinner & afterwards. Miss Kelly going to be swell! Miss Bushee back! Then off about 4:30 to Rockport - Straitsmouth Inn with Barn heads. More fun - 12 of us! Out for walk in gorgeous moonlight & ocean. Back to inn & talked & bed sort of early. I was tired! Roomed with Jean Mailey.
1931 - Wednesday. Nominating Committee meeting & to Charlottes for dinner. Good time. Home & studied, letters & you, diary. Cold better.
1932 - Fri. Up & started at 8:30. Rain, rain, all the way. Awful! Arrived Wellesley 10:15 P.M & am now ready for bed. Eliot not bad & Mrs. Wheeler O.K. so far. Miss Anne, but will see her again.
1933 - Sat. up late. Rained hard. Knitted while Peanut ironed. Fooled around. Wrapped caramels tonite & laughed around. Betsey Plane is a good egg & knows a lot. Ginny a pal.

1934 - Sun. Changed mind & didn't go today & then Bill came. has a moustache, I like it! After dinner he & I went up to see Jam. Home & he left. Chubby called & we had a nice chat. Oh gosh di, I still could like him! Bill's best tho! M.W. & I ride & here for supper. To see Izzy Clark. Changed tire all by myself in a.m.

1935 - Mon. Up at 8:45. Sort of cold! Breakfast & then out on rocks by ocean. More fun. Meeting there. Then lunch, Gloucester & got stuff & saw theatre. On back to Wellesley by dinner-time. Prill & Fairbanks here & Keown later. Fun talking till late.
1931 - Thursday. School & Nominating Committee meeting again. Fun in gym & bed early tonite.
1932 - Sat. Up late. Girls arrived. Unpacked. Room mate - Betty Fairbanks - O.K. rather nice. Walk with Marjorie Atherholt. Nice - also her roommate, Marguerite Goodrich. Vic & fun.
1933 - Sun. Up & down to Marblehead. Storm, but grand. Huge dinner & I ate too much. Knitted & worked on puzzle. Roulette with Roper. Rained all day. Fooled around.

1934 - Mon. Up early. Munny & I Ping Pong & Bill came. More Ping Pong. Village & talk with Ginny R. & saw Bill earlier. Bill gave me wine. Darling & kissed me g'bye! G'bye to Izzy & Babs & M.W. & sat with Dammuddy. J. Keeney in. Left on 6:15 train. Awful leaving Munny! Chase Smith on train. Rather nice but what am I in for? May see him tomorrow. Up til 12. Also met Wellesley girl - Frances Graham.

1935 - Tues. Up early. Over to Barn in a.m. & helped around. Typed a pack of cards etc. To vill in aft with Prill. Over to Barn to figure out work. Fairbanks, Keown, Prill, Dolly all here. Talked till late. Studied a bit of German.
1931 - Friday. I gave supper - dance at E. Club. M.W., Sally, Jim, Bill, Dan & I. Good time after we got there. Jim & Sally terribly late!
1932 - Sun. Up early. Church with Ruth Keown, very nice. Tennis in aft with Jinny Trask, very cute & I like her. Met our vill Junior (Marie Cass). Saw Ruth Pitcairn & Bernice Steinberg. Tired.
1933 - Mon. Peanut & I to Boston with Mr. Trask. Saw W.E.E.I. Shopped. Lunch at Seville. Met. Saw "Torch Singer." Good. Home & Bobby & Robin Adair for dinner. Smoked at last. Wrote letter & bed late.

1934 - Tues. Arrived about 1! Half the corridor here already! Unpacked all aft & talked to everybody this evening! Prill & I talked over everything about our summers till 1:15. Oh me! She's Vill Junior & I'm s' thrilled.

1935 - Wed. Up early. Studied a while this a.m. early then talk to Danver people, then sorted cards etc. for Barn. Then tryouts this aft & I was sort of scared. But they all worked so hard etc. Home. Meeting at Chappin's then more study. Dolly in & we talked till real late!
1931 - Saturday. Sally, M.W. & I to Stanley. Duke Ellington & Orchestra. Also "Caught Plastered." Very good. I drove home etc. (Mistake, but I've forgotten what happened, so tsk tsk)
1932 - Mon. Worried about serving. Served first at dinner tonite. Scared stiff. Gym exam in aft. 2 hrs & ¼ . Bought a bike - $10. Fun with all the girls. Tired & bed late.

1933 - Tues. Up at 9:15 & messed around. Peanut & I walked to Salem this aft. Walked all around. Cold & I have a cold. Oh me. Movies tonite with Betsey & Ginger "Elmer the Great" & "Storm at Daybreak." Again. Ate at Mellens(?) Home & bed.

1934 - Wed. Up early. Unpacked trunk. Jeanne Washburn came. Like her heaps! Great talk about Chubby. To vil with Prill & bot things. Home & messed around. Bed early tonite. 9 Vill Juniors in our house.

1935 - Thurs. Up early. Worked hard in German all a.m. Quivered & shook. Finally the test came - 6 of us & Miss Jeffrey. All over, now & what if I flunked?? Barn all aft. More cute kids & good workers! Cleaned out Prop house. Then Prill & Ottilee Stoehr & I to movies "Escape Me Never" & "Calm Yourself."
1931 - Sunday. Bill here all afternoon. Was I ever thrilled? Oh gee ma! He starts to school again tomorrow. Sally & I to church this a.m.
1932 - Tues. Up & served my 1st breakfast & lunch. Assembly in a.m. Motor test in aft. Washed hair & had shower tonite & bed early. Letter to Dammuddy. Tired.
1933 - Wed. Up & ate. Letter from Munny. In New Haven. Cold. Jig saw. Finished sweater except for sleeves. Peanut & I to Peabody. Fooled on piano.
1934 - Thursday. More people arrived. Munger almost full. Helped Ginny sell Portrait directories. Saw J.W. Movies tonite with Peanut - "One More River" & "Stamboul Quest." Good. Home. Washed.

1935 - Friday. Up early. Cards off to Freshmen Props. Sort of sore throat way down. Over to Barn & there most of aft. Peanut arrived! Then Andy, then Janet & Marion Roe-Cloud! Bells tonite. Got gown today - also cap! Cap sits on bureau with gumpee & at last I realize I am a Senior - honestly, di - a Senior!!!
1931 - Monday. Sally & I saw Constance Bennett in "The Common Law." Very good. I liked it heaps. Mrs. Smart peeved because I asked Sally.
1932 - Wed. Assembly in a.m. Tea at Washington house this aft. Fun. House meeting tonite about gray books. Down to vil after it & bed late.

1933 - Thurs. Up late. Last morning. Messed around. Packed suitcase. Left for college about 2. Arrived. Dead tired. Unpacked. Ate dinner with Mrs. Pascal (4 Seniors & Peanut) Bed & did I sleep? Tired!

1934 - Fri. Up for breakfast. Everybody finally arrived. So keen! Soph - Jane Barber - swell! Julia Masbern(?) probably a dope. Haven't met her. Saw Dobby & Hat tonite & then great party in Dotties & Mudges room & we read Round Robins. I just can't be serious up here. Oh me!

1935 - Sat. Up early. Tore around all day. A.A. luncheon. Practice for A.A. skit. Me Anabella Tomkins. Worked for Barn. Campus supper & at last met Mary Dempwolf. Barn all evening & all my little Freshmen were grand. I was so happy!
1931 - Tuesday. Shirley had a farewell party for M.W. I went with Jim Crooks. Left at 9:00 but Jim drove us in country. Home late & no theme!
1932 - Thurs. Assembly in a.m. Also an interest test. No canoe test. Franny came over tonite. Down to vil later & ate at Leibers. General good time.

1933 - Fri. Up at 7. Unpacked all a.m. Set up for lunch - 1st job. To see Dottie Fagg. Not home. Vil with Peanut. To Eliot for junk with Hannah. Gang arrived. All over & bed late after talks, etc. Pril Donnell - a good egg. Mother called tonite. Thrills.

1934 - Sat. Up early again. Worked after breakfast. First chapel. O.K. French reading exam. Not bad. To vill with Prill & Dobby. Worn out. Betty Richmond for dinner & then Vaudeville. Fun! Fairbanks & Keown & I took them home. Bed late.
1935 - Sun. Up late. Peanut & I to Hole for breakfast. Then back & to chapel. Fairbanks, Peanut & I out in canoe this aft. & loads of fun. Fooled around tonite. Getting ready for classes. Bed early.
1931 - Wednesday. Mary Wells & I saw "Arizona." She was here for dinner. Last nite. I'll miss her heaps.

1932 - Fri. Off for breakfast. Letters. Short assembly - Lost(?). Shopped around. Bought chair. Crowd in tonite to dance & vic & talk. Bed late & am awfully tired. Bought books. Test on gray books tonite.
1933 - Sat. Up at 6:30. Ugh! Walked all a.m. Chapel. Class meeting. Schedules. Set lunch. Agora to help Ginny. Vil with gang. Bells 6-7. Dottie didn't come. Vaudeville with Keown. Gang in. Bed late.
1934 - Sunday. Up for bekbets. Read paper etc. Chapel with Andy & Dolly. Grand dinner. Rain today. Tea at Marg Forsythes & at Marny Maynards. Home. Talked till late tonite. Julia Maslem not here yet!

1935 - Mon. Messed around. To vil & then finally Heredity at 11:40. Going to be good. No Chem lab today. Then over to Barn this aft. Up to gym. Worked about at Agora. Dolly gave a tea for Rettig. Home. Messed around tonight. Job - cleaning john(?).
1931 - Thursday. K. Nelly & I went to see W. Rogers in "Young as You Feel." I liked it heaps. Bill Jetty Pres., Wilson Tiernan V.P. & E. Ruff Sec'y Treas of our class.
1932 - Sat. Chapel for everyone after breakfast. Went to vil in a.m. Jim Fulman came in aft. Ride & canoe ride. Fun. Tower dorm supper & vaudeville with Mary Tufts. Darling!

1933 - Sun. Up for bekbets. Imagine. Gang of us to get people from our Eliot rooms. Harriet Rasoo swell! Also Helene Gerber. Van Dusen good preacher - Long. Gang in Ruth's room this aft. Ate & ate. Tomorrow - awful.

1934 - Mon. First classes. Doesn't seem possible! Education terrible! Music O.K. but I'm not to take it. Tore around changing schedules! Got to Chemistry lab & Miss Woodland a peach. Worn out. Rain. Fun tonite. Bridge, etc.

1935 - Tues. Oh my! Metabolism's going to be O.K. German, terrific & Organic simply fierce. Walked miles this aft. Founders, gym, Agora, vill, Tower, Store & home in time for dinner. Meeting at Agora. Studied. Heard Louis - Baer fight & Louis won!
1931 - Friday. John left! Great sadness. Down to Sally's all night. Jim, Sam & Jim C. down for a while.
1932 - Sun. To chapel after serving breakfast. Home & went to bed after dinner since I have a cold. Wrote letters & waited on supper & bed early.

1933 - Mon. First classes. Scared of all of them! Do I belong in college? or what is wrong? I wait on lunches as a job. Not bad. Chose sports this aft & at last met Dot Fagg. Awfully cute! Met Betty Bagg - Good.
1934 - Tues. French. Promises to be interesting. Physiology excellent, but Miss Murphy acts different. I guess she'd have to. Job - lunch prep. O.K. Home & bed early tonite.
1935 - Wed. Swimming Pool Carnival meeting tonight 1st of the year. Had a free afternoon because we can't start Metabolism lab yet.
1931 - Saturday. Wilkinsburg beat Sewickley 46-0. Huge team. Dan, Jim, Jim Crooks, Bricky, Peg Handy & I to "The Black Camel" at Bellevue tonite.
1932 - Mon. First classes. French awful. Speech fun. Physics lab not so hot. To lib tonite with Marjorie after song leader meeting. Ice cream cones, home & bed.

1933 - Tues. Awful Zo! 5 drawings. Bible horrible & I can't understand Mr. Haroutunian! Take B.B. this year. To vil at 9:30 with Keown & Dot G. Got 1 ½ doughnuts. Me oh my. Studied & messed around. Bed late.
1934 - Wed. German for first time. Going to be hard. Chem class & lab for 4 hours this aft. Oh me! Fooled tonite & should have studied more. Tony Barber nice kid. Sun out today!

1935 - Thurs. Scared of German & Chem. but lived thru them. First bells at noon. Then German 206 this aft. Not so bad! Tea at Agora. Helped get it. 77 people came. Great crowds! Then around to stable etc for Barn. Dress Rehearsal tonite & sort of tired after it all!
1931 - Sunday. Saw Bill for about 1 second. (Dagnabit!) Studied & read this aft. Bed early tonite. Church with Sally this a.m.
1932 - Tues. Classes again. Up to Hathaway. Fun in zoology. Library. Dinner with Mignon. Danced & studied & wrote tonite. Bed early enough. Letters from Peggy & Phyllis.

1933 - Wed. Basketball this aft. & Miss Beall pounced on me for ind. sport. Oh me! Classes better today. B.B. swell. Center again I guess. to vil with M Schoenfuss. Ruth Stevenson took me to dinner. Danced & to libe.
1934 - Thurs. Up early & studied hard. Lunch prep easy today. Physiology this aft & loads of fun. Worked at Barn for a while. Home. Dinner. Studied most all evening. Talked with Prill.

1935 - Fri. Up with a bang. Worked with Miss Woodland. Then, Heredity. Studied it this aft. Home. Sat & talked to Dob for an hour. Then b.b. & such fun di! I love it. Home. First step-singing tonite in caps & gowns & I was sad! Then home. Studied till late. Bed!
1931 - Monday. Munny & I saw "A Woman of Experience." Dumb. Meeting of Girl Reserves this afternoon. Hair cut, etc.
1932 - Wed. Changed French teachers. Whoopie! Rained all day. Knitted, studied, ate & wrote letters. Met Mr. Keown. Very nice. Studied, letters, & bed early. Talk.
1933 - Thurs. Zo better today. No tennis test. Bible simply awful. Gray book quiz. Dobby, Peanut & I to vil. Shopped. Saw Pinx. Met Nancy Clough. Good kid. Studied all evening & fixed nails, etc.

1934 - Fri. German swell. Miss Salditt nice. No lab this aft & came home for a while. B.B. at 4:40. Home & ate dinner with gang. Dress rehearsal for play tonite. Awfully dumb. First fire drill of year tonite - 2 of them!

1935 - Sat. Classes. Then worked in Chem. bldg all aft. Barn Reception tonight "The Silver Hilt." Good. Then dancing etc. My little sister had Poison Ivy. Met Jeanne Wysor at last & she is just as nice as she can be. Tough that she's deaf, tho!

1931 - Tuesday. Cabinet meeting of Senior officers. Current Events next Monday. Car washed etc. Bill took Sally home. Poor little Cully was run over! And she was so cute! Why can't we keep cats? Oh dear. It makes me feel awful!!!
1932 - Thurs. To vil tonite with Ginny Trask, Ruth Keown & Betty. Bought food. Gang in our room & we couldn't eat. What fun in finally getting to our food. Bed 11:45!!
1933 - Friday. Dobby came tonite after Ginny & I were in the vil this aft buying food & ten of had toasted cheese sandwiches & other yummies tonite. More fun! Bed late!
1934 - Sat. Classes for 1st week over. Oh me! Up to Barn & worked on Play. Dead tired, but it was good tonite. "The Flight of the Queen Bee" by Lord Dunsany. Kids took B. Richmond for me.

1935 - Sun. Up sort of late. Corridor breakfast & Miss Kelly & Miss Bushee came. Studied this aft. after chapel & dinner & Ginny & Cynthia Kilburn here for dinner. Agora for Vespers. Ginny came & then brot us home!
1931 - Wednesday. Bill, Jim, Sally & I played tennis. Bill & I were the lucky ones, winning all our matches. I took Jim home etc.
1932 - Fri. Read poem in speech. Basketball this aft. Ruined foot. Better tonite. Ate dinner with gentry. Studied tonite & had grand time. Wrote letters.
1933 - Sat. First Chem. lab. Fun, but I'm s'dumb. Barn Reception tonite & I took Dottie Fagg. She is just darling. Like her heaps. Danced after play & had smoothy time. Bed late after a fine day.
1934 - Sun. Up & fooled the live-long day. I might have studied. Andy & I went for walk tonite - Pond Road - scared to death. Almost got picked up. Were we scared. Oh me.

1935 - Mon. Starting week no. 2 of Senior year. How time does fly, di! Worked at Chem bldg with Miss Woodland all a.m. Then Heredity. First Chem lab this aft & not so bad! Home & was tired. Studied tonite. Bed late.
1931 - Thursday. Gym & I was hot & bothered! Girl Reserve Cabinet meeting. Took Sally home. Studied etc tonight.
1932 - Sat. Watta day. In my room on account of foot. Letter from Bill! Thrills! Package from Boston. Everybody sweet to me. To Barn reception tonite with Sally Supplee, Louise Summers Ginny Trask!

1933 - Sun. Up late. Tennis with Dot Gorrell & Mudge. Studied. Fooled around & Betty & I went to see Mrs. Hobbs but she wasn't home. Birdie on sock(?) Eliot supper tonite in 2nd floor kitchenette. Ginny & I to Hale.
1934 - Mon. First of October! And I forgot to say Rabbit rabbit! German gets better & better. Studied a mite. Janet & I went to movies - "Madchen in Uniform" in German. Awfully good.

1935 - Tues. Heavy set of classes. Then right after lunch, played tennis match with W. Greenspan. Lost 603; 6-3. Bad! I was rotten! Tea at Barn at 6:30 & then Serenade Step-Singing tonite. Then Barn Mass Meeting & we had to make speeches from platform. I was scared.
1931 - Friday. Sewickley lost to Beaver 18-0. Dan took me to dance at gym tonite. Fun. I had to drive & am dead now.
1932 - Sun. Again, sat around all day. Fun with girls coming in & all. Supper downstairs. Not allowed to serve. Feast tonite. Jack Applegate, Ruth, Marjory, Marguerite, Ginny, Dobby & Betty. Fun
1933 - Mon. Tried out this evening for Soph cabaret. Am to be a witch. To libe afterwards but couldn't get book. Home & pretended to study. Am to sit at Mrs. Pascal’s table 3 nites a week.
1934 - Tues. More classes & more lab. B.B. this aft & I keep getting lousier. Anyhow, Jeanne Washburn came for dinner & we messed about. Step Singing & then home & studied.

1935 - Wed. Zo. bldg. all day today. Miss Murphy swell this aft as we worked on rats etc. Killed one due to my dumbness. Then talked etc. S.P.C. meeting tonite. Miss Elliott nicer. Then home & tried to study!
1931 - Saturday. Rose late. Washed hair, stockings, Buddy, Casey & self. Read "Newcomer" by Thackeray & lessons etc. tonite.
1932 - Mon. Awful Physics lab. Went to visit Pinx. Over to Barn & to see Miss Jaques. Got a Banana Split tonite with Ruth & Betty. Fun. Bed early.

1933 - Tues. Barn tryouts this evening. I signed up for oodles of things. Probably won't make any. To libe again. I'm always there. Ginny & I to see Mlle. Malbot. She gave us tea. Darling & I still think she's grand!
1934 - Wed. 4 hours of lab. Then Prill, Dottie G. & I to A.K.X & Z.A. teas. Both awfully nice. We had great talks. Studied quite a bit tonite what with lessons piling up. Wish Bill'd write!

1935 - Thurs. Up & first roll call in Chemistry today. Bells at noon. Then German this aft. Then Agora tea for Juniors & Seniors. More darn fun! Then cleaned up. Fairbanks our new House Pres.! Oh di. It's so grand, I feel almost as if I'd won something!
1931 - Sunday. Church & lessons. S.S.. Bill, Dan & I to Brook's Folly. Ghosts to people who came. Keen view. Awful walls. Supper at S's & Jim down later.
1932 - Tues. Up to Personnel Bureau. To libe. Zoology fun. Knitted. Pillow fight tonite with Betty & Marguerite. Studied. Letters. Bed early, I hope.
1933 - Wed. Hair cut this aft & to Music Box to see about radio. Wrote Sally. B.B. & hockey this aft. Both a little better. Dobby's a grand egg. I see Ruth P. & Pinx every time. Studied tonite.
1934 - Thurs. Handed in 1st drawings to Miss Murphy. Dottie G, Carol Kulp & I to Agora & T.Z.E. teas. Impressed with Agora. But I won't get up my hopes. Sat at Miss McElroy's table.

1935 - Fri. Worked in Chem bldg. Then home this aft till 4:30. May Prop tryouts brot in. Then to b.b. & gosh, it was fun, di!! I love it so! Jeanne Wysor for dinner & she is just so nice! Studied tonite & bed late.
1931 - Monday. No current events. Cabinet meeting at noon. Studied & read tonight.
1932 - Wed. To recital tonite with Ginny Trask & Dolly Edmond. Fun. Crazy boys who turned out to be Bee's brother & friend. Oh gosh! Fun & bed late.
1933 - Thurs. More fun in Zo. Hate old Bible. Mess about Physics. Did French & went to libe. Class meeting about songs. Rained tonite & I studied & fooled with Pril Donnell & Andy.
1934 - Fri. No lab today. Grand feeling. Fooled in Prill's room etc. till b.b. Betty Richmond for dinner & then to Step Singing. First time I've sat on Junior steps.

1935 - Sat. Classes. Worked at Chem bldg. Here all aft & fooled around. Then in on 4:57 with Prill & NP. Then met Fairbanks at Touraine. Dinner at Jacob Winth's Then walk thru park. To Schubert to see "Jubilee" - awfully good. Home Bed late.
1931 - Tuesday. Drove with Sally this aft. Home & studied & read "Newcomer" tonite.
1932 - Thurs. Mrs. Hobbs is my faculty advisor. I like her heaps. Studied parameciums this aft. Messed around & studied tonite.
1933 - Fri. Tennis this aft with Ruth Nicholson. Tournament. She won 4-6, 6-3, 6-4. More darn fun. I hope I can play her again. Libe tonite after Step Singing to try out for Barn. Hope I make it!
1934 - Sat. No town today because it rained guns. Toasted marshmellows etc. this aft & tonite Andy, Dolly & I to moves "Treasure Island." Fun. Home. Bed. Tony on grand date. Prill out, etc.

1935 - Sun. Up at 9:15. Wynfred Fox had a breakfast then corridor breakfast. Then learned Indian songs & dances from Marion Roe-Cloud. Dinner with Fairbanks & guest. Betty Crawford. Wrote letters etc. Picked leaves with Janet. Supper & Vespers at Agora. Fun! 8 of us! Then home - Major Bowes & studied.
1931 - Wednesday. Fun with Sally this aft. Tonight I studied & wrote letters. To bed rather late.
1932 - Fri. Letters. B.B. in aft & I had to play against Jane Loomis, head of sport. Good egg. Made a basket. Subbed tonite at dinner. Studied not at all. Talked & knitted & bed early.
1933 - Sat. Chem lab & I finished early. Practice for next week's cabaret. Fun. To Hathaway. Party tonite here at Munger. Grand fun. Danced. Sang. Ate & played games. Mrs. Paschal is a dear!
1934 - Sun. Up late. Read d- Education Book. Dinner with gang. Read this aft. Walk around lake with Peanut & Sandy. German tonite & much fooling. Bed early. Wish I were home!

1935 - Mon. Worked in Chem bldg. Heredity. Then Chem lab this aft. Fun. Archery & I was lousy - 168. Home & dinner. Meeting of Barn at Chappas(?). Home & called Munsy. Swell talk & it was so grand to hear her voice once again! Finally bed & thot of home!
1931 - Thursday. Girl Reserve Bldg & Girl Party. I was boy. Sally & I almost won Waltz prize. I nearly fell over. Lots of fun. Good eats. Pres. of Latin Club.

1932 - Sat. Awful old classes. Finally 2 o'clock came & Honey, Bee Short & I to Boston, Cambridge. Got Nadine. To Boston to Met - "One Way Passage." Dugin Parks for Supper. Grand. Soph. serenade. Keen. Bed!!

1933 - Sun. Up late. Ate crackers. Breakfast at Hole with Dolly & Carter. Congr. church. O.K. Drug store for junk for eye. Bells 5:30 - 10:00. horrible! Tea at 5 by Seniors. M.K. Britten & Apple Leich keen girls.
1934 - Mon. Classes again. Always hound us. But I finished up work & tonite Keown, Sandy & I went to Natick to see "British Agent." O.K.! I like Leslie Howard. Had Sauterne. Home & tired!

1935 - Tues. Cut in Chem. German O.K. Then B.B. this aft & loads of fun after work in Chem. bldg. Then to Steve's at Cag(?) for dinner. Met Miss Lyman. She's awfully nice! Mrs Holder came in & we all talked. To Chem. lecture. Then House Meeting & Fairbanks presided & did a swell job!
1931 - Friday. Saw Aunt Hat at Emericks. Town with Munny to see J. Harold Murray in "East Wind." I cried. Good! Saw S.S. & Jim F., Mr. & Mrs. Smart! Foggy.
1932 - Sunday. Up & ate at Hole in Wall. Chapel. Libe in aft. Studied. Out after supper for brief walk with girls. Back. Studied. Guests. Studied some more & bed early, I hope.
1933 - Mon. Classes again. To vil & to infirmary about eye. Better. Nominated. Basketball this aft & I got more into swing. Read for French. Studied all evening. Bed early.

1934 - Tues. B.B. this aft & got along better. Kilbon & I clicked. Miss Murphy, Miss Leach, Steve, Dobby, Fairbanks, Caton & I for dinner. More darn fun! Silly as heck. They stayed late so I bedded early & hope for best.

1935 - Wed. Zo. all day. The expt. worked swelly today! The to Agora at 5:30 for Hall(?) Party! Awful. Then A.A. meeting & di, I'm a member of the Blazer Committee. Oh di! If it would only come about! Home & studied till late.
1931 - Saturday. Town in a.m. & bo't stuff. Freedom game this aft. We lost 6-0. Sally's for supper. Jim C. Dan & Bill down. Jim & I won at Michigan. Bed at Sally's.

1932 - Mon. More schedules to make out. Physics lab & actually did something. Found out Mrs. Hobbs is my faculty advisor. Awfully nice. To libe tonite with Dolly Edmund. Keen nite & moon. I miss Bill!
1933 - Tues. Fell in chair in Zo. Crazy! Awful French & I had to talk. Vil with Peanut. Dinner with Dobby. Discussed religion. Not nominated this year. Tough. But does it matter?

1934 - Wed. Up at 5:45 to finish studying. Quiz in German. 1st of year. Miss Sallditt swell! Lab this aft for 4hrs. & I was done out. Home & Prill & I talked. To Fiske after dinner. Home. Studied. Bed before 10.

1935 - Thurs. Lived thru the awful classes & prob. flunked a roll-call. Then Archery - 195 & German this aft. Then vill & hair cut etc. To libe tonite & Zo libe to work. Home. Packed! Letters & bed late. Hooray for tomorrow!
1931 - Sunday. Church & went to see Mr. & Mrs. Averill. To caves this aft at W.W. Park. Dan, Jim, Bill, Sally & I. Dinner at Smarts. Michigan afterwards & home 9:30.

1932 - Tues. Mrs. Hobbs called on me while sleeping. Again mentioned (Somebody) Jennings, studier of parmamecium. Made temp. captain of a team in b.b. Pinx, Ruth P. & I supper at Severance. Nice. Step-singing. (with Sophomores). Feast tonite at Marguerite's room. Fun!
1933 - Wed. Primaries today. Went to Infirmary for a nightgown. Silly act of Dolly's & mine. Fooled in Pril's room tonite & did Bible. Quizes next week. Lovely. This is next Mon. & I'm tired. G'nite.

1934 - Thurs. Crossed off all but Recording Sec'y. But, first elections today & I lost in finals. Prill Metcalf got it. Beth Brogue new pres. & she'll be O.K. Tea this aft. Studied hard tonite but didn't finish. Up at 6 tomorrow. 'Nite!

1935 - Fri. Oh my! Work in chem bldg. Cut in Heredity - off at last to Brattleboro on 12:55. Arrived Brattleboro at 7. Marion met us. Dinner & Mrs. Fairbanks is so nice. Movies, then eats & home & talked & bed late!
1931 - Monday. Sally & I, also Jim F rode hither & yon this aft. Bowled tonite with Mummer. She won 4 & I won 2. Wrote letters tonite.
1932 - Wed. To movies this aft at Wellesley Hills with Betty & Ginny Trask. Fun. Studied & pile of girls came in tonite. No letters because I finished lessons. Passed motor test.

1933 - Thurs. Peanut & I sitting peacefully when radio men arrived. Cute. Couldn't do much. More studying & probably went to vil for something or other. Studied & as usual - bed. Awful roll-call. M. Schoenfuss is our president! Thrills! Whitehead, Forsythe, Ellie Smith, etc. Grand!

1934 - Fri. Officers announced. Betty Brazee swell president! Felt sort of awful! No lab! Slept this aft & then b.b. but it was too cold for any fun! To Betty Richmond's for dinner. Swell gang in her house. To libe & home late. Prill & Tony & talked about virgins(?) etc. Very enlightening. or (?)??

1935 - Sat. Up late! What joy! Betty & Marion & I picnicked out on a swell hill overlooking river after Fairbanks & I went driving. Then to see Mrs. Kendall & she is perfectly grand, like Mrs. Hobbs. Home & off to Northfield - Francis Nevin. Back. Talked with Mrs. Fairbanks. To town & ate with Fitly(?) & Marion.
1931 - Tuesday. Studied & raked leaves this aft. Movies with Libby Rye "Transatlantic" tonite. Good! Washed hair & wrote letters.
1932 - Thurs. As usual - fun in Zoology. Came home & studied, knitted & read. Waited on dinner. House meeting tonite.
1933 - Fri. the 13th. But nothing awful happened. Practice for Cabaret tonite at 7:15 & stayed till 8:30 or later. Home & just fooled around instead of studying. Bible still awful.

1934 - Sat. More rain & great amt of snow! in a.m. Didn't go to Boston. Vill with Prill. Studied. Gang dinner. Betty & I to hole, then Schoenfuss, Sandy, Peanut, Betty & I cheese dreams etc - great fun Wish I were home to see Bill!!

1935 - Sun. Up late! Read & lounged in pajamas. Then to see Mr. & Mrs. Merrifield. Grand dinner, but Marion had taken Fitly(?) away. People came in & then we had to leave at 5. Had such a grand time! Like Mrs. Fairbanks heaps & Marion. Back on bus home on 11:35. Tired but happy!
1931 - Wednesday. Fooled with Sally this aft. Studied. Bowled tonite with Munny. She beat me. Letters & you tonite.
1932 - Fri. Peps beat the Jitters 3-2. What fun. Played to see who would be on squad. Hope. Hope. Studied a bit & messed around after dinner at Sarah's. Fun. Step singing.
1933 - Sat. Lab & got out early. Practice for Cabaret this aft. Dumb. Waited supper. Cabaret. Witch & Dolly's & my act. More fun! Dancing & eats. Home & talked it over. Bed in Betty's bed. Tired.

1934 - Sun. Slept till 8:30. So swell. 8 of us then got breakfast, orange juice, Eng. muffins & coffee. Swell! Read paper. Chubby Cutler here for dinner, 4. Then studied again for sever quizes for the week.
1935 - Mon. Hard to get up. But to Chem bldg & worked. Then Heredity. Chem lab. all aft. Archery & I was tired & lousy. (?) tonite copying Saturdays notes & doing Sat. & tomorrow's reading!
1931 - Thursday. Chapel today. Jim Crooks. Bill & Jim were all on. Studied & read tonite.

1932 - Sat. Went to libe & got a book. Came home & read. Freshman serenade tonite. Cute green lanterns. Back & to Alumnae for Cabaret. Danced with Pinx, Sarah, Ruth & Rosemary. Fun. Found out I was on basketball squad.
1933 - Sun. Up late. M. Schoenfuss, Peanut & I breakfasted in kitchenette. Studied. Long walk this aft to football game (Peanut & I) Mrs. Trask & Betsy came. To Bobby's. Waited supper. Studied. Bed.

1934 - Mon. Twins arrived! Wilhelm & Wilhelmina. My, such exuberance, but not like last year. Terrible time in Chem lab. I almost got cross. Prill & I to Fisks for dinner. Officers announced. Pres. Eda Fleming. Sec. Treas. Mary Selgaarde(?).

1935 - Tues. Still getting caught up. Knew nothing in Chemistry & Miss French wouldn't postpone quiz. Then b.b. this aft & clicked beautifully with Kilbon. Tonite dinner at Agora & found out my children are "Dempy" Demplewolff & Betty Gregg. So exciting & such a grand supper!
1931 - Friday. S.H.S. lost to Bellevue 6-0. S.H.S. better. I took Shirley, Peg Handy & Jane Terry. Rain etc. & eats at Bakery. Fun.
1932 - Sun. Up at 8:30. Read & wrote English theme. Studied till 4:30. Down by lake. So peaceful. Back & to chapel tonite. Home, studied & bed.
1933 - Mon. Classes. Made property committee. Thrills! Letter from Munny. Laundry & cute pictures. B.B & I'm sure not to make 1st team. Oh dear! Hockey awful! Am I a flop?

1934 - Tues. Lived in agony all day with Prill, but got no mail. But we still don't dare think we made a society! Got guinea pig in Phys. So cute. Named it Rosemary. Awful quiz which I flunked. What a person!

1935 - Wed. Wotta day. Pinned roses on Dempy & Betty Gregg. More fun! So exciting. Saw Miss Elliott. Did Zo expt all aft. Then, Initiation dinner at 1812 House tonite & more fun. The new bunch is simply grand! Oh gosh di, it is swell.
1931 - Saturday. Stayed home all day & cut out pajamas. What a job. Did lessons & washed some stockings.

1932 - Mon. B.B. practice this aft. Played center 3 times. Wotta life. Speech recital tonite. Wilfred Walter & Catherine Lacey. Good. Betty & Marguerite went to Marguerite's & to Boston. Suckers. Bed on time. Speech Recital.

1933 - Tues. To vil with Peanut & got some food, etc. To Stoney's for dinner with M. Schoenfuss, Bee Short, Tillie Bicknell & Helen Wadsworth. Swell time. Home & studied for Psyc. quiz tomorrow. Great life!

1934 - Roll Call in German & then Ruth Barnefield, pres. of Agora came up & gave me roses! I was up in heaven! Oh me. Swell initiation supper (Mr. Harod (?) & Mrs. McCarthy.) Home & Mother had called. Dammuddy died at 7:30. It's best, di, but oh gosh, how awful! I'll never, never see her again until ?

1935 - Thurs. Up at 5. Studied frantically for Chem quiz. Also did German. Quiz was pretty bad. Then bells, Archery, talk in German class, meeting of Props committee, fixing of schedules, studying at Zo libe & up till 12:45 doing those charts.
1931 - Sunday. Went down to Sally's. Stayed for supper. She has been sick but is better. Good for her! Church with Munny.
1932 - Tues. Rained all day. Wotta life. B.B. quiz in aft. Home. Changed clothes 3 times. Wrote awful criticism of Speech Recital. Bed on time. How wonderful. Training, you know.

1933 - Wed. Letter from John. Mother arrived this aft! Can you imagine? Swell! We walked over campus. She met kids. She & Peanut & I to Boston. Met Pop. Dinner at Copley & was it swell? Oh me! So grand to see them!
1934 - Thurs. Can't get over being in a society! And I can't get used to not having Dammuddy. Called family tonite & talked to John, Mom 'n' Pop. It was so swell. I wish I were home!.

1935 - Fri. Up & did some Heredity. Then work at Chem bldg. Heredity & I was tired! To lunch with Miss Elliott at Horton. Miss Beall came, too! More fun. Talked about S.O.C. To First Nat. 1 ordered for Agora. Mr. Hopkins swell. Home. Slept. B.B. & I took charge. B. Richmond for dinner & whole gang of us went to Wellesley movie tonite. Good!
1931 - Monday. Girl Reserve meeting after school. Took Sally home. Studied as usual tonite.
1932 - Wed. Rain & more rain. How discouraging. Went all the way over to basketball to discover that I didn't have to go. Wrote letters, slept, knitted & read. Bye & g'nite!

1933 - Thurs. Lived thru class. Town & Met Munny & Pop. Mother & I to Seville & then shopped. Wrap & china dishes! Talked at hotel. (It's all like a dream!) They left on boat. Home & attempted to study tonite. Oh me! Priscilla is so nice!

1934 - Fri. Up early & studied German & Chem. B- in German roll call. Chem not so bad. To libe & then B.B. & it was swell today. Miss Beall said nice things. To Zo libe tonite. Steve, Miss Murphy, Miss Leach. More darn fun! Gosh, I like them! Dammuddy's funeral at 3. Sat in libe & thought. Wrote Munny at 4.

1935 - Sat. Up at 5. German theme. Classes. Studied in Zo libe this aft. Home after Prep. at Agora. Then tonite - all dressed in formals, formal initiation. Such fun, di! 2 daughters, Dempy & Betty were so grand. Ceremony very impressive & I almost felt like weeping Barny & Ginny K. back & loads of fun!
1931 - Tuesday. Fooled around. Raked leaves this aft & bowled tonight with Munny. We both made 95. Our best scores yet.
1932 - Thurs. Still more rain. Basketball supper tonite but no teams announced on account of the rain. Good eats. Down to vil & bought grapes with R. Keown. Home. Bed early.
1933 - Fri. 2 quizes. What ho. Made up hockey. Miss Ward of Eva La Galliennne Co. talked to Barn. Wonderful. Stanley called. Home! Props meeting. Dobby's for Bible stuff. Party in my room & bed late.

1934 - Sat. In a turmoil all day with work. Finally tonite, 7:30 Initiation service. Oh gosh di! Never has anything impressed me more. Roses, candles, corsage pins, hand shake & Barny's swell! Home & spread. Prill & Melvin about.

1935 - Sun. Up early. Agora breakfast. Not enough. Then chapel. Dr. Boynton Merrill. good! Dinner & Marion Roe-Cloud spoke! Art came about three. Tennis & 2-6, 6-4, 6-4, he won. I owed him a movie. We went to Old France for dinner & then to Met & saw "Hands Across the Table." Prill certainly acted funny. I suppose (?) it will happen as I think Art is terribly nice. I like him loads.
1931 - Wednesday. Just a usual school day. Took Sally home in aft. Studied. Bowled with Mother tonight. I got 88 & she got 95 again!
1932 - Fri. B.B. practice in aft, which grew into teams. Am a sub on the 1st team & a regular center on the 2nd. I'm so glad. I attend all the games. Studied tonite & washed hair. Pete here.

1933 - Sat. To Boston. Shopped. Met Dobby & Hat Qua , also Mary Raymond. Museum for Zo. Dinner at Seville. Fooled & then to Plymouth theatre & saw "The Late Christopher Bean." Right good. Tired. Home. Bed. Late!

1934 - Sun. To Agora for swell breakfast. Back & studied. I was elected Ass't Purveyor. Get teas! Vespers tonite at 6 & had to be nice to faculty. Like Barny heaps. Miss Murphy here for dinner. She's swell! Wrote Ed. paper tonite till all hours. Oh me!

1935 - Mon. Up early & studied. Worked at Chem Bldg. Heredity. Chem lab & Archery in aft. Blazer Com. meeting tonite. S.O.C. meeting. Barely home & Mom called. Too perfect di! I talked with Bill & it was heavenly! Can hardly believe it. Oh gosh di, I really love him so much. Wasn't Munny awfully nice & grand to me?
1931 - Thursday. Studied in aft. Girl Reserves & "Sporting Blood" with Sally tonite. Peachy! I cried. More lessons & bed late.
1932 - Sat. Awful classes in morning. Nap & fixed nails etc. for dance (Fall Informals) tonite with Stanley & Bick Long & Betty. More darn fun! Home late after a perfect nite. Howe, Sullivan. Keen.
1933 - Sun. Up late. Aroused by noise. Wrote letters & studied in a.m. Studied this aft. Making up lost time. To Ruth's for dinner. Sewickley gang there. Talked it all over. What fun!
1934 - Mon. To see E. Pease tonite & also Mama Barnefield about teas & Vespers. Foold(?) away much time! To see Hat & Eunice about our future party. Home. Bed late.

1935 - Tues. Sort of walked on air today. Metabolism quiz & I hope I got thru it o.k.!! Pooed(?) out when I came to Chemistry & consequently knew nothing! What a life. Tore about this aft & went to B.B. at 4:40. It's a grand sport di! I like Miss Beall & B.B. even if I can't attain perfection!
1931 - Friday. S.H.S. beat Arnold Prep 12-0. Whoopie! I'm on Honor Roll. Jim & I only Seniors! Party at Sally's. Dan & Bill took me. I was as usual silly.

1932 - Sun. Up at 9:30. Read Ramuntcho. Studied. Walk with Mudge this aft. She certainly has a lot of character. To faculty (?) Mrs. Hobs for dinner. B. Cutler & I & Speech. Pretty. I like Mrs. Hobbs an awful lot!
1933 - Mon. To Barn & painted blue stools. B.B. & I actually was better against A.A. However, only made 2nd team as announced at b.b. supper. Afterwards home & studied.
1934 - Tues. Beginning to understand some Zo. B.B. dinner tonite. I had to order More fun. I also ordered for Agora tea. To see Mother afterwards & got knitting from E. Pease. Oh me!
1935 - Wed. Technical rehearsal tonite & most of the kids had the right props. They're all grand wonders, di. And then home at 10 & studied, always the same, almost. What a life, di!
1931 - Saturday. Town, coat, raincoat, hat & 2 pr. shoes. Yummy coat!! Worked in aft. Party tonite, Sally, Charlotte, Bill J. Dan & Jim F. Fun!
1932 - Mon. B.B. in aft but I didn't get to play. Timed. Freshmen won 34-14. Beat Sophomores. Studied tonite & bed early. Great to be living. Thought of Bill!
1933 - Tues. Good old Zo. Then Bible & French & I was awful. Bible quiz. To Hathaway in rain for props. Dot Fagg's for supper & we had keen time. Home & on bells & studied till late.
1934 - Wed. Out of lab a mite early. B.B. game with Sophs & we lost 16-14 - very disheartening! But better luck next time! Agora picture tonite & I was a sight. Barny crazy as heck. Home. Studied.

1935 - Thurs. Went around in aft collecting forgotten articles with Miggie, after Archery & German. What a day of German is Thursday. Studied a mite tonite. Still thrilled about Mon. nite! Gosh, Bill is the one - but am I? Who knows!
1931 - Sunday. I nearly fainted when coming home from church, I found Bill here. Walked to Crutchy's. Knee hurt! Stayed for supper. Alvin & Paul Barber brot me home.
1932 - Tues. Game with 2nd team Sophs. They beat us 22-5. I was rotten! Not much hope for me. I was elected captain of the team. (I wish Bill would write. Gee! I like him so much!)
1933 - Wed. Soph IIs beat Freshmen 20-18 in a game full of fouls & cold! Brr! Rehearsal for Props tonite & I barely got studying done. Oh me! To vil & got A.H. a present & sent it to her.
1934 - Thurs. More lab etc & more hurried studying. To Shakespeare this aft for baseball & lacrosse picture. Barny there & again silly. Oh me! Studied German till all hours. Then Education.

1935 - Fri. Class after Chem. work. Then over to Barn * then B.B. at 4:40. Barn for supper & Dress Rehearsal tonight. Went off O.K. except for picture in "Bird in Hand" which fell down during play! Home at 11 & bed late!
1931 - Monday. Walked to Glen Osborne with Sally. Ice cream cones. Mrs. Townsend & Bob here! Washed hair & studied & wrote letters & read.
1932 - Wed. Got Mrs. Hobbs a plant. Fun. Got a rose & loads of kids thought I was really in T.Z.E. What fun! Took shoes to be soled. Wrote 5 letters. Late to gym. Studied & bed early.
1933 - Thurs. Up at 5:30 to study! Awful Zo roll-call. Barn Dress Rehearsal tonite. Went at 5:30 for supper & stayed till late. Oh me! When is there time for everything.

1934 - Fri. Classes etc till 1:30. Fed Rosemary. To Vill 2 times for Barn! Over to Alum at 3:30 & was there till 11:00. Technical & dress rehearsal. Miss Gallagher swell. Home. Exhausted. But what fun!

1935 - Sat. Cut German & off to Mt. Holyoke with Miss Schraeder & Mary Cralius. Play Day. Wheaton also. Met swell girls! Played Speed ball for 1st time. Then tea at S.A.Hall. Home & Miss Schraeder raved about Munger girls & money etc. To Barn & Informals came off. Greg Van Nest did excellent job! All over & I got the swellest corsage. Gosh! I they're so nice!!
1931 - Tuesday. Dinner, studied & all nite at Sally's. Bill took her to movies. I had seen it. Bed early, but we talked late. Aunt Hat's birthday.
1932 - Thurs. Rain all day. 2 letters. Got shoes. A- in Zoo roll call. Ate dinner with Honey. Loads of fun. Got news. Studied tonite & bed early. Ruth Keown home overnite!
1933 - Fri. Caught up on some studying. Cut lit. Trying out for News. Called Stanley tonite & told him to go with Peanut to Informals. Studied & generally arrange everybody. G'nite.

1934 - Sat. Slept till 8:30. Vill. Haircut. Got junk. Home. Job. To Zo lab & fixed R.m. Studied. Barn at 3 & stayed till 11:30. Fun, tho. Ginny not there & so we had charge. - Seeley most. Loads of fun. Dead tired!

1935 - Sun. Up for corridor breakfast. Then 10:30 Barn people & Hickey Clark off to cabin - Outing Club. Merrill Mills & I cooked while other swam. The luckies. Home & attempted to study. But then Agora Vespers & food was o.k. this time, I guess.
1931 - Wednesday - Staff Meeting of Oracle after school. I'm a Senior Reporter. Fred. Smart is also on. Bowled tonite. Mad 95 again. Ma 55!!!
1932 - Friday. Another b.b. game. Have forgotten score, but I seem to have left out this page for some unknown reason (Dec. 1).

1933 - Sat. Lab awful. Hair-cut etc. this aft. Barn at 5:30 & worked on plays till 10:15. Rushed home & dressed. Dance. Stanley good. Roommate Dick Lee nice. Mr. Epstein awfully nice! Ginny a pal. Bed late Apple & Peanut, (?)

1934 - Sun. Up late. Corridor breakfast. Fun! Then studied a bit. After dinner Art Keown came & took Ruth & Fairbanks & I home. More fun. Read "Flush" tonite & Art read too. Swell food. So grand to be in a home again! Radio. Bed not late.

1935 - Mon. A.A. meeting tonite at office after B.B. dinner after a day of Chem. work. Heredity, Chem lab & a bit of attempted study. Home & did a bit of worrying about S.R.C. Will everything end o.k.? Oh well. Where do lessons come in? Wavie our captain. At last di - she beat me & I'm glad after S.P.C. & Blazer situation!! Team - Childs, Whitehead, Custiss, Butsch, Kilbon & me. Fun!
1931 - Thursday. Gave Jim Oracle stuff. Piles of lessons tonite. Couldn't go to Girl Reserves. Played basketball in gym. Dancing nest week! Heck!
1932 - Sat. Helped decorate for Halloween party. Went tonite. Had supper, cider, too & danced & had keen time. Bed late after loads of fun. Took a pumpkin.

1933 - Sun. Up late. Breakfast tea & cookies. Studied. Hat Qua for lunch. We tore off to Boston. Museums again. Drunk man in subway. Home to wait on supper. Studied all evening. Ate in Prill's room. Bed.
1934 - Mon. Cut Ed. & got here about 9. Mr. Keown drove us back. Such a swell time. Awful to get back. Keowns are swell. Lab this aft & then studied like heck after taking props back to vil.

1935 - Tues. Tore about hither & yon. Did some work in the Chem bldg. Archery at 1:40. Felt not one bit like working. A fine evening - Movies in evening with Mudge, Fairbanks & Peanut. Home. Bed late.
1931 - Friday. S.H.S. beat Avalon 12-0. Certainly was keen. Movies tonite, Bill, Dan, Sally & I. To Dan's afterward. Home 11. Bed about 12.
1932 - Sun. Up late & messed around. Church. Ride on bicycle with Franny to Wellesley Hills & saw football game. Home, ate & had supper. Young People's Meeting. Home. Studied. Bed early.
1933 - Mon. Scored b.b. game. Sophs beat Freshmen 1sts 30-16. Great game. Coffee with Mrs. Paschal after dinner with Dolly & guest. To see Mrs. Hobbs with Betty. Not there. Box package from home.

1934 - Tues. Finally finished French. Worked about. Bells & wrote Munny. Lab this aft & Rosemary lost plenty. To see Eunice & Hat about tomorrow. Agora to see Mother B. but not in. Did German with Dorris Babbidge. B.B. game - beat Seniors 19-15.

1935 - Wed. Oh di, I must confess I haven't kept you up to date! Miss Schraeder came for dinner tonite. She is nice. I like her heaps! Then to Agora for Bus. meeting & di, I'm so sad! I had too many points & so am no longer purveyor! Oh dear! But Prill is! So it's still sort of in the family!
1931 - Saturday. Halowe'en. Jim Crooks, Bricky, Dan, Jim F., Bill, Shirley & I to parade. Fell & sprained ankle on way to Sally's. (?) I can't help it. Darn it!! I do!!!
1932 - Mon. Freshman 2nd beat Juniors 24-12 in a keen game. On our toes today. Forgotten what else happened. Got sundae with Ruth & Dolly tonite at Liggetts.
1933 - Tues. Horrid classes. Barn for stuff I had gotten. Couldn't find vial. Hallowe'en party tonite. Good eats. Fun dancing. Very nice time & to end it all I came up & studied! Thrills.

1934 - Wed. Classes etc. A- on German Roll Call. To vil for Agora tea. Then Eunice Avery, Kitty Ruff & I made Hal at Alum. & strung him from Green Tower. Scary and spooky, but more fun! Party by Janet West tonite. More fun.

1935 - Hallowe'en! Appointment with Miss Beall in a.m. about Indoor basketball. It's going to start a week earlier. Then B.B. game this aft, 1st of season. We beat Freshmen 29-11 or something. A grand game, but Kilbon fell & hurt her back. Gosh! It was bad. Party at Munger. Then Janet & I to Zo bldg. & counted flies etc. Felt funny - so home & bed early.
1931 - Sunday. No church. Bad cold & sore ankle. Jim took me for long drive 2:30 - 5:00. (ILHVBOA). Down to Sally's Ring fight. (You might know!) Supper & home about 8. Bill here (goody, goody!)
1932 - Tues. Got back Physics paper with a D-. I hope I won't be on pro. I'm mad at Bill. No letter. Darn.
1933 - Wed. Extra game with Freshmen which we manage to win again. Home & studied. Dinner with Dolly & guest. Studied tonite & bed late.

1934 - Thurs. Rain & many people saw Hal hanging from Green. More fun. He came down at 9. Lib & did Zo. Miss Murphy so swell. Rosemary gained. B.B. after Physial(?) & we beat Freshmen. Queer foul shooting. Fun. We play Sat. now!
1935 - Fri. Chem. work. Heredity. Counted flies. Then Munger tea in aft. & lots of work. To vill also in aft & ordered for corridor breakfast. Studied. Wrote letters & can't remember the rest.
1931 - Monday. Cold still bad. Ankle better. Had hair cut. Came home. Read. Library tonite. Letters & bed early.
1932 - Wed. More rain! Nothing special happened. Home in aft & studied. Libe tonite.
1933 - Thurs. Studied Bible in libe. Home & had tea & studied all aft. Awful drawings for Zo. Studied Eng. Lit all evening. Washed hair & got to bed right late.
1934 - Fri. Worked about all day. To Love-Bucket Hobbs' for dinner. More darn fun - Ellie, Lucy, Ginny Tate, Beth, Ruth Harris, Carol etc. Crazy bunch! Home. Studied a mite & bed.

1935 - Sat. Up early. Lived thru classes. Mated flies. Then Marion Roe-Cloud, Betty McNally, Fairbanks, Peanut, Mudge & I to Boston Garden to Rodeo. Met . Colonel Jackson & cow-girls. More fun! Rodeo excellent! Nothing like it! Home. Long bells. Dead tired. Bed.
1931 - Tuesday. Sally home sick. In aft went to see her. Also to Jim's for cider. (I like that boy!) Candy. To library but with no avail.
1932 - Thurs. B.B. game of 2nds. Seniors beat us 10-8 on an awfully cold day & loads of fun. To libe tonite. Last day of captain. Boohoo. Signed for voluntary b.b.

1933 - Fri. B.B. game this aft in gym. We had a swell time & won. That makes clean sweep for Sophs. To Jan Murdock's for supper. Met "Barnie" Wright. Nice kid. Also Christie girl. Shafer's O.K. Saw Dottie. Home. Studied.

1934 - Sat. Field Day this aft. We beat Freshmen in dumb game 22-19. I made Varsity, but no W. Stewy got a Blazer. Faculty race crazy. Miss Leach swell. Steve, Miss Murphy & Leach & I walked home. Studied tonite & fed Rosemary. She's ill!

1935 - Sun. Up leisurely at 9. Corridor breakfast. Then read & walk with Fairbanks, Peanut & Dally. Then cleaned room all aft. & washed. Agora for Vespers with Fairbanks. Home. Studied.. To vill with Dally. Back. Feast. Bed late.
1931 - Wednesday. Fooled this aft. Sally & Frederick here for lunch. Bowled with Munny tonight got 107! She got 96! I also got 56! Wrote letters & bed late.
1932 - Fri. Basketball game in which I timed. Don't know what is wrong with Peggy Kilbon. We won 33-6. Pinx for supper. Fun. To libe & talked. Home & bed on time.

1933 - Sat. Chem lab fun. Present. Field day this aft. Couldn't sub. Di mi! Sophs won. b.b. Freshmen won Field Day. Waited supper. Peanut & I to movies "Broadway to Hollywood." O.K. Home. Cold! Bed late.
1934 - Sun. Slept late. Studied about. To Steve's at Fiske for dinner. Polly Starks, Miss Murphy & Leach & Steve's mother. Driving & more fun! Back to reality & studied tonite.

1935 - Mon. Zo & fed rats after Chapel. Studied Heredity. Then to Chem work - 2 hrs. Heredity. Fixed flies. Home. Lunch. Chem lab all aft. Then to Tower. Home. Fooled till dinner. A.A. Rep. Meeting about S.P.C. Studied. Bed late.
1931 - Thursday. Sally took Jim & me home. Cookies. Ice cream cones. G.R. tonite. Read & cleaned aquarium this aft.

1932 - Sat. Awful classes, 3. Field day in aft. Crazy football game. Movies tonite with Dobby & Ruth. "Night of June 13" & "Fast Companions." Good. Brisk walk. Almost late. Bed. Conference with Dean Knaper. Lovely. I like her!
1933 - Sun. Up for bekbets. Studied. To museum for Zo this aft. Home. Dinner at Latter Grill with Peanut. Home. Studied. Talked with Pril. Bed early(?)
1934 - Mon. First indoor gym. My what fun. Tore about. Dinner Bells. Then studied tonite in libe & over to Zo bldg to see Rosemary. She has awful diarrhea!

1935 - Tues. Another hard day. Hard time with Chem. Then 1:30 - 3:30 this aft spent selling chances on beans. Conf. with Miss Moody this aft & she was so nice! B.B. game with Juniors at 4:40 & we finally won 28-13 or something. I was LOUSY. Shoeny saved the game. She is grand! S.O.C. meeting at 8:30 tonite to make final arrangements. Oh di, I'm scared to
1931 - Friday. S.H.S. tied Arnold High 0-0. Wotta game! Down to Sally's etc. which is on wrong day. (Pardon me for living.) Dan's a nut! (but nice)
1932 - Sun. Up late. Studied. Lunch at Noannett with Franny. Studied. Washed hair. Vespers tonite. Home. Letter, diary & studied.
1933 - Mon. First gym. Great sport. I like Miss Clarke, "Hicky." First snow of year. Dirty old snow. I guess we're in for it! Oh me! Prepared to have Junior tonite. Bed at 9:30!

1934 - Tues. Handed in more Zo. Got some back. O.K. this time. Vill. Home. Barny for dinner. Fooled around after it. To Agora for Bus. meeting. Home & Prill & I studied together. Rosemary killed today. Gassed. Oh dear! I'm so sad. She had very bad scurvy.

1935 - Wed. Up early. Over to Metabolism & fixed rats. Studied & then lab all aft. To see Miss Beall about Indoor Basketball & she was swell! I like her so much, di! Then dinner. Dressed, Miss Busch gave Fairbanks & me tickets to Tibbett concert. He was grand! Home. Bed late!
1931 - Saturday. Sally & I to town. Didn't see Aunt Hat. Shopped. Home. Sally's for supper. Sewed. Jim came. Pajamas good way done.
1932 - Mon. Rain. Physics lab in aft & I worked hard. Joey's birthday! Sent him hanky. Home & wrote letters & studied before dinner. Bed early.
1933 - Tues. Junior arrived in the night, a healthy baby boy. Named him Vil Junior! Oh me! What fun. Honey here for dinner & we cut up. Wrote up "Progressive School" lecture for News. Bed early.
1934 - Wed. Didn't get very far with unknown(?) Crazy time in gym. Miss Salditt came for dinner. She is swell. I made usual no. of errors. French lecture. Libe. Home. Typed part. Bed.

1935 - Thurs. Vill & got boxes & left them at Miss Beall's. Payed bills & got check cashed. Classes & I messed up Chem. roll call again. I'm getting worried! Bells. Archery at 1:40. Then German. Then over & did flies. To Tonys(?) for tea. Kibby & Bryon also, our corridor. Blazer Com. meeting tonite. Awful. I didn't know how to (?) & I was in a dither. Anyway. But Miss Elliot brot Butsch & me home & then we found out. She, V. Saffort & me!! Oh gosh di. Never have I been so happy!!
1931 - Sunday. Bill, Joe & Wally here - 11:00 - 1:30. Awful break! (Bas---d). I certainly like Bill a lot. He is a peach. Read in aft. Sally's for supper - the gang.

1932 - Tues. First gym. What fun. Am next to tallest. Bee Short in class, with me. Got Zoology mark, C- Wotta life. I thought I at least got B- darn it! Sarah M to come for supper, but didn't arrive. Awful election, Roosevelt won! Darn! Darn! I think he's an awful mess! Oh dear! I wonder what will happen?

1933 - Wed. (I guess I think Roosevelt’s O.K. by now!) Junior in fine health. Gang of Seniors in tonite to see him & did they make noise? Oh me! Bed late & I'm dead tired. Saw Mlle Malbot again. She's so nice.
1934 - Thurs. Craziest Zo lecture I ever did hear! Laugh. We nearly died. Play rehearsal & so dumb. Home. Dinner. Studied for German quiz. May go to dance Sat.

1935 - Fri. Wotta day. Chem work. Then Heredity & flies. 1:40 Archery. Hair done at 2:45. Then collected Blazers. Then dressed & Zo Majors tea at Pens & it was such fun! Home. Dinner. Over to Alumnae Hall & helped decorate & watched Vaudeville. Honestly, di - everybody is so swell & Peanut has done such a grand job, especially.
1931 - Monday. Mother won match in tournament. I went to movies. Dumb murder thing. Home & read & bed late or early?
1932 - Wed. Betty fell & cut leg. Tough. Dumb old Speech class. No movies in aft. Entertained Mrs. Hobbs at Wellesley Inn for dinner. Faith, Kay, Libby, Betty Cutler & I. Fun. Libe & home & bed.

1933 - Thurs. Zo quiz at museum. I was awfully dumb, but it was fun! Bible all aft. or so it seemed. Freshman court for hazing fun! Betty & I to libe & to see a couple of kids. Washed hair & bed early.
1934 - Fri. Studied Zo in libe this aft. & Miss Murphy came in. Laughed over the lecture. Rehearsal for play tonite & I still didn't know my lines so well. Dead tired after it was all over!

1935 - I never thot this day would come! Classes. Field Day & I met Mr. & Mrs. Wysor(?) Swell. Archery - 199 - Bad. Seniors beat Sophs in B.B. 28-12 or something. We missed Wowie & Kilbon. Di I got A BLAZER! Oh gosh, I'm so happy!! But S.P.C at last tonite. Flew around & was scared to death. But loads of people came & it was a success!! I feel as if half my work is over now!!
1931 - Tuesday. Came home in aft. Studied & studied till 10:00 tonight. Worked 3 hours on Biology. Letters. Oracle meeting. Jim nice.
1932 - Thurs. Rain. Stayed home & slept this a.m. Zoology this aft. Bad news to Betty about sister. Tough! Studied, wrote letters & I fixed you tonite. Dreamt of Sally & Bill. Grr! Darn!
1933 - Fri. Up early. To vil with Dobby this aft & awful story about Nancy Clough. Got food for tonite. Fooled. Prill went home. Party at nine. More fun. Good eats. Left early & bed early!
1934 - Sat. Cleaned refrig. in a.m. & was I scared? Cut in only Sat. class. To vill & then House dance tonite & loads of fun. Oh me!

1935 - Sun. A day of rest & worry about what we made on the S.P.C. Wrote up report. Cleaned room. Studied quite a bit. Agora Vespers & then home & to bed at last. Fairbanks sent me the nicest corsage last night which I wore all day.
1931 - Wednesday. Came home. Biology. Bath. Sally's supper & all nite. Studied & read. Chapel & sat in balcony for 1st time. "Dignified Seniors."
1932 - Fri. More rain. Second gym day. Messed around. Laughed & laughed in Speech! Such a silly class! Got laundry & also brownies from A.H. Studied & bed early.
1933 - Sat. After lab went in to Boston to Art Museum. After that, met Betty & Carol Morse, her little sister. "Met" & saw Fred Waring. Sawall(?) Army! Ate at "Old France." Home & bed early! - 11:30!
1934 - Sun. Up late & corridor breakfast. Studied a lot. Also studied this aft & tonite. I hope I'm not turning into a grind. Bed late after fun at Vespers with Prill & Barny.

1935 - Mon. Classes again. Chem work. Then Heredity. Then Chem lab all aft & gym. Back to gym for b.b. & I played twice. First night of season & I was a bit scared. But people came & I learned a few names & all is going to be fun.
1931 - Thursday. Lunch at Sally's. Washed stockings this aft. Talked to Bill (Thrills) Bowled with Munny (100) Sally & coffee ice cream. Studied & letters.
1932 - Sat. More rain in a.m., but it cleared up. Nice in aft. Fooled around. Bed early tonite after watching Ginny get dressed for dance. Ate brownies & drank cider.
1933 - Sun. Up for bekbets. Studied & studied & knitted & studied & wrote a letter & ate & studied & waited on supper & studied & walked & studied & to bed. Exciting? Oh yeah?
1934 - Mon. Gym fun & then B.B. tonite. Just missed Miss Murphy. Steve there & she certainly is swell! Miss Beall also keen, but playing was lousy tonite. C in German quiz.
1935 - Tues. Rushed around to finish work. It's going to be hard now with B.B. Mon & Wed nights. Lived thru classes. Studied a bit. Then bed.
1931 - Fri. Cory beat us 18 -0, a rotten game. Knocked out Jimmy Boyd & Joe Cook. Nasty's. We had a band. Movies tonite with Bill & Dan.

1932 - Sun. Up late. Studied in a.m. & walk in aft will Ruth, Betty & Dean Knapp's dog. Studied. "Young Peoples" tonite. Mr. Parry grand. Ginny Trask brot mattress in & stayed all nite with us. More fun!
1933 - Mon. Liked gym better today. Hickey Clark is swell. To vil & ordered ski pants, bright blue. Did Bible all over the place & perhaps wrote a letter. Letter from Jim about game! Goody!
1934 - Tues. Suit (?) came from John. Also good news about his promotion. (Curse the day, tho & I felt badly) Agora birthday party tonite & I had to help get it even feeling miserable. Oh me!
1935 - Wed. Second basketball night but first of Wednesdays. Not quite as good a crowd tonight, but I got to play late. Miss Kilbon. She came up for a while. Stiff from gym & b.b.
1931 - Saturday. Army - Pitt game. Foggy & rain, but a keen game. Could Reider play? I ask you. Pitt had a keen demonstration.

1932 - Mon. Physics lab. Wotta life. Home. Knitted for doll. Walk tonite with Dally. Bridge in living room. Studied. Copied theme (A.H. etc.) Ate brownies. Bed 11. Ordered ticket home. Whoopie! 3 more days! Fun taking Ginny's mattress back.

1933 - Tues. Actually remembered bells for once. More fun cleaning Necturus in Zo. Interesting course! Bible & Mr. Hasic announced roll call & quiz 2 wks from today. Misery! Messed around. Studied Chemistry. Cut in French.
1934 - Wed. Out of lab early, but had plenty to do. Studied. Cut gym. Dress rehearsal tonite. Went off O.K. Fun, but I'm dead tired.

1935 - Thurs. Barely got work done. Nasty Roll Call in Chem & as usual I messed it up. German this aft. Then to vil & got stuff. Agora to tea & Fairbanks & Janet & Peanut also. We had a swell time. Studied tonite & to bed.
1931 - Sunday. Welfare Sunday. Bill here after church with Sally. I likes him. Bill & Dan & Sally in aft. Read & read & finished book tonite.

1932 - Tues. Talk with Miss Elliot this a.m. Knows me like a book already. Brot me down 10 or 12 notches. Party for supper. Finch, Emery, Schoenfuss, Lowenberg, Lewis, Luther, Short & I. Fun. Study. Letter.
1933 - Wed. First in a line of quizes. Chemistry & it was bad! More fun in gym this aft. Bible all aft & Zo all night - quite concentrated, but I know nothing. Lit paper also today.
1934 - Thurs. Need I say again that Miss Murphy is swell. Well she is in Physiology! Picture taken for basketball. Oh me! Studied all evening, German & Chemistry. Wotta life!
1935 - Fri. After great mistake, it was this Fri. that I went to Kenny Falkenauss for dinner. Then went to Zo libe & read for Heredity. Then home & studied after stuff - g'nite.
