1931 - Monday. Wrote letters tonight. Studied & thought about (?) Welfared with Munny before supper.
1932 - Wed. Mudge nearly scared me to death with saying that I was on pro (?), but luckily she was mistaken. I was not on high credit list. Will know the worst tomorrow.
1933 - Thurs. Awful Zo quiz. Bible roll call not so bad. Got Pop's picture. Keen. Tea. Studied. Ate dinner with Tillie & Schoenfuss. Studied most all evening for Psych quiz. Washed hair. Bed late.
1934 - Fri. Awful Chem quiz! These affairs. To vil . Then slept. Play tonite. I was "Tall Tourist" in "Love of One's Neighbor." Loads of fun. Messed around afterwards. Bed early!

1935 - Sat. Classes. Studied Zo. Then Mrs. Hobbs arrived at Zo bldg. I saw her again. She is simply grand! To Boston & got gloves & socks & got measured for a Blazer. Oh gosh! Agora Program Meeting tonite. Home & talked etc. Bed late.
1931 - Tuesday. Not so many lessons; so went to movies with Munny. John Gilbert in "A Phantom of Paris." Awfully good.
1932 - Thurs. Conference with Dean Knapper & found I had one D in Physics, but I'm not on pro! Whoopie! I nearly burst a party button because I got an A in something!!!
1933 - Fri. Psych quiz, last of them for a while. Bible & awful classes. Went to clean up Barn prop room. Wrote letters etc.

1934 - Sat. Fairbanks & I to Boston at last. Sauterne for lunch & a Clover Club later. Saw Fredric March & Anna Sten in "We Live Again." Grand! Home. Agora Program Meeting. Letter to Munny & thot of this summer!
1935 - Sun. Up late. Corridor breakfast. Cleaned room. Studied. Dinner. Then studied & wrote letters & fixed b.b. list al aft. Agora Vespers. More study. Still writing up S.P.C reports. Bed late.
1931 - Wednesday. Got plays today. Washed hair. Studied. Got Dark Cow with Sally. Nothing important.
1932 - Friday. Conference with Mrs. Hobbs this morning. She certainly is a peach. She cheered up poor discouraged me. I like her more & more.
1933 - Sat. Up to Boston & shopped in aft. House dance tonite but Dobby, ?, & I went to movies. "Masquerader" - Good. Home & messed around & bed at 1:30! Was I mad!?
1934 - Sun. Up for breakfast. Studied all a.m. & most of this aft. Agora for Vespers. Miss ? of art dep't swell. Home. Studied & bed not so early.

1935 - Mon. Chapel. Then studied. Heredity. Same old chem lab all aft. Gym & it's swell! Stevie there. Then b.b. tonite & it's the nuts(?) Miss Beall is absolutely the most wonderful woman. I admire her tremendously.
1931 - Thursday. Came home & studied part. I actually learned it. Play practice also. (Fun in Latin Club. Puzzles etc.
1932 - Sat. Carnival tonite. Ginny & I barked at Puppet Show. Betty & Mudge did silhouettes - keen ones. Danced. Saw vaudeville. Messed around & spent about a dollar. Bed late.
1933 - Sun. Studied some. Dinner at Miss Elliott's - Hygiene students. Almost swerved again. Studied & what not. I lead a life.
1934 - Mon. B.B. tonite & was more on the stride. Played with Butsch a little. So much fun. Studied for French quiz. Tired!

1935 - Tues. Chem work this aft. Then meeting with Miss Elliott. She was swell. We talked about other things besides S. Pool. Then meeting of Properties Committee & I got all hard props assigned. Yes, Fall Formals will soon be upon us!
1931 - Friday. Sewickley beat Ben Avon 13-12! Wotta game! We only saw the last half. Play practice tonight till about 8:30. Bed late.
1932 - Sun. We rose late. To Young People's tonite & studied most all the day. To libe in aft with Mudge & Betty. I was horribly silly, but survived. Bed early.
1933 - Mon. To see Miss Christian about Friday & Saturday nites & about going home. I can do it! Like her heaps. Gym. fun. B.B. tonite & I liked playing with Polly Starks. Libe & home & studied.
1934 - Tues. Dot Fagg for dinner. French quiz. She's awful nice. Studied. Down to vil to order food for Agora tea. Messed about & studied. Zo again swell.

1935 - Wed. Things go on. One week & we'll have a little rest. Worked over on rats all afternoon & we're certainly getting interesting results. Then gym & b.b. tonite & it's so grand di - I hate to think of when I won't be playing it!
1931 - Saturday. Mother-Daughter Tea. I ruined my ankle again. Movies tonite with Bill & Dan. Down to Sally's afterwards. Fun, except for cheating.
1932 - Mon. Physics lab in aft. Down to the vil & got yarn & shoe laces. Knit an my doll. Am knitting it a yellow suit. More darn fun!
1933 - Tues. Zo swell. Awful Bible. Meeting of Prop Committee tonite. I have quite the list. Oh me! The time to find & will I find it? What with going home & all. Oh well. It'll all be the same!

1934 - Wed. A- on Chem quiz. I'm so thrilled! Also A-- on German quiz. And also hoping to go to Army-Navy game. Oh me! I'm so high today. Miss Murphy & Mill Taliaferro for dinner & we all had a swell time!

1935 - Thurs. Again day of awful classes. I gave report in German & after that, everything O.K. Then, Marion Fairbanks arrived tonite. She & Betty & I to McKinnys for eats. Then home & studied & studied.
1931 - Sunday. Church with Sally. Bill, Jim Shorts & Wally here. Sally ( 4 of us) for lunch. Aunt Hat this aft & studied tonite. Bill to take me Sat.
1932 - Tues. Got numerals in B.B. Was I ever thrilled? I'll say I was! Gym today & passed first test. (Phooey)
1933 - Wed. Mlle. Malbot came for dinner & we had quite a French table. Stayed thru lecture. To vil with Pril in aft & got junk. Oh me! I like Mlle Malbot heaps. Called Stanley(?) No avail.

1934 - Thurs. Again Physiology. Got French quiz back with a C-. Damn! And the course isn't hard. Studied as usual most of the evening for German. Agora tea with Dabson & a little (?) with Miss Coolidge. Miss H Winter(?) nice.

1935 - Fri. Chem work & then Heredity. Off to vil & bot stuff for dinner. Finally, all aft. peeled potatoes. Then Miss Elliott, Beall, Marion & Betty, Hat, Demps, Stevie, Butsch & I dinner. (Potatoes french fried!) We all talked etc. till about 9. More darn fun, di! Then studied.
1931 - Mon. Latin test. Sally & I got ice cream cones. Candy & play at her house. Play tonight. Stroupy liked it. Home after watching Munny bowl.
1932 - Wed. Messed around till 4:40 when off we went to Keowns. Betty, Dolly Edmund, Ruth & I. More darn fun. Awfully nice place. Sat next to Art. Keen boy. Fooled & bed late.
1933 - Thurs. Got Zo quiz back. Lousy C. Oh me! Studied Bible in aft. & studied all evening. Betty's man can come to game & Ginny's Dick. There'll be 10 of us! What fun!

1934 - Fri. Did Zo all aft in libe. Miss Murphy crazy as heck. To Barny's for dinner & had fun! She's O.K.! Home & Steve told me things about Miss Murphy. Oh dear! Wotta life. Zo again tonite in libe, also French.

1935 - Sat. Lived thru classes after nearly cutting them both. C in Chem quiz & I nearly died. What a course! Then Elma & I to vill to try to get Victorian furniture. Then home & slept. Dance - Munger - tonite with Art. He gave me swell corsage. Bill Peck & Dorsey Richardson of Yale, both awfully nice.
1931 - Tuesday. Play practice at 3:45. Washed hair. Play practice 6:45. Home & studied for 2 tests. Health test today.
1932 - Thurs. Thanksgiving! Up at 10:45! Walked. Listened to game. Keen dinner & ate too much. Art real nice in aft. Made fudge. Dolly & I fought. Back to Eliot - darn. Bed late!
1933 - Fri. Chem quiz back A-! Awful Bible 4 days B.Q. To vil. Jim F. & Bill (?) arrived in motorcycle tonite. To vil & ate. Home & talked. Great sport! I'm tired! G'nite.
1934 - Sat. Bells etc. Did ice-box & got hair cut. Studied in libe after queer time with German. Studied also tonite & then fooled. Wotta life!

1935 - Sun. Up at 8:15. Helped get corridor breakfast. Then Betty, Marion Fairbanks & I to Boston - Trinity Church & Dr. Kinsolving very interesting. Dinner at Seville & out on 2 train. Fixed b.b. & studied Heredity & for (?) quiz till about 11:30. More crazy fun at dinner since missed Agora.
1931 - Wednesday. In a.m. Biology & Trig. tests. Play "The Florist Shop" in aft. I was Miss Wells. I'm glad it's over. Movies with S. tonite "The Spirit of Notre Dame" - good.
1932 - Fri. Back again to lessons. What a life. Gym in aft & crazy dumb posture exercises. Studied tonite & bed on time.
1933 - Sat. Up for lab. Jean arrived at 11:50 (Oh me!) Peanut, Jean, Betty, Prill & I & 5 boys. Game & Yale lost 20-6. Tough. Dinner at Seville. Movies "Little Women." Station. Home. Bed late!
1934 - Sun. Up awful late. Corridor breakfast. Then we all cleaned our rooms! Oh me. Steve & Polly & Niki for dinner. Studied all aft. Then helped get Vespers. Home, studied more & bed late.

1935 - Mon. Another week, but thank heaven this one will be broken! Over to Zo libe & finished finding stuff about (?) quiz. Heredity. Then Chem lab all aft. then gym. B.B. tonight. Then copied quiz & bed at 12. Now I'll have to get up early, too. Oh me. Wotta life.
1931 - Thursday. Keen Thanksgiving dinner! Ate & read & slept. Quite a lazy day. Nothing much happened! Ate some turkey at Sally's!
1932 - Sat. Awful classes. To Boston in aft with Betty & Ruth. Got socks & galoshes. Messed around. Ginny & I dressed tonite & went around lake. Fearfully cold. Lost. Fun. Tired. S. Supplee's.

1933 - Sun. Up late & got our bekbets. Eng. muffins, coffee, oranges. Good! El. Lentz for dinner. Tower to hear music. Back. Talked. Took Jean to train. Oh dear. Supper waited & end of weekend. Studied tonite. Jim & Bill McIntyre came at 1 & left again.
1934 - Mon. Quiz in German. Lab this aft & I got so d' tired. Then to Zo bldg with Dabson. Gym & 'twas fun. B.B. tonite with Butsch & we weren't on our stride, but fun!

1935 - Tues. Nice day because I got a swell letter. All is still rosy with Bill, di! I'm s'happy. Handed in quiz. Dead tired. Then to other classes & worked in Chem bldg this aft. Slept. Then studied. Then b.b. all night & studied for Heredity quiz till 12. G'nite!
1931 - Friday. Gang went to Sally's, also Wally & Joe. Had fun although Dan was nasty to W & J. Bed late. First snow of season!
1932 - Sun. Studied all morning & all aft. Finished Ramuntcho. Walked to station tonite with Mudge & Betty. Wrote letters & bed early.
1933 - Mon. awful getting back to classes. Gym this aft. Fun. Studied all aft & did Bible all tonite. Oh what is the use when I'll probably flunk it. I hate it!
1934 - Tues. Behaved well in Zo. today, but Miss Murphy still chided me. Conf with Miss Melcher. She's nice. Lecture by Miss DeBanks on play & I almost slept. Slaved on German tonite & bed.

1935 - Wed. Up early. Lab & studied for quiz. Had it, then Peanut & M. Roe-Cloud & I to Peanut's with Helen Porr's car. More fun. Got there 3:30. Talked etc. Then after dinner Everett, Dick Downs(?) & Bernie Hartwell came. Went out in roadster. Fun. Then Dick & I drove(?) to "Ship's Haven." 3 old fashioneds & did I feel them! Grand discussion, tho & more darn fun. Had a (?) time. Then got other kids, (?) & home around 2.
1931 - Saturday. did nothing till tonite. Bill R. took me to Sally's party! Was I thrilled?! He' so cute & dances divinely! I had a keen time, but wasn't hungry.
1932 - Mon. Mass meeting at Alumnae tonite. Home with Ginny & kids. Wrote letter to John & Betty & Ginny wrote, too. Saw Miriam Laurie & she is better.
1933 - Tues. Day of Q - Bible quiz & was I scared? Be happy, really, if I got a D & I don't fool! Wotta man! Relieved after it & French. Peanut & I to vil. Sundaes. Studied tonite & bed late.

1934 - Wed. Package, food & a letter from Munny! Classes finally over & at last off to Prill's!!!!!! Miss Griggs swell!!! Arrived. Huge dinner. Melvin there. Movies. Fun. Home. Ate. Bed late. Such fun!

1935 - Thurs. Up at 10:30. A little headache! Then grand breakfast. Bobby, Rog, Ginny, Marion & I also Mr. & Mrs. Trask fooled around. Grand dinner! Games & card tricks till time to go back to W. Helen Porr brot us back. Swell cocktails & wine & the Trasks were so nice!
1931 - Sunday. Bill, Wally & Joe here. Thrills for Bill! I went to church alone. Saw Uncle Frank & Aunt Betty. Wally said I danced well! Whee! I hope Bill did!
1932 - Tues. Letter to Sally. Cliff can't come. Sewed on doll tonite & almost finished it. Down to Gramkows & ate with Betty & Mudge. Bed very late (12)

1933 - Wed. Would classes never end? Finally over. 3:44 to Boston. Met Mr. Trask. Drove to Peabody. Met Frances? & she's O.K. Talks a lot. Good dinner. Sat & talked. Played "hearts". Guy & Fred Waring. Bed 11.
1934 - Thurs. Up late. Huge breakfast. Tony & I stayed home. Knitted etc. Walked. Huge dinner at about 2:30. Talked, etc. Decided to stay all nite. Prill & I to bed at 8:30. Grand sleep!

1935 - Fri. Peggy called up in a.m. & then I called her at noon. Worked this aft. Then in to Boston after dinner. Met her at Hotel & it was so nice di, Peggy is the nicest, most wonderful person! Met Vivian Persalta a girl from the Middlebury summer school. We saw "A Midsummer's Night Dream" at the Majestic.
1931 - Monday. Mother & I saw "Five Star Final" tonite, a dumb movie. I studied in aft.
1932 - Wed. Studied all aft. Basketball tonite & I was fearfully dumb. To libe & worked on source theme. Finished doll & bed late.

1933 - Thurs. Up a 9. Football game Peabody - St. James. Lost 7-2. Boohoo! Wonderful turkey dinner! Knitted. Talked. Like Frances Hodnette lots. Bobby nice. Peachy time. Back to Wel at 9:30. Food & bed late. Tired.
1934 - Fri. Up at 6! Back to Wellesley. Wotta life! Rain & bleak. Quiz announced in Chem. Dinner with Frances Martin & Helen Wiley at Seiber. To rehearsal for Agora Semi-Open & bed.

1935 - Sat. Lived thru classes. Studied like Hell this aft. Then Fairbanks, Marion & I to Boston & met Peggy & 3 others. Dinner at Durgin Parks. Not so hot now. Movies at Met "Frisco Kid." Right good. James Cagney. Back to Bradford for a while. Then to station & five of us back to Munger! So swell to see Peggy.
1931 - Tuesday. Mother & I bowled this aft. Also A.S. Lowrie, her partner. I got 112, my highest score yet. Studied late tonight.
1932 - Thurs. Slept from 3 - 4. up & waited on dinner. Fitty here. Studied & bed early tonite. Worked on source theme. Missed Zoology. Dear me! G'nite!

1933 - Fri. Barely got thru classes. C+ B- on Bible quiz. Nearly fainted. 3:44 to Boston. Miss Bushee. 4:30 Penniless!(?) Met Eliz. Henry on train at dinner & (?) '27. Messed around. Can't wait to get home!
1934 - Sat. Class & to Agora. Home. Studied this aft. Agora at 4:30 & practiced for tonite. Semi-open tonite & what fun! I was lousy in one. Farmer thing fun. Bed late.

1935 - Sun. Up for corridor breakfast. Peggy & Vivian also. Peggy & I out to see people. Then to Chapel Dinner here at Munger. Then we all went to Davis & to (?) to see Martha Curtin. Franny also here for dinner. Peggy & Vivian left at 3:30. Oh gosh. It was so swell to see her again.
1931 - Wednesday. Studied in aft & went to see "The Last Flight" tonight. The Conways were next to me. Good movie.

1932 - Fri. Just 12 more days & I'll be tooting home! Boy, can I ever hardly wait! Anne Brown pres of our class. Lives at Eliot & on our floor Keen kid. Marian Chapman & Cora Neilson also. Awful outline & bed late.

1933 - Sat. Train late. Awful fog. To Mr. Wrights. Case postponed till Thurs. et Pril's sister. Nice! Dress. Home. Bill & Pop here. Bill not changed Whoopie! Joey & Wally. M. Wells in bookstore. Home. She & I to "Paddy" tonite. Bed late. Oh me! Football game in aft. We lost.
1934 - Sun. Up & corridor breakfast. Cleaned room. Studied all a.m. Libe in aft & then home & studied. Studied also tonite. Wotta life. A hell of a week ahead. Xmas when?

1935 - Mon. Chem work. Then cut Heredity & to vill for hair set. Back & fixed rats. B+ on Her. quiz. Better. Then Chem lab all aft, gym & we had rings! Grand. B.B. tonite & people didn't come. Why do they not sign? I got to play a bit, but poor Miss Beall. Oh dear! I'm sleepy, di.
1931 - Thursday. Latin Club. Fooled & studied & saw Aunt Hat at E's in aft. Movies with Sally "The Brat" tonight. Play last year at S.H.S. Good.
1932 - Sat. Awful classes. Eng. conference in aft. Came home & started source theme. All kids went to play & dance. Fixed beds & Betty & I to bed about 9:30. Keeno! G'nite!

1933 - Sun. Up & studied. Read papers. Bill, M.W., Wally, Joey here. Talk. M.W. for dinner. M.W. & I to Babs' this aft. M. Thorne & Patt there. Munny & I supper. Bill came at supper & stayed till 10:30. Grand old talk. Philosophy, etc. Pot to Boston in aft.
1934 - Mon. Studied. Classes. Lab all aft. Gym. Crazy article in Herald. "More Honors." B.B. tonite for 1 hr. To Zo libe & studied. Home. Studied French & bed.

1935 - Tues. Picture this aft., a retake. What a mess. Then tore over to Barn. Lawsons late but we go much furniture. Not many hard-props(?) there, but hope. More pictures for Legenda tonite. Then home & studied.
1931 - Friday. Home & washed hair. Movies at Ambridge Penn with gang. "The Road to Reno." Here afterwards & bed about 12.
1932 - Sun. Up for breakfast, 1st time. Did source theme all morning & most all aft. Wrote letters after finishing theme. Thinking of Bill. Washed hair, shower, bed & read.

1933 - Mon. Up at 8. Washed stockings. Went to village. Bill here for a while. So nice. Kermit, etc. Babs & I to town & Bill at Terry's - oh, dear! To town again tonite & M.W & I met Sally. Dinner. "Dancing Lady," Clark Gable divine! Studied in a.m.
1934 - Tues. French paper back. B- Oh me! Conference with Miss Wood. Physiology & disgusted with myself. Vill for Agora food. Education lecture. Home. Barn tonite.

1935 - Wed. Zo lab in Met. all a.m. & was I very dumb! Then Heredity. Over to Barn after lunch, got much fixed up. Dress rehearsal all aft, but couldn't get furniture, some of it till 4:30. Man late. Then Munger for dinner. B.B. all evening & it was awfully cold & so no one came. Gosh we were mad. But Kilbon & I got to play together.
1931 - Saturday. Mrs. Atchley's for History. Studied & read. Ride with Sally. Shirleys with Jim. Ride & home at 12:30. Pretty good time.
1932 - Mon. Went to Speech recital tonite. Hugh Miller Impersonations of Dickens. Splendid! Awful physics lab & machines which were horrible. Bed early.

1933 - Tues. Up late. Last chance! Bill here a noon. Mrs Lyon also came. He gave me (?) to take back. I love it (& him). Then Katy & I teased & he left. Terrys! Town for A in W tickets. Munny & I went tonite. Good! No trial.(?) Back tomorrow!
1934 - Wed. Up at 5:45. Studied Chem for quiz. Cut in Education. German. Lab all aft & then right to Barn. Stayed till 8:30. Then bed at once & did I sleep!

1935 - Thurs. Up quite early & studied frantically for Chem. Roll Call. Probably messed it. Cut German & tore to vill for stuff for Barn. Dyed curtains & ruined my hands. Then worked over there the rest of the aft. After German 206. C on theme - Damn. Dress rehearsal of Dolls House, not so hot but they're not so bad!! Kraystad (?) especially good!
1931 - Sunday. Bill here. Went to church alone. Bill stayed till 12:45. Oh dear, oh dear! How I love Sundays! I can't help it. I likes him & that's that.
1932 - Tues. Went out to dinner tonite with Kay Lewis. Nice girl! Fun. Two quizzes today & am now a bit relieved. Slept a little in a.m. Gym & studied & wrote letters tonite.
1933 - Wed. Bill didn't come. Messed around & packed. Munny & I drove to town. Got 3:15 back to Boston. Queer boy from Duquesne on train. No fleas! Bed early & am a mite tired. Home in a week again!
1934 - Thurs. School visit swell with B. Anderson. Up at 5:30 & after visit studied for Physiology. Quiz this aft & I hope I hit it! Barn tonite & didn't stay so very late.

1935 - Fri. Slept till 8:00. To Zo bldg & fixed rats. Then studied Zo rest of a.m. Heredity. Tore around for Barn etc. Then Medical Aptitude test 3 - 4:30. Barn again & Ibsen's "The Doll House" simply grand! Everything was there tonight, all Victorian furniture & just what they wanted. Bed late - tired! A- & A on 2 Metabolism quizzes & I'm so thrilled & happy! Ginny Kilburn here for play & all night.
1931 - Monday. Hair cut. Down to Sally's. Bick sang, also, for dinner. Bill & Dan down. Played Michigan. Fun & home about ten.
1932 - Wed. Finished source theme & wrote letters in aft. Betty & I saw fire. Up to Miss Hobbs. Not home. Ate dinner & waited on famous people. Bed early.
1933 - Thurs. Arrived Wellesley 9:01. Wen to Zo., but missed quiz. Bible etc. Unpacked. Studied like the dickens for quizes tomorrow. Washed hair & bed awful late. Oh me. Tired!
1934 - Fri. Last quiz of week - German. To vil after hair done. Then studied & Barn tonite - 6:15 - 10:30. Fun. Went off very well tonite. Hope it will tomorrow. R.U.R.

1935 - Sat. Up & finally finished Chem. It is terrific. Didn't know German. Gave old rat marmala(?). Home. Lunch. Chem job. Zo bldg & studied. Then home & over to Barn. Play again & audience was terrific. Players nervous but good & C.B. forgot knitting. Bed late.
1931 - Tuesday. Alumni Game tonight. Sally& I watched. We won. Even the second team played. Oracle meeting. Miss Kerr said things to me!
1932 - Thurs. Fitty here. Went to hear W.B. Yeats. Very good. Came home. Read sonnets & poetry & Ginny & Betty listened. Class meeting in aft for elections & I hope Ginny gets it.
1933 - Fri. Only 3 quizes today & most likely flunked all! Psych, Chem. & Zo. Got Dobby's Bible notes. Waited dinner. Peggy Kohn here. Messed & studied. Bed early I hope!

1934 - Sat. Class, etc. Slept some this aft. Finally ready at 5:30. Art a bit late. Supper grand. Play swell & Art awfully nice. Back to A.K. X.(?) & danced. Grand dancer - every one. Stella Brewster swell. Art keen. Corridor party a success.

1935 - Sun. Up at 9. Corridor breakfast. Then Lawson came & we took back furniture. Knitted. Dinner. Sang etc. Cleaned john & room. Washed stockings. Wrote letters. Agora vespers. Home. B.B. affairs. Props & wrote notices etc & bed late.
1931 - Wednesday. Wrote up Biology hickey for Oracle. Fight with Dan. (Only one more!) Sally around in aft.
1932 - Friday. Awful gym & I got all stiff. Apples from Dammudy. Good. Kids came in & ate. Professor Gamble & talk on Mental Hygiene. Letters tonite & washed hair & bed early.
1933 - Saturday. Lab in Chem all a.m. & to Zo lab all aft. Fun - oh yeah! Studied French tonite till 10 with Bets. We talked till 11 & bed. Study! I'm sick of it.

1934 - Sun. Up early. Over to A.K.X. to clean up. Fairbanks & I breakfast at Agora. Home. Cleaned room. Miss Murphy. Martin Menton & Marnie dinner. Studied etc. Steve, Polly, Miss Murphy & (?) supper at Agora. Queer about (?). Kilbon & I to nativity Play. Dumb.

1935 - Mon. Fixed up Chemistry work. Then over to Zo bldg & did work for Heredity. Heredity. Lunch. Then Chem lab & gym all aft. Home B.B. tonite & more people. Miss Beall bawled them out. Played with Peg Kilbon & then home to bed - (?).
1931 - Thursday. Chapel today we got out of gym. Debate try-outs. Bill, Eddie Ruff, Shirley & Joe Haley are debators. Bernia Brawley, Charles Campbell, A. McCreer and S. Faden are alternates.
1932 - Sat. Awful classes. Slept till 9. Snow in aft. Grand! Served. Movies tonite with Ginny & Phil McKay. Good. "American Madness" & "Madison Square Garden." Ginny & Mudge came to sleep with us!
1933 - Sunday. Studied all a.m. Dinner - Xmas dinner! Studied all aft after singing & Dobby's. Vespers tonite & I went to bed when I got home. Work for last week all right!
1934 - Mon. More classes. Last full week. Chem lab & Miss Woodland inks me. B.B. tonite & we lost. Played with Miss Murphy for about 5 min. Tired.

1935 - Tues. Studied Chem & went over for Practice Period & she didn't come. What a woman! To Zo, German & Chem & I'm feeling sick about the quiz. Chem work this aft after vill with Prill & got Pop's & John's presents. To Prill Wheeler to dinner & had loads of fun with grad students. Home & wrote German theme.
1931 - Friday. Sally & I went to the movies. (I almost got mixed up). Did a little studying, but not much.
1932 - Sun. Up late. Mrs. Wheeler caught us in room! Dear me! Marvelous snow! Keeno! pictures in aft & studied etc. Grand snow! 4 more days! Oh! I can hardly wait! Vespers tonite!
1933 - Mon. Classes & made up last quiz this aft. Zoology & it appeared easy. Remains to be seen. Got D on Psych quiz - almost F. Gym & I'm stiff. B.B. tonite & I studied & bed early.
1934 - Tues. Dobby & I tore to vill after Physiology & got food. Then Caton, Butsch, Chinnock, Miss Griggs & Miss Johnstin dinner at Agora. More fun! Sat around fire & talked. I like that spirit!

1935 - Wed. A little cold coming on. Zo & Heredity. Then home & studied Chemistry all aft. & kept feeling lousier. B.B. tonite & I played & throat felt worse. I was a goose. Then home. More Chemistry & bed late.
1931 - Saturday. Mother & I went to town. Xmas presents. Bill's party tonite. I won first prize!! Jim asked me to the Alumni Dance. I accepted.
1932 - Mon. The last week! Oh gee! I can hardly wait. Physics lab & Miss Schwartz & I are still leading. Studied & messed around. Waited on last dinner this year! O gosh oh gee!
1933 - Tues. Zo all a.m. Got up early to study Bible. Roll call - it was O.K. To Barn & cleaned up till 5. Home & fooled rest of day. Wrote letter. Bells. And dear knows what all. Bed late.
1934 - Wed. Knew nothing in Chemistry today. Classes all day & 2 jobs & gym. Spent evening studying. I'm always dead these nites. One more week!!

1935 - Thurs. Studied for Chem quiz which I promptly flunked. Then to bed with lousy cold. Oh my. What a day. Fairbanks was swell to me. Then row with Dolly about B.B. & news. Bed right after dinner. Munny sent me grand box of candy.
1931 - Sunday. No church. Bill, Wally & Joe home. They saw pictures. Store. Do I remember? I certainly like him. I hope he goes to the Alumni Dance.
1932 - Tues. Last Zoology & gym classes. Tried to study tonite! People jumping around. Washed hair & finally got to bed real late. Ate dinner in formals with Honey tonite.

1933 - Wed. Classes. Got back Lit quiz - C - darn it! To vil & got ticket. Ride with Miss Davis. Nice! Zo makeup. Gym. To Dover road with Bets. Met Miss Wheeler. Saw Mrs. Hobbs. So nice! Seilers & feasted. Washed hair. Bed late!
1934 - Thurs. Out of Physiology early & came home & wrote paper for Education. Worked all aft & evening until about 12 & will have to get up early tomorrow, too. Up at 5:30 today to study.
1935 - Fri. Worked on Zo all a.m. - over at bldg. Then stayed home all aft. & worked on it. Cold a mite better. Then studied tonite on German & bed early.
1931 - Monday. Wrapped up Xmas presents with Munny tonite & was so tired that I couldn't study afterwards.

1932 - Wed. Christmas carols in French. Hair done in aft. Finished packing. Sent trunk. Doll tearing(?) party in our room tonite. Party in living room & I got Art! Gosh! How funny. Bed late & up early demain.

1933 - Thurs. Up at 5:30. Songs to Seniors. I had Steve. Great fun. Breakfast. Zo. Got B+ quiz. Out early. Waited lunch. Finally go to train. Tired. Bridge with A.A. Kessler, Martha Williams. Dinner Marjory Andres Bed early.
1934 - Fri. A yr. ago today - Oh me! & we still have 6 days. Up at 6. Worked around. Spent most of aft. with Stevie in infirmary. Party at Hat's tonite after going to Zo libe. Fun & then bed late.

1935 - Sat. Up early. Studied. Zo after lunch & helped Chinnock with Metabolism. Worked on Heredity paper & almost finished. Munger party tonite. Loads of fun, but I was tired. Art again. Oh me. G'nite.
1931 - Tues. Fun in health. Erasers etc. Addressed Xmas cards tonight. Also caught up in some studying.

1932 - Thurs. Classes in a.m. Saw Betty off at 12:45. Ginny & her Mother brought me down to 1:50. Both Sewickley girls on train. More darn fun! Bed early and slept well. Can hardly wait for 7:05 demain.
1933 - Fri. Train 3 hours late. Oh dear. Finally got home. To S.A. for their exercises. Fun. Unpacked & did various things in aft. Saw M.W. tonite. She came down & we messed around.
1934 - Sat. Tomorrow we can sleep! Hurrah! French in a hurry. To vil & got ticket! Prill & I Xmas shopped this aft. Wrapped them. Worked about tonite. Bed 10.

1935 - Sun. Up late. Corridor breakfast. Spent entire day typing paper & didn't finish. Dinner with Miss Kelly. Then Agora Xmas Vespers. Then regular Xmas Vespers. Fun. Stayed up for a while & typed. Carolers - Harvard & Wellesley. Bed late.
1931 - Wednesday. B.B. practice. More fun! I played forward. We won 3 out of 4 times. Studied tonite. Went to B.B. game with S. We won 26-12 & lost 19-17. Beaver!

1932 - Fri. Arrived at 7:45! Oh, it's grand! Talked with Mummy till Franny & I went to S.A. Down to Sally's in aft. Back. June Conneely here. Talked to Aunt Hat. Munny & I gabbed. Bed early. Awful tired!

1933 - Sat. To town & shopped. Met Mary Singleton. Got Sally at 12:30. Lunch in town. Home & Bill & Sam, Wally & Joe came. Wine. Tonite Bill J., Bill Torrance - nice! Eddie Ruff, Shirley & Martha Jack - bridge.
1934 - Up late. Corridor breakfast. Then studied. Dinner & studied all aft. Agora Vespers at 5:30 & ceremony - fun. Xmas Vespers tonite & I got Xmas spirit!!!

1935 - Mon. Finished Zo paper. Then class & horrid problems. Chem lab all aft & gym. Then the b.b. exhibition game tonite. Kilbon was swell & we clicked. But lost 28-26. F.F.C.W. sent me corsage of carrots & popcorn. Bed late - G'nite.
1931 - Thursday. Weird S.A. chapel. English in aft after a hot gym. Waited a long time for Sally. I had a nice fish supper. Bed late.

1932 - Sat. Up late. To town & shopped. Got dress. Bill here all aft. Keen kid. I still like him as much as ever. Movies with Sally. J. Crooks, S. & Bill R. here. We talked & danced. To town for John at 1:35. Keen! Bill here!
1933 - Sun. Up late. Good dinner. Awful fog. Lifted. And so Sally & I went to P.C.W. Dinner & pageant. Then fooled & I stayed up here all nite. More fun. Met more kids. Great life.
1934 - Mon. Up & studied. Packed trunk a bit. Gym after Chemistry & then b.b. tonite. Came home & wrote up expts until quite late. Tired.

1935 - Tues. Up at 6. Then studied like Hell. Got D on Chem quiz & did I feel good! Also C+ in German Oh me! Worked about. Then bed tonite early as I was quite tired. Munger party - Christmas & dinner & sat with Mrs. Hodder. She's a funny person.
1931 - Friday. John got home!!! Was I thrilled? Studied till about 11:30 tonite. Sally here in aft & we took Mrs. Lorimer home.

1932 - Sun. To church with Sally. Home. Bill came again. Stayed till after dinner. (Shake - good bye) Good wine. Vespers with S., Jim F. & his cousins, Alberta & Grant. Bill & Scripture reading. Look? To Jims for supper & more fun. Jim C.
1933 - Mon. To town from P.C.W. after Chem class. Home & Bill here. Stayed a long time. We put on license plates! Talked again & then Dan came. Haircut & tonite Babs, Dan, Monte & I bridge etc.
1934 - Tues. Out early from French. Physiology & I was scared, but didn't give report. Damn! Home & studied. Oh God! Will vacation never come?

1935 - Wed. Up quite early & did Kitty's prep job. Then fixed rats & then Met. & Heredity. Vill & got trunk sent. Bills etc. & bot presents for tonite. Sat with Miss Bushee. Then Prill & Madge & I took Jeanne Wymer & Miriam Wise to Seibers. Corridor party & loads of fun. Bed late & much Christmas cheer. Excellent on Zo paper.
1931 - Saturday. Up late. Town. Washed hair. (Still no furnace) John 19. Gave him a tie. Bricky's tonite with Dan. Fun. Down to Sally's & bed about 1:30.

1932 - Mon. Gave John $5.00. Worked around in am. Bill here in aft. Sally & I to S.H.S. & saw loads of kids. Bill here when we got back. Movies tonite with Munny. Joe E. Brown in "You Said a Mouthful." Good! Saw Chubby.

1933 - Tues. To town with Munny & got cute evening dress! Home. Dan & Monte came. Also Bill. But we had to leave. To Franny's. Cards. Mac. Sickish tonite. Read. Bead early. Telegram to brother in West Va.

1934 - Wed. Up at 6:30. Chapel & last Wed. classes for a while! Class all aft. Gym. Munger Xmas party tonite. Much singing. Soph. play. Then gang to vill to Seibers to celebrate! French paper & bed about 12:30.

1935 - Thurs. Awful classes. Bells. A mess in German 206. Marion woke me up as the Sophomores sang to us. Then off in a blaze on the 4:23. Janet & Roe-Cloud saw us off. Fairbanks left us at Springfield. Missed 10:35. Jane Murdock, Ann Edwards & I ate. Then bed & home soon! & Bill!
1931 - Sunday. Church. No Bill! Franny's with Bill J, Dan & Sally. Afterwards by my self. Fooled etc. tonite.

1932 - Tues. Town with Munny & shopped in am. Met Jane Griffith (Like her heaps). Lunch at Wm Penn & to Penn to movies with Sally & Jane. B.B. game with Shirly tonight. S.H.S. won both. Saw Chubby. Bill was here about all day, but I didn't see him.
1933 - Wed. Up late. To village. Addressed Xmas cards. June here for lunch. Looey, Dan & Monte came. Here all aft. Tonite M.W., Dan, Monte & I played bridge in bar. Guy Lombardo & Fred Waring.

1934 - Thurs. Up before dawn. Swell party & breakfast. Chapel. French at A.K.X. Packed. Xmas card from Chase!! Oh me! Gave talk in Zo. "Pigs." & finally left on 4:26. Late to N.Y. Took 11:55 & had a lower with Franny. Can't wait to get home!!!!

1935 - Fri. Home again to Munny! Arrived & breakfast in town. Katy away. Brother sick. Home & great talking. Fixed Xmas cards. M.W. called. Pop arrived at 6. Then worried till 8 when Bill came! M.W. also came at 9. Dinner. Then M.W. & Bill n' everybody- grand talk. So swell to see Bill!!!! M.W. left at 10:45 & until 12 we sat & talked etc. It is just like heaven to be with Bill again. I can't believe it!!
1931 - Monday. Movies tonight with M.W. "Rebound." Awfully good. Cutest dialogue. No Bill R. today. Only 1 ½ more days of school. I read in Latin tomorrow!
1932 - Wed. Wakened as Bill came. Up & talked at breakfast. Sally & I & plans for dances. Addressed Xmas cards. Read. To village. Slippery. John got cat for Munny for Xmas. Darling! Washed hair. Bed.

1933 - Thurs. Worked around. Bill came at noon & was here all day! Fixed up things & we went up & got Sally. Saw Aunt Hat. Xmas tree lights. I like him too much. Alumni Dance with Dan. Dans for breakfast. Bed 2. Reading in cellar. R(?)

1934 - Fri. Home, Good old home!! John & Mom met me! Babs called. Dan here this aft & took me to movies tonite. Saw Bill on motorcycle, but he didn't come in. Dan, Cousin Walter & I here for food. Then bed at 2! Dead!

1935 - Up late. Finished Xmas cards. To village,. Unpacked in aft. Bill in for few minutes & we talked. Then M.W. came late after we finally had dinner about 10. John & Peg arrived & great Hello's. Hell of a mess with Mom & Pop down on me! Oh God - What will happen?
1931 - Tuesday. Mother & John to town & Anne alone with Bill R. during lunch! What fun! School is such a bore. M.W. took us Xmas shopping at Bellevue 5 & 10. Lotsa fun!

1932 - Thurs. Read in a.m. Bill here in aft & I invited him to dance next Sat. for Jane Griffith. Grr! (Afraid about Tues.) Sally & I to movies tonite & saw "The Unwritten Law." Coffee ice-cream & she came all night.

1933 - Fri. Worked Mac & Bill didn't come to help. Sally to town with Jim. Dan, Monte & Ralph came this aft. Couldn't go to dance; so gang came for bridge in the bar. Me oh my. G'bye to Monte. Nice kid.

1934 - Sat. Bill at last as I arose at 10:30. Also Poppy! He thot I got home today. Explained letters etc. Ping Pong table in bar & we played. Kissed his sore finger! Wine. Then Babs & I to town & shopped. Dead. Munny, Pop & I for grand dinner. Then big confession afterwards & I had one awful cry but I feel much better. Now that it is off my chest.

1935 - Sun. Up quite late. M.W. & I breakfast. Wally & Bill in, John & Peg up. Charlotte came. Then dinner at 4. 9 of us - Louey, John K & Lou's roommate & Bill! Then Bill & got M.W. & to Betty Dunsford's tea where her engagement was announced!!! Home. M.W. & Bill, Pop left 7. Major Bowes etc. Then with M.W. home. Bill & I sat & talked & I told him my problem. What to do about it how(?) come I couldn't finish my plan? We were naughty. Then bed 11:30! It's too wonderful to be with him!!
1931 - Wednesday. Hooray! School over! Alumni Dance tonite with Jim F. Dan mad etc. I love Eddie R's dancing. Bill R. there! Ride before & after dance. Nice in the cool air. Home about 12:15

1932 - Fri. M.W. home. Sally & cat in a.m. M.W. in aft. Bill & Louis & Eke here. Chubil incident (I'm still red!) Asked Bill for Tues. Mixup. Dan called up! Sally's for dinner & Alumni dance with Jim Crooks. Danced with Bert & Bill. Keen. Sally here. Bed 3.

1933 - Sat. Up at 6:45 to go to town & get John. Bus late. Got drenched. Home. Talked with Sally. She left on 2:15 for Phila. Jim & I to see her off. Home. Movies tonite with M.W. & she came all nite.

1934 - Sun. Up & washed hair & did Xmas cards. Bill here for a while. So wunnnerful di! To Moon Run with Babs. Home. 2 Clover Clubs & I felt it! Oh me. Dan, Jim, Franny & I to movies. O.K. To G&W & saw Chubby. He had been here to say Hello - Darn. Cute note. I wish I could have 1 date with him, Di. I think I still like him!!! Nite - But Bill is so much better!!

1935 - Mon. To town & shopped all day. Then out to Childrens' Hospital to wish them Merry Xmas. Dr. Longon(?) married! Then missed Dr. Menten, Stock & Jerry. Home & Mom cross because I was so long. O.K. tho & we had a grand evening talking. Bed early.
1931 - Thursday. M.W. Sally & I to Seth Parker in "Way Back Home." Bill R. & mistletoe in aft! To M.W.'s until 11:45. Read cute story. Home & almost saw Santa! Eeemagine ! Can't wait for tomorrow.

1932 - Sat. Up late. Shopped. Presents taken. Bill here all aft. Even went up street with me ("I Love You Truly" in car). Sally's grandmother died. Sad! M.W. here. Bill in again tonite. Out. Jim C, Jim F & Joey here. Cat given to Mudow. I likes Bill just heaps! Nite!

1933 - Sun. M.W. & I up late. Bill, Looey here. Bill an awful meany. Wouldn't come to party. John & I both entertained. I chaperon (The good old conflict) To church & home. Saw Bill - goshdarn! Cleaned up & bed late.

1934 - Mon. Up early. Unpacked & worked. Bill & Louis here. Then Bill & I Ping Pong. Lights. Old Mistletoe & l.l. & k (?) again, di! I love him! Oh gosh! Charlotte came in the middle. Rest. Then 5(?) of us bridge & to Midnite mass. Hot. Home here & talked till 2.

1935 - Tues. Tore about all day wrapping & mailing gifts. Then sort of hoped Bill would come tonite. But he didn't. Up to Babs' for party. M.W. & Joey Charlotte, Bee & Wally & Babs - all to church. Good service. Back to Babs'. Drank & had swell time. Home about 1:30. What about Bill?
1931 - Friday. Lovely Xmas diary. More than ever. Dinner at Wrights. Another at Smiths. Train, cold, good dinner. Saw Mildy etc. & A.H. Home on 0:03 & bed about 12. Bill here 10 mins.

1932 - Sun. Merry Xmas! Keen time. Good dinner. To Isabell's & to Sally's in aft. Church with family in a.m. Bill here. He came tonight after supper & stayed till 12! Fun in living room with Munny & him. Teased me. Best ever, he is, diary!

1933 - Mon. Grand Xmas. Bill & Wally here while we opened presents. Wally here for the old tanks(?) ! Keen. M.W. & I to Ann Brown's tea. Dumb. To M.W.'s & to town & saw her off to Phila. Home. Washed hair. Bed.

1934 - Tues. Xmas!! Favorite present - evening coat. S(?) champagne cocktails - presents - breakfast - Egg Nogs - piles of people. Bill, 10:30 - 5!! He's so swell! Slept in b.b.(?) and I woke him. Up to Babs. Home early & read. Bed early. Tired.

1935 - Presents in Munny's room. Grand tea. The egg-nog party open house, more fun. Piles of people came. Bill here & left. Said he'd be back but didn't. What a man! Then Wally & Babs & Jim F. came later. Jim & I to movies "Mutiny on the Bounty." Walked home. He finally left. Damn swell Xmas except for Bill being so mean. It seems to be all J(?) at this point.

1931 - Saturday. Party at Dan's. M.W. & I went. Actually danced with Bill R. I enjoyed it! Also, Joe S., Wally & Jim C, Dan, Charles McC. He got sick at our table & wotta smell! Oh dear. M.W. all night.

1932 - Mon. Bill here in a.m. Stayed till 12 & danced with me! Mistletoe, but we were both shy! (About coming to see me!) To M.W.'s in aft. Also Sally came up & we horsed around. Bill here a few min. tonite. New kitty, Mugsie. Said g'bye to Eke. Tired & sick tonite!!

1933 - Tues. Up late. Snow. John left at noon. Darn it! Dan, Franny, Shirley, Martha, Jim, Wally, Bill, Jane Terry (damn), John (?) (He was here) & Rachel sled riding. Loads of us. Toboggan. Shirley's for wonderful food. Franny's tonite. Bridge.

1934 - Wed. Found Bill had been here last nite. Oh me! He came today & we ping ponged in bar till his mother called. Di(?)ed tonite. Up to Babs' with Dan after Louis & Jack Denny here. Jack swell. Bill came again while I was out. What fun. Oh God - he's too nice! - for me anyway!

1935 - Thurs. Something is wrong. I'm so mad at Bill I could die. We've got to have it out - a discussion! Worked about today. Cleaned up. Then Sarah Murdoch's tonite & Bill came with Jane Terry! What a swell evening! & I went alone. He didn't speak more than to be just polite. But I stood it & the party was grand! Home & that thot things out & decided maybe I shouldn't be the one. Talked to Mom about Med school at last & she is actually in favor of it!!
1931 - Sunday. Took M.W. home & went to church with Sally, Mother & John. To Sally's for supper. Lots of fun. Mistletoe, Petty & boys were mad. Home about 12 with Smarts.

1932 - Tues. Washed hair. Town with Emery's & to Wellesley Club luncheon. Shopped. Hair done. M.W. affair! Bill came after Sally dressed me & we went to G.R. dance! Oh diary! It was marvelous! (Let Me Call You Sweet-heart). Myers. Home & wine & bed late.

1933 - Wed. Munny & I to town & shopped. Got almost nothing. Wellesley Club breakfast. Fun. Pinx's tea this aft. & was all the people I used to know. To Montgomery's party with Dan. Jim Crooks nice. Fun,

1934 - Thurs. Hair. Lunch & Bill here all aft. Ping Pong etc. Watta day. Everything but the end, di & we were scared. But tell me, what does it mean? Class Banquet. Cocktail with Chubby. All fun. Sat with Jim & D.D. Home. Wally, Joey, Dan & Ralph here. Talked late & bed late.

1935 - Fri. Oh what a mess! However, M.W.'s birthday. I worked about all day. Then to M.W.'s for dinner & to the movies after the Clause tea at 4:30. Bill was here & that relieved the tension somewhat even if I wasn't. Saw Will Rodger's last picture "In Old Kentucky." Home. Bed. M.W. slept almost on top of me! Fun, though.
1931 - Monday. Fooled around with Bill R. & Wallie. Washed hair. Finger wave. Peggy not coming. Dance - Gr. Res. Hi Y. I took Dan. Jim & Sally. Wally & Terry. G&W & home about 12:30.

1932 - Wed. Messed around this morning. Only saw Bill at 1:30 a.m. but I'm still thrilled about last night. Sally & I to M.W. Sally here. Bill J., Dan, Ralph & Eddy came. Dumb as ever. John & I went to see Aunt Hat tonite. Home & bed early (midnite) Jim Crooks won't go Sat. nite. I love Bill, I love him, I love him.

1933 - Thurs. Up early. Peggy called! She'll be up. Bowled with Pinx, Franny & Sue Gott. Peggy came & we tore around Couldn't stay for dinner. Babs & M. T White & I to Campbell's party. Jane Terry, etc. Fun. Babs here all nite.

1934 - Fri. Thought William wouldn't appear today, but he came 3 times. Couple of remarks about yesterday. Munny also asked. Coffee ice cream & Bill here for some. Movies - "The Painted Veil" & Babs, Wally, Jim Sachet & I to Mos(?) for bridge & good food & drinks till 1:30. Fun!

1935 - Sat. Up & M.W. & Doss(?) to town. Shopped. Wellesley Club luncheon & Franny & Marg Forsyth spoke. O.K. Sat with all alumnae! Home. Tea at Campbells, Bill called & I had my fight out with him. To Charlotte's for party - 6 of us. Loads of fun. Then Bill & I more discussions & settled everything pretty well. John Louis & Peg here. Bill left. Louis & I taught each other dance steps & he was a little "(?)."
1931 - Tuesday. Bridge at Shirley's. Fun. Dance tonight. Shannopin. Jim took me. Dead battery & misplaced tree & pushing, arrived home about 3:00 A.M. Cute cop & 2 men. Crutchy, too.

1932 - Thurs. Wrote letters & to village this a.m. Sally, M.W. & I went to bowl, but didn't. M.W. & I for long walk & then said "G'bye." Bill here for short while this evening. He didn't fail! I asked Dan for Sat. & he accepted! Mrs. O'Neill said Bill is handsome & has character in his face. Blush!

1933 - Fri. Babs & I up at 8:30. Town at 11 & got M.W.'s dress, etc. Plans for progressive dinner. Bill down. Wet blanket. (?) Movies "Duck Soup" with Dan. Nice! To Merrill's Place & we played bridge. Babs so nice! Sib Crampton's party for Harris (?) this aft.

1934 - Sat. Town with Emerys. Mellon I. exhibit. Good. Saw Dr. McKinley. Wellesley Club breakfast. Movies at Warner. Home. Bill here. Stayed a while & left. Highball, also at Babs' Then 6 of us to Schenley Hotel. Grand Dancing. I was off in the heights. Childs' & home 3:30. Dan swell. Pajama party with Louis, Jack Deany & John till 5 & then bed! I was a little tight!

1935 - Sun. Up late. Dinner 2. Bill here for a while. Then Wally & I up to Babs' Fun. Then I got M.W. & down to Emerys to see Dobby. She's so grand! Then home. Pop & Mom. Bill called. Came at 8:30. Took M.W. home & then long talk. He is in an awful mess & I can't help - all about Jane & New Years & me & Hell - it's awful & I feel lousy about it! (But I'm so glad he's frank & honest about everything. Also Pop thinks its O.K., too about Med school & so now I'll have to hurry & make plans!

1931 - Wednesday. Up at 12. Lib Cranpton's tea party at E. Rye's tonight. Again I fell for Eddie. First time I even danced cheek to cheek. - Eddie. Home with Bill J. & Eddie. Tiff. Sally. Mrs. S. & Bill J.

1932 - Fri. Bill's birthday. Wished him Many Happy Returns. Keen kid! To Lib Crampton's this aft for Ping Pong & Bridge. Brickey Rhoads' party tonite & I won booby! Dan dumb dancer! O.K. time. Home & ride with Jim Crooks. Nice kid! Nite!

1933 - Sat. Plans all day for tonite. Bill down at noon. Raised again in my esteem. Went to dr's (?) & gave him present. Should I have? Peggy T. came! Gang of 16 - progressive dinner. (?) Dance at E. club with Dan. One dance with Bill - so keen!

1934 - Sun. Up at 12. Oh me! Bill came. Happy Birthday. He & Joey & I ping pong. Gave me birthday kiss! Left at 5. Up to Babs'. Home. Mr. & Mrs. Phillips. Nice. Wally tonite & he stayed till 11. Bill & Jane Terry. I still don't understand, di! Or do I? Wally lets me see Bill's weaknesses!

1935 - Mon. Bill's birthday & I only got to call him! Kerr's tea in East End this aft. Took Betty Richmond. Then home. Called & wished Bill Happy Birthday. Then got Shirley & Izzy & went to class of '32 Banquet. Chubby there & his awful speech. I also had to. Izzy & I to her cousin's in Bellevue. Grand fun. They gave us loads to eat. Home & bed at 2. Me oh my!!!
1931 - Thurs. Ride with Sally & gave things to Bill. Party at Jim's tonite. Sally left. Jim gloomy. Dan hardly speaking. But what care I. Hail New Year. Good luck etc!

1932 - Sat. Up late & to town & "Strange Interlude" with Martha A. Henderson. Home. Dressed. Bill came early (Hurrah) & to dance with Dan, Sally, Jim, Jane Griffith & Bill. Only 1 dance. To Heuman's & then here till 5! Bill still likes me? Jane darling. Peggy & Betty here for ½ hour! Nice as ever.

1933 - Sun. Peg & I up late. Bill & Wally here. Betty Townsend for dinner. To Babs'. Cold bad. Home. Bill came in. Then Dan & Bill Jetter. Dan stayed on . Gang to movies "Dinner at 8." Breakfast here. 11 of us. More fun! Bed at 6:15!!

1934 - Mon. Town & shopped in a.m. Made cookies with Walter this aft. Rested. John leaves for N.Y. tomorrow! Dandy with J. Sachet. Babs & Wally. Dance with Bill. He & J. Terry, Joey & Rose Merrill here afterwards & we imbibed much wine. I guess I was a bit tight. Fun. Bill back after he took others home & gave me 1st kiss of New Year. Nice on couch. Oh gosh, di. Jim Sachet was so nice & I paid all attention to Bill. But I do like him so awfully much!!

1935 - Tues. I should spoat a eulogy here. God, di - I'll miss you!!! But time flies! Flew about today. M.W. in & took me to bank. Wally & I to liquor store this aft. Wally, Babs, John, Peg, Bill for dinner. Fun. Fooled around till 10:30 & then off to Penn (?) to movies. I'm with Bill, di & it's New Years Eve! Great cause for celebration! Oh yes!!!
1931 - For 1932 - No resolutions only that I resolve to try & pass all the College Boards in June! Oh boy Oh boy! What ho!

1932 for 1933. Only college resolutions this year i.e. to pass my midyears & finals & try to be natural & easy at college & maybe quieter like Betty! (And may I always regard Bill as I do right now! Nice kid)
1933 I resolve to get rid of this cold or let nature take its course. I'm sich of resolutions. Maybe I'll retain the last one I mad last year. (in spite of Jane Terry!)
1934. Resolution 1 - To improve marks. 2. To please Mom 'n Pop (if possible) 3. Not to get drunk - ever. 4. to remember this vacation & Bill always & for ever. I never was happier with him.

1935. Resolutions 1. To pass Organic Chemistry 2. To pass the General & without great fright; if possible 3. To graduate 4. To get into Med school - what ho! 5. To keep on with no 4 from last year. If it's possible that I could love him more than ever, I do now!!

formalpara.title: MEMORANDA
formalpara.para:
The initials of the following people are frequently found in this book.
1935 During the summer of 1935 I saw 25 movies - quite a record- what with working, doing German & so forth - and me o my, di - quite a few of them were with Bill - at least 5!!

formalpara.title: INDEX OF IMPORTANT EVENTS
formalpara.para:
More initials etc.

Bill (our anniversary) August 29, 1934
Admitted to Wellesley July 28, 1932
Graduation - High School June 23, 1932
First night at Wellesley Sept. 16, 1932
First kiss! June 11, 1932
Blazer & Swimming Pool Carnival Nov. 9, 1935
Made 1st Varsity in Basketball Mar. 22, 1934
Head of Indoor Basketball Mar. 14, 1935
Made Head of Props Mar. 20, 1935
Mom married Pop June 27, 1933
Will Rogers died Aug. 16, 1935
Us. Aug. 23, 1935
" July 17, 1935
First day of first job. June 18, 1935
Dammuddy passed on October 17, 1934
Got into Agora same date
Mother first to Wellesley October 18, 1933
First time away all alone June 30, 1931
